review:
Ich habe ja schon viele, auch schlechte, Wimmelbildspiele gespielt. aber das ist echt der Hammer an Schlechtigkeit.
Erinnert an ein Spiel der frühen 90er-Generation in punkto Grafik und Interaktion.
Man irrt durch die Gegend und klickt sinnlos Dinge an, in der Hoffnung, dass etwas passiert. Der Mauszeiger verändert sich nämlich GAR nicht, so dass man keinen Plan hat, was man tun muß.
Dafür noch Geld bezahlen? Da gibt es aber bessere kostenlose Spiele des Genres.
Hab es nach fünf Minuten deinstalliert. Schrott.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050016554', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 517, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1560948671}
review:
Un nanar romantico-vampirique à prendre au 28ème degré en cliquant partout comme un fou (curseur fixe).

C'est tellement mal fichu, bourré de clichés et de bugs (quand vous perdez la souris, quittez et relancez, ça suffit à le remettre d'aplomb) qu'on finit par se dire qu'ils l'ont fait exprès et que c'est une parodie de jeu aventure/oc.

J'ai perdu un euro pour une tranche de rire.

Typiquement le jeu pile-ou-face subjectif qui vous fera détester les gens qui ont mis une éval positive ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198132471057', 'num_games_owned': 1274, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1560694748}
review:
This was honestly a surprise, but in a good way! The story is really funny and is meant to be campy, there were really hilarious moments and lines. It's shorter than your average HOG, about an hour of gameplay if you're really good at finding things.

I don't recommend playing on advanced unless you want the achievement. The lack of sparkles really slowed down my progress since I didn't know which spots had HOs and extra close-up scenes. I was basically clicking all over the place.

The HO scenes had pretty decent graphics but again, the items were kinda messy. Feels like a garbage dump in some of them with random fruits and stuff inside places where they shouldn't be there.

It's super cheap, but for how short it is, for once it's priced just right. JetDogs' other HOGs are a lot longer for the same price so I recommend playing those more if you're just after gameplay, they were a lot more polished and navigating was a lot easier. If you just want a hearty laugh, I'd say you should give this game a go!

That being said, it is kind of glitchy so be warned. If you think you're trapped or your mouse clicks are doing things it's not supposed to, I recommend closing the game and opening it back up again, it hasn't failed me yet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042620952', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1382, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1558448150}
review:
[h1] Genre [/h1] Ein Point & Click Hidden Object Adventure

[h1] Story [/h1] Unsere Zukünftige Braut wurde von einem Vampir entführt und zu einer Stadt namens "Sinister City" gebracht. Wir müssen nun alles in unserer Macht stehende tun um unsere Herzensdame zurückzuholen.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1] Es ist ein sehr simples Hidden Object Spiel wo wir Gegenstände finden und zwischendurch mal ein Minispiel lösen müssen, die ebenfalls sehr simpel sind. Die Draufsicht wie man sie in Point & Click Adventuren kennt ist hier total unnötig und man hätte es genauso gut in der First Person Ansicht machen können weil wir sowieso nur Wimmelbildszenen und Minispiele lösen und keine Objekte kombinieren oder sonst irgendwie typische Point & Click Sachen.

[h1] Achievements [/h1] Es gibt insgesamt 17 Erfolge. Man bekommt alle sehr einfach in einem Durchgang, wenn man das Spiel im Fortgeschrittenen Modus spielt, keine Hinweise benutzt & keine Dialoge überspringt

[h1] Pro/Contra [/h1]
+ Musik OK
+ Voice Acting OK
+ Sound OK
+ Günstig
+ Sammelkarten
+ Achievements

[h1] Fazit [/h1] Ein Kurzes Mittelmäßiges Hidden Object Adventure, aber für den Preis von 0,99 Cent kann man sich nicht beschweren

author: {'steamid': '76561198197234309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 957, 'last_played': 1558381424}
review: It's cheap, but annoyingly broken. Sixteen hours into it because one achievement is broken and the devs will not fix it. Told me I got it every playthrough and showed up in my activity feed but not in the list. Tried every way I could think of to get it and it wasn't till someone said exit the game as soon as it pops and sure enough that got it. The broken achievement is called, somewhat ironically, attention to detail. lol. Other than that the game isn't bad. Pretty short but what do you expect for a buck. Buy it if you want. I enjoyed it except for the glitch. but you can know there is a workaround to it so you won't get quite as frustrated as me. Overall 5/10... not bad, but not good either.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164016063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 333, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1556398893}
review:
pros

+ nice looking graphics and character models
+ music was very relaxing.
+ there is no penalty for blind clicking. 
+ game's story not bad one
+ there are some cheesy jokes and humorous moments
+ puzzles are mostly enjoyable and easy. 
+ voice acting is good
+ game drops tradings cards
+ there are steam achievements
+ there is auto save
+ two difficulty options
+ hint system helpful
+ game is cheap

cons

- game is little bit buggy. Sometimes you have to exit to the main menu and re enter the game to be able to proceed. 
- often times it is not really easy to spot which areas on the screen are accessible and hidden object scenes.
- when you complete finding items in a scene (when you found all objects) there will be no indication that there is nothing left to find.
- Some glitches (floating characters on pre rendered graphics)
- game is short
- The game seemed to have very little polish 

overall, this game is a mixed bag.  it's not easy to decide whether to recommend this game or not.  I don’t think it’s a bad game but not good game, either but I would recommend Sinister City. It's short, it's cheap, and give some enjoyment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198254256177', 'num_games_owned': 366, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1553872209}
review:
Это не самая хорошая игра ,но она старается быть хорошей .В ней простые диалоги но оригинальная концепция .
Сюжет  развивается по ходу игры и готическая история про убийство злого Графа вампира который заточил твою возлюбленную перерастает в кризис 500 летнего Вампира который хочет сниматьсяв кинце но стесняется поэтому хочет воплотить эту мечту на свою дочь  как стандартный тру_бытя .
Графентиум  конечно не Голливудский и могло быть конечно и лучше но он так как нужно что бы ты не терялся в вычурности предметов когда ищешь северную сумчатую мышь (это самое маленькое млекопитающее .) ,а потеряться достаточно легко.
Вывод - сойдет .
А если режет глаза то я знаю один лифефаке :
ЛАЙФАК ЕСЛИ ХОТИТЕ ПОВЫСИТЬ ГРАФИКУ В ИГРАХ КОТОРЫЕ НЕВОЗМОЖНО ЭТО СДЕЛАТЬ ИЛИ ПОВЫСИТЬ ГРАФИКУ НЕ ОБНОВЛЯЯ ПЕКУ ТО ЧЕМ БОЛЬШЕ ВЫ ПЬЕТЕ ПИВКА ТЕМ ЛУЧШЕ ГРАФИКА !!11!
А в целом про данный проект ,нууууууууууу ,если совсем нечего делать то даже и так скушается или когда вы хотите как-нибудь отдохнуть и посмотреть незамысловатую историю тыкаясь в поинтклик . 
(Я в эту игору залипаю на ноутбухе и я даже доволен)

author: {'steamid': '76561198013130865', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1542507659}
review:
In short, yeah - it's worth a try at 0.99 cents.

"Sinister City" is a really weird experience. It took me about 15 minutes of "What the ____?" situations before I realized, "Oh, they are trying to be funny!" Once I shifted my frame of reference from "A crazy person made this game." to "Whoever made this game tried to make it humorous."  I was able to just accept the weirdness. It did not make me laugh, but at least I understood the attempt.

This is not a good entry into the hidden object genre because there is no penalty for blind clicking. In fact, you will need to do that on many scenes to shift things out of the way so that you can access concealed objects. The puzzles are slightly better than the hidden object scenes, but are still among the simplest in this genre (and that is saying something). It almost feels like this was supposed to be a kind of "Monkey Island"-esque comedy adventure game but the budget got cut, so the scraps from the pre-alpha were turned into a hidden object game at the last minute.

I will recommend this for hidden object game players who like weird, goofy humor. It is a complete and functional game that should give casual players a few hours of simple diversion. I found no bugs and encountered no crashes. The achievements are easy to obtain, but I am not sitting through this again to get the one I missed - not skipping through the dialogue. It's not my fault it can be read so much faster than it can be (hammily) spewed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034530531', 'num_games_owned': 4365, 'num_reviews': 236, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1542059095}
review:
I enjoyed this one more than I enjoy most hogs. It is short and slapstick and there are a couple of bugs but they don't break achievements or the game. The puzzles are easy. The voice acting isn't terrible.

Tradings cards, fun, easy 100% achievements, recommended especially at the $1 price, I'd have been happy to pay double that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138422500', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1590440665}
review:
Игру рекомендую. У неё оказался достаточно нестандартный, милый и смешной сюжет, что заставило меня её до сих пор вспоминать с улыбкой. Она кажется мрачной и готической, но это вовсе не так, что меня приятно удивило. Наверное, разучарует тех, кто ждёт как раз серьёзности и привычного вампирского пафоса, но я рад, что авторы решили сделать что-то непривычное.
В остальном же обычная игра на поиск предметов, как многие другие. Есть возможность походить 3д героем, это тоже мило, вспомнилась некогда любимая Сиберия (конечно совсем другое, но всё же).

author: {'steamid': '76561198056385260', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1537054554}
review:
[h1]Почти отлично, но все же есть за что поставить маленький минус.[/h1]

Из всех казуальных игр, в которые я играл, такие как эта попадаются очень редко. Здесь не картонные персонажи, а 3D модели, что делает любую игру намного интереснее и впечатляюще, особенно в данном жанре. Обычно в подобных играх, не обращаешь особого внимания на оформление, больше всего интересует сюжет, а все остальное, для меня лично, уже на второй план отходит, джае те же самые головоломки. 

[h1]Сюжет[/h1]

Здесь он, ну очень короткий. Подано оригинально, интересно, даже  с неким юмором. Обыгрывается проблема отцов и детей. Подано в мрачном стиле, но все сделано в легких тонах хеллоуина. 

[h1]Головоломки[/h1]

Тут они очень легкие и простые, но не скажу, что не интересные. Если бы сюжет не на 1,5 часа был, а хотя бы на 3-5 с такими же головоломками, то вообще все отлично было бы. В основном здесь поиск предметов, но все очень хорошо обыграно.

[h1]Достижения[/h1]

Получить все достижения можно за два прохождения. Одно на легком уровне сложности, другое на сложном. Что я собственно и сделал.

[h1]Минусы[/h1]

Короткий сюжет, хотелось бы более серьезную, мрачную атмосферу, в принципе, все. А, нет, есть еще один нюанс со стабильностью. Иногда придется перезапускать игру, потому что бывало, не реагировал на действия персонаж, либо резалась картинка и вместо некоторых предметов были белые квадраты или прямоугольники. Так же не все в порядке с 3D моделями персонажей. Не корректно отображались на локациях в некоторых местах. Но особых проблем или испорченного настроения я не получил.

[h1]Купить или пропустить?[/h1]

Если вы не играете в сложные игры или приходите с работы уставший, как собака, то расслабиться за этой игрой у вас вполне получится. Даже если какие то моменты заставят вас, вдруг, задуматься или поставят в тупик, то на легком уровне сложности вам всегда подсветят, что нужно делать и разумеется клавиша помощи так же работает. С очень короткой перезарядкой. Если вас напрягает одна из головоломок, то через определенное время ее можно пропустить полностью. Все как всегда. 
Люителям казуальных игр, если вдруг пропустили данный продукт, рекомендую к ознакомлению. Для всех остальных, если вы не понимаете такие игры, то можете смело проходить дальше. Для вас это будет слишком нудно)

[h1]Оценил: 4.9 / 5[/h1]

обзор написал Hilbert Schwarz

author: {'steamid': '76561198055712561', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1532719522}
review:
[h1]A fuir de toute urgence.[/h1]

Dans ce jeu, rien ne va. S'il y a une volonté de changer des HOG "classiques" (Artifex et compagnie), le truc est d'une lenteur insuportable.  Son graphisme a facile 15 ans de retard, les énigmes sont d'une facilité déconcertantes, et les SOC brouillonnes au possible, avec, en prime, des bonnes erreurs de traduction ("Palmier" pour une emprunte de main, "Ombre" pour fard à paupière...) C'est rempli de bugs graphiques (affichages de gros carrés dans les SOC, "blancs" à des endroits improbables...) et il faut parfois recharger plusieurs fois le jeu pour que ça fonctionne.  Bref, aucun intérêt, même si vous aimez les vampires. Il y a un certain humour (le mec qui s'arrête sur la route/la carte pour commander un burger par exemple), mais ça marche pas.

Même en soldes, oubliez le... !!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197999850394', 'num_games_owned': 901, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 557, 'last_played': 1636846551}

author: {'steamid': '76561198140488740', 'num_games_owned': 699, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 529, 'last_played': 1521649412}
review:

Незатейливая игрушка, выдержанная в околовампирской тематике. Не лишена доли юмора и забавных диалогов (к примеру, осиновый кол с надписью "Сделано в Китае" и упоминание о том, что у графа Орлока самый что ни на есть обыкновенный кризис 500-летнего возраста). 
Неплохой саундтрек для игры за символическую цену.
Отдельный приз моих зрительских симпатий за [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1336723051]вампира-телепузика[/url] 😈

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1528931750}
review:
Tags: Adventure - WC - Hidden Object
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Broken hotspots and stuck progression. Cannot leave scene early game. Ruins a cheesy but polished haloween game with easy puzzles and hints.

I was kind of mentally riffing on this game on easy mode, trying to zoom through it as fast as possible to see the content. Was kind of surprised by how closely it ressembles a point and click adventure game. With a character model walking around, some voiced dialogue and surprisingly polished visuals. The hidden object scenes did not ask for too many items at once, the hint system recharged fast and had a funny Looney Tunes type sound effect when activated and you could literally machine gun the screen with clicks with no penalty.

Was a nice change of pace, the really cheesy writing had zero credibility but also helped give the game some charm. Unfortunately very early on while I was still being ushered in the Hotel by the clerk, I got teased by a vampire that I would be trapped in the dreamworld and even though the engine would flash at which hotspot I had to activate next, and the hint system was still functionning and showing me items within that hotspot I had to go fetch, the game would not register the activation of said hotspot.

I could not click any other hotspot either, or click to navigate to a different screen even though there were other ones that I had previously been to and had been going to and from back and forth. The game was not frozen either. This was at the - Repair the Mirror- objective.

As such the game is more or less unplayable, and even if it did work, the novelty of the cheesy writing would had eventually run off and the puzzles were not engaging enough despite some occasional trippy looking scenes to really warrant soldiering on. With the bugs on top this makes it a no brainer.

Delete local content permanently and hiding from library for declutter.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045005161', 'num_games_owned': 1913, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1526125546}
review:
This is a pretty good Hidden Object Game. I've played better ones but on the other hand it's only 99 cents, making it one of the cheaper HOG games out there. 

The longer I played this game the more I liked it. Sinister City has a quirky sense of humor mixed in with a Vampire B-movie satire type story which kept it fun.

 The narration is done alright along with the sounds and music. The graphics are fine, not great, but good for the price. A minor point is that I could not change the screen solution to 1920x1080 which didn't help the graphics of the game. So I suggest playing it in windowed mode on wider screens.

The hidden object items are pretty difficult to find, sometimes the items you are looking for is really hidden too well (black item in a black background) or sometimes badly described giving it an extra level of difficulty. 

Also when you complete finding items in a scene (when you found all objects) there will be no indication that there is nothing left to find, while later in the game you even have to   backtrack to the same scenes to find more items. So that adds another little level of difficulty. Good thing there is a hint button. The other puzzles are pretty straight forward and fun. 

If you are new at Hidden Object games I suggest you try another easier HOG game first. If you play HOG's 24/7 this one will give you a good challenge.  

All in all, it's a good game for 99 cents with about 2 to 3 hours of fun, depending on how often you click that hint button. 

Good
+ Cheap (especially on sale)
+ Finding some items are challenging
+ Good narration
+ Fun B-movie story
+ Achievements
+ Steam trading cards 
+ 2 difficulty modes

Bad:
+ Cannot change resolution
+ Some glitches (floating characters)
+ Some puzzles could be more difficult


15 minute gameplay so you get a good impression of the game:
https://youtu.be/ziK5Q-4ixjA

author: {'steamid': '76561198067002281', 'num_games_owned': 1066, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1525816015}
review:
In Iron Man 3 when it turned out that the Mandarin was actually[spoiler]a down & out actor named Trevor Slattery[/spoiler]I was pretty p***ed off to say the least. This is because they ruined this character's first silver screen appearance by making a mockery of him. Dracula though has long since been overused making appearances in books, movies, and HOGs probably somewhere around the thousands at this point, so it was nice to see him in a different role for a change. This combined with the game's cheesy jokes are what tipped this review to the more positive end for me, because lord knows after I encountered a game breaking bug about a third of the way through the game during a cutscene of all places I was ready to hit that dislike button so freaking quick. I didn't though, because this game's unique twist, dad jokes, and poorly dubbed dialogue made this game memorable for me.

Plus with coming in at £0.79 it's the same price as all those sh**ty achievement spam games. Only here you're getting a point & click/hidden object game with a decent enough story played out to you with the help of voice actors. It's an all around good time no thinking required and sometimes that's exactly what you need.

author: {'steamid': '76561198220532600', 'num_games_owned': 1403, 'num_reviews': 298, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1523694841}
review:
[h1]《Sinister City(罪恶之都)》[/h1]

这是我玩过槽点最多的一款点击解谜游戏。
这也是我第一次见支持简体中文，但是只要玩家名字中带有中文就会闪退的SB游戏。
中文翻译的错误我就不说了 [spoiler]反正夏姬巴点总能找到[/spoiler]
剧情是真的无厘头，完全是为了解谜而解谜。当着老吸血鬼的面做了一份让他喝的药？找到情敌先给他找东西拍镜头？没了电的永动机？进屋先让你修空调的丈母娘？
反正不管干嘛，跟谁说话，没有两句就开始让你找东西，没有逻辑，没有意义，找就完事了。
根本也不能算解谜游戏，这是我第一次不用跳过就能完成所有小游戏的解密游戏。
高级模式下一次通关基本能解锁全成就。
除此之外BUG也很多。
[u]锁在星空飞机里，老板让你找东西的时候，如果无法进入到别的场景，返回主菜单再进入就行了[/u]
反正是辣鸡游戏就对了。
该公司之后的[i]布拉格传奇[/i]和[i]德古拉传说[/i]，质量比这款游戏高很多[spoiler]矮子里拔将军[/spoiler]

review: I didn't like this game at first, but it definitely grew on me over the two hours it took to complete it. The writing and voice acting is quite good (relative to the typical standard for HOGs), and I liked how the game took the tired "evil spirits/vampires" trope and tried to do something different with it. Strangely enough I actually think this game would have worked better as a visual novel, since the hidden object scenes were the least enjoyable part of the game for me, whereas the story held my interest and had me smiling by the end.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081363166', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1517560550}
review:
[h1]Вся правда о Носферату.[/h1]

Очередное готическое творение от именитой компании [url=http://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Jetdogs%20Studios]Jetdogs Studios[/url] - на этот раз это [b]кликер[/b] с элементами [b]Поиска предметов[/b]. Являясь одной из первых самостоятельных игр данного разработчика, она вобрала в себя кучу почивших условностей и допущений, которые в нынешних представителях жанра с огнем не сыщешь. Управление за персонажа с видом сбоку, искомые элементы в сценах поиска, исчезающие только группами, взаимодействие интерактивных объектов друг с другом, присутствующее здесь лишь для галочки... Всё это в совокупности выглядит достаточно самобытно и нетривиально.
[b]Сюжет[/b] повествует о [u][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1283878921&tscn=1517113497]юноше Джоне[/url][/u], желающем спасти свою суженую из лап самого графа Орлока. Этот граф примечателен тем, что является главной звездой шедевра немецкого экспрессионизма - немой черно-белой картины "Носферату: Симфония ужаса", вышедшей на экраны в далеком 1922 году. Логично, что и действие данной игры разворачивается примерно в то же самое время - в эпоху нуара и винтажа, неоновых вывесок, жутких отелей, прокуренных офисов, обставленных дубом и тусклыми лампами, а также классического кинематографа - с его студийными павильонами, прожекторами, хлопушками-нумераторами и театральными декорациями. 
В распоряжении у нашего персонажа имеется яркая живописная [u][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1283878728]карта[/url][/u] для комфортабельного перемещения по четырем основным территориям - отелю, киностудии, замку Орлока и Вампайр-стейт-билдингу (отсылка к известному небоскребу). 
Угловатая и архаичная трехмерная [b]графика[/b] показалась мне неуместной. Кривой [b]интерфейс[/b] с допотопным [b]управлением[/b] (когда любое случайное нажатие на экранное поле сопровождается знаком "Х") может вызвать лишь отторжение у более взыскательной публики. [b]Музыкальное сопровождение[/b] с печальными отголосками идиофона и рояля едва различимо для слуха. Ну, и под занавес стоит отметить злосчастную цикличность сцен поиска в совокупности с примитивным линейным сюжетом и маленьким хронометражем. Однако при этом большинство мини-игр вызывали во мне лишь азарт и восторг.
А еще в игре имеются карточки, русскоязычная локализация и невеликая стоимость. При этом почти все достижения являются сюжетными, остальные же зависят от заданного стиля игры.

[b]Вердикт:[/b] Как и в случае с [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/alina_nomie/recommended/396790]обзором на Dracula`s Legacy[/url], я поставлю игре положительную оценку. Однако это решение довольно условное и номинальное, поскольку в [b]Sinister City[/b] имеется куча престранных и неприятных вещей (включая единственный баг, который я отыскала в самом начале). Также благодаря зловещей и жуткой фигуре антагониста я настоятельно не рекомендую игру к приобретению лицам младше 10 лет. 

[i]➤ [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/alina_nomie/recommended/396790]Ссылочка на предыдущий обзор ❣[/url]

А ежели Вам понравились данные обзоры, то смело подписывайтесь на мое курирование игр на соответствующей [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/30845640]странице[/url] в Steam Store. Также вступайте в [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/nomie]группу ♥ Nomie Games ♥[/url], полностью посвященную моим игровым обзорам.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561197993803638', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1514614899}
review:
Oh my god this game is terrible. I started this game on Easy and it was too difficult to play.

The basics of these type of games aren't here. The cursor doesn't change so you're can't be expected to know where things are. On Easy, a sparkle with show you interactive/HO areas but I have no idea when that happens. Things are shrouded in darkness (and/or blurry) that even moving my head around didn't help. Some objects were miscolored too. HO scenes don't close when finished. Some interactive objects only work when you've progressed the story but I'll let that slide.

I discovered there [b]are[/b] hints available but they're never shown that they are a feature. That glowing question mark in the bottom-left corner was just background noise to me.

It's both terrible visual and GUI design.

Incomplete clues are present. (Musical) note and (Paper) clip being in the same scene.

You can skip the credits but not the stinger.

I can only hope the bad acting and story were played for comedic effect.

Also, I get "Tap anywhere to continue" prompts which makes it seem like a mobile port.

BUGS! Five times this happened: HO scenes close everytime you click the mouse. Two of which didn't even load in properly! Restarting the game will turn everything back to "normal" 

PROS:
You don't get penalised for multiple clicks, which was the only way I could find most things.
The 3D models aren't terrible.
The comedic moments are nice, especially the credit crawl.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035355941', 'num_games_owned': 7701, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1513701231}
review:
One day, Tommy Wiseau found an old, lost story written by Aldous Huxley. From Huxley's completely off his head on mescalin' period. Tommy thought that this story would make an excellent basis for a lowest common denominator hidden object game. So he made it.

And he was right.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077629417', 'num_games_owned': 335, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1511825174}
review:
Historia dość banalna, choć ma kilka śmiesznych momentów.
Animacje są tragiczne. Oprawa graficzna nie powala zupełnie. Muzyka strasznie jednostajna, irytuje po krótkim czasie.
Największą bolączką tej gry jest jednak jej wtórna mechanika szukania przedmiotów, na siłę wciśnięta w rozmowy z innymi postaciami. Miałem wrażenie, że główna postać to nie jest facet, który chce za wszelką cenę odzyskać swoją ukochaną ale jakiś pieprzony fachowiec od przykręcania żarówek i naprawiania klimatyzacji. Nie grało się w to jakoś zupełnie źle ale gdybym nie skończył tej gry po 3 godzinach to raczej nie skończyłbym jej w ogóle. Po prostu nudna gra, jest na steamie wiele innych ciekawszych i lepiej zrobionych przygodówek point and click.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119580484', 'num_games_owned': 247, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1467205472}

author: {'steamid': '76561198201437879', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1560529709}
review: Mit das Beste in der Preisklasse. Überhaupt sind die Jetdog Wimmelbild Spiele in der Preisklasse fast ungeschlagen, Sachen wie Morphopolis. Sonst gibt es im 49 Cent Bereich nur Mist. Die Dinger hier sind zwar auch nicht hübsch, aber immer hin (unfreiwillig?) komisch und warten mit einer meist netten Story auf und die leichten Aufgaben machen ein durchspielen immerhin möglich, was ich gut finde. Das hier ist das Top Jet Dog Wimmelbild Spiel, wenn man mich fragt. Wirklich absurd seltsame und gleichzeitig irgendwie erheiternde Geschichte. Sollte man sich mal tatsächlich reingezogen haben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056837040', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1510784099}
review:
Sinister City... it's not easy to decide whether to recommend this game or not. Is it cheesy? Yes it is. But it sort of has an explanation for that. Is voice acting sub-par? Yes it is, but again... it sort of makes sense. Is it a point-and-click adventure? Not really. It's a mix between a hidden object game and a point-and-click adventure. I suppose that if you are a fan of the latter, you won't be satisfied (even though there are also puzzles here and there, all extremely easy to solve), and if you are a fan of the former this could probably make you curious about (better) point-and-click adventures, which doesn't do any harm.

So... all in all, I would recommend Sinister City. It's short, it's cheap, and you get what you pay for, but there are some smart ideas behind it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198218094865', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1510701148}
review:
So I have played a fair number of Jetdogs Studios games, including Dracula Legacy and the whole Herclues series.

This is not one of their stronger efforts.  The story and voice acting is not great.  Other than that this is a pretty by the numbers hidden object game.

YMMV

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198016826254', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 2916, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2916, 'last_played': 1509606190}
review:
Забавная небольшая игра в жанре поиска предиетов. Нам предстоит выполнить пару десятков дурацких поручений, насладиться обсурдностью происходящего и немного поулыбаться. Истории и накала страстей от Sinister City ждать не стоит, эта игра делат ставку на легкость и юмор. Чувствуется, что делали с душой. Для любителей ачивок за второе прохождение можно получить все. По скидке брать можно.

6 постановочных дублей из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116084308', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 306, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1555609707}
review:
Não tenho muita paciência para jogar games point and click. Mas acabei comprando este aqui por causa da temática de vampiros. Me lembrou o famoso point and click Dracula, que joguei nos anos noventa. Aquele jogo é uma verdadeira obra de arte!

Quanto a Sinister City, trata-se de joguinho muito simples do já mencionado gênero. Acredito que o jogo tenha sido desenvolvido por uma menina ou uma equipe feminina por causa da pegada romântica e do clima "soft"que nada tem a ver com jogos de terror ou suspense, como é de se supor que seria esse jogo. Não tome esse comentário por machista, até porque não tenho críticas mais graves com relação ao jogo. Mas para aqueles procuram um game de puzzles mais hardcore ou que esperam por um clima trash, não recomendo a compra. Esse é um típico jogo para relaxar e apreciar os bonitos cenários. Quanto a estória do game, esqueça. É ruim pra caramba.

NOTA : Não atrevo a avaliar esse jogo com nota pessoal dado o fato de que tenho muito pouca experiência em jogos point and click.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126610501', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 176, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1483122090}
review: This game doesn’t look like much at first glance, but it’s one of the first HO/Adventures from JetDogs, with somewhat unconventional approach to hidden-object scenes, with moments that are downright hilarious, and available at a good price. Worth a try if you’re a HO games and cards collector.

review: Esta entretenido, un buen juego de buscar objetos, la historia esta muy surrealista pero te hace reir. Es un juego muy sencillo y corto pero vale la pena cuando esta en oferta yo lo recomiendo para pasar el rato.

author: {'steamid': '76561198153150351', 'num_games_owned': 2413, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1505456361}
review:
Sinister City jest nieco dziwne. Na pierwszy rzut oka to standardowa HOPA z wampirami i porwaną narzeczoną.... jednak fabuła zamiast w stronę horroru bardzo szybko skręca w stronę pseudo-komedii, parodiującej standardową fabułę. Kino klasy B, sam pomysł może odrzucić, ale dla mnie ma to swój urok

Zagadki są w sumie ok - jeśli ktoś grał w jakąkolwiek HOPA, szybko się odnajdzie. Poziom ich nie jest jakoś wyśrubowany, a jeśli nie podoba się któraś z konkretnych zagadak - istnieje możliwość jej pominięcia. Grafika jest zaledwie znośna - widać, że to multiplatforma, gdzie smartphone'y są głównym celem.
Niby polecam, sam bawiłem się dobrze, tyle, że zdecydowanie nie każdemu spodoba się pomysł.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001369245', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1573861041}
review:
This was one of those "so bad that it's good" game.

It's hidden object game with some simple puzzles but the plot and weird cheesy humor was so fasciating that I actully liked this game. Then again I love bad movies and jokes so just keep that in mind.
It's a short game so it's just right length before it start getting tideous and repetitive.

for a dollar / euro priced game it's a worth buying and play with group and have fun.

________________________________________________________

Tämä on sellainen "niin huone, että on hyvä" peli

Peli on hidden object peli, jossa on myös helppoja pulmapelejä. Pelin juoni ja omalaatuinen huumoria vain oli niin kiehtovaa, että tykkäsin pelistä. Tosin tykkään huonoista elokuvista ja viteistä, joten varautukaa siihen.
Peli on tosi lyhyt, mutta sopivan mittainen. Ei kerkeä muuttua tylsäksi tai toistuvaksi.

Euron peliksi sain rahoilleni vastinetta. Suosittelen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082147294', 'num_games_owned': 1262, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1479607217}
review:
Is it worth playing?
Are you a fan of Hidden Object games? Then yes... but approach with low expectations.
If no, then don't.

This game's story is charming to an extent though a bit too silly to be taken serious at certain points.
The game itself is buggy, your character walks around on top of the background even when he shouldn't, one of the achievmentes involve not skipping a single line of dialogue which is impossible at certain points since you have dialogue that plays without warning during gameplay sequences.
The artwork is decent though items are sometimes hard to notice on the scenario. The low poly models are not distracting and add to the overall theme of the game.

Go with low expectations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198286680618', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1505243451}
review:
Sem tam člověk rád najde nějakou jednoduchou hru na odreagování. Ale i tak od ní očekává nějaké ty kvality. Sinister City se tváří jako tajemná hledačka s lehce temnými prvky a zajímavým příběhem. Jenže ouha... Příběh hry je jednoduchoučký a absurdní. Ano, možná bych ho označil i za vtipný, ale styl humoru a složitost úkolů (questů) ve hře napovídá, že tato hra není určena starším třinácti, čtrnácti let. Nebo alespoň velký a pozitivní ohlas u lidí starších čtrnácti let nesklidí.
 
Hru bych nedoporučil ani jako jednorázovku na zabití času. I přes krátkost příběhu ona zmíněná absolutní trivialita a monotónnost všech úkolů vás brzy přestane bavit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054436697', 'num_games_owned': 3211, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1617501156}
review:
Игра о том как подсосаться к родаками, если они не дают мутить с их дочуркой. 
Надо: Починить вентилейшин, установить виндовс, починить трактор, мост и всю остальную srань, мусор вынести, посуду помыть и всё в таком духе, ты лакшери бой и они постелят тебе кроватку с дочуркой. 
ПС: ДАННУЮ ИГРУ ПОКУПАЙТЕ НА РАСПРОДАЖЕ ЗА 5 ГРИВЕНЬ (или не покупайте)
Лучше отложите на батлу или калду.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050552857', 'num_games_owned': 2290, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1446284328}
review:
예상과는 다르게 스토리가 상당히 유치하지만 오히려 그게 매력인 게임 

+ 전체적으로 무난한 난이도의 퍼즐 구성 
+ 중간중간 나오는 유머 코드 
+ 공식 한글화 

- 퍼즐과 번역에서 몇 가지 다른 부분이 있는 점 
- 같은 방식의 반복적인 퍼즐이 많은 점 

리뷰 점수: 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198258629780', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1501428095}
review:
Неплохая вещь, чтобы немного поломать голову и не скучать 1.5 - 2 часа. Сюжет простой и незамысловатый, но пару раз даже улыбнуло. Квесты и головоломки также просты и типичны для подобного рода игр. Были замечены небольшие баги и косячки, но за 14 рублей по скидке, которые к тому же наполовину окупают карточки, простительно.  
5 кровососов, мечтающих об актерской карьере, из 10.

review: I think this had potential to be a good game, I liked the story and the character but the game was extremely buggy. Some of the objects just came up as a grey square and the acting was a little bit wooden but I liked the fact it was so bad it's good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198297909459', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1501066778}
review:
una favola onirica e gotica, attorniata da continui sarcasmi
un amore vero e puro ma irrealizzabile, il padre di lei ha troppo potere e quindi, lo utilizza per influire in una maniera nefasta sui due giovani innamorati rapendo la giovane e quindi, separandoli
in una finta odissea teatrale, Jhon dovrà farsi coraggio ed affrontare l'anziano vampiro di petto, il loro amore è davvero troppo grande per potervi rinunciare
tutto è al posto giusto, tutto è fatto come si deve, anche se poteva essere programmato un pò meglio, davvero bellissime le colonne sonore
dallo stile molto elegante e sofisticato, per me è un acquisto assicurato

author: {'steamid': '76561198085441094', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1500234227}
review:
Cuck Simulator 2014

The story is so bad that the developers had to be more than a little self aware. Collecting some of the items was completely arbitrary. Stopping in the middle of a conversation to make me find coffee supplies? It felt like they were just padding the game with extra stuff to run up play time. There were also a few bugs that I ran into with a missing texture and then toward the end the hidden object scenes would close after one click. Returning to the menu solved the clicking problem.

If you buy this game at steep discount just because you want the achievements or have nothing better to play then it's not that bad. Just be aware of what you're getting yourself into. There was also a whole level that was a pretty tongue-in-cheek jab at psychiatry if you're into that.

review:
La historia es bastante simple y la mayoria de las situaciones son sacadas de la manga pero a pesar de eso logra entretener. Los graficos pues son de ps2 . Los puzzles son secillos. La musica sin ser una maravilla tampoco estorba.

No he tenido ningun problema de rendimiento con el juego como comentan en otras reseñas . Con una 560 ti que es una reliquia ya   y un i3 sobrado.

Por 50 centimos esta bien pero ya mas  me lo pensaba, Para entretenerse una tarde.

review: I would love to be able to tell you about this game, but I can't. It loads up, and it allows me to select a profile to play (I was able to input a name). Then, inexplicably, I can do no more. Esta molt be el joc.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972302725', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1484353622}
review: It's a generic Hidden Object game wrapped in a poorly animated storyboard. The 3D models are fine, the quirky storyline is fine, what isn't fine is the below average voice acting. It's not bad enough to be good (a la Resident Evil from 1996), it's just bad. I managed to slink my way through this game in almost 6 hours, because I had to replay the game twice to get that last achievement to pop. As far as shovelware Hidden Object games go, though, this one tries an animated story but doesn't quite make it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071375554', 'num_games_owned': 2813, 'num_reviews': 401, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1496022995}
review:
I don't know where to start with this game. I don't care much about the graphics if the game has a good story, but this game doesn't have both! The story is awful and I mean it is awful! The whole thing is really bad man! The dialogue, the voice acting, the characters design, the reason behind the kidnapping.. so childish. I'm just so glad it didn't take long to finish since I wanted to be fair and finish the game because 'perhaps' it'll get better at the end, but nope.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=935160878

And one of the worst things in this game that you start without knowing where to go, what to do, and when the hidden objects scene starts and when it should end! You have to click 'back' in each scene once you are done from it, and perhaps you are not even done so you'll have to go back there and search for more. I've encountered different glitches during my gameplay too.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=935120908

Pros:
+Fast travel map.
+Steam achievements.

Cons:
-Bad story
-Bad graphics.
-Bad music (it gave me a headache, especially the main menu music made me really dizzy!)
-Very bad and cheesy dialogue, none of them made me laugh.
-Bad ending.
-No replay value.

I would never recommend this game even to my worst enemy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043642717', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1440626440}
review:
Achievements: All possible and easy-- though missable.  Multiple playthroughs may be necessary, but it's a very short game.

+Silly, B-Movie plot
+Cheap(especially on sale)
+Has cards
+Does not take itself seriously

-Short(completable in ~1.5 hrs)

Sinister City, as of writing this, has mixed reviews.  That, I think, is atrocious.  The whole premise of the game is so delightfully absurd that it becomes hilarious.  It does not take itself seriously in a world where hidden object games seem to take themselves way too seriously.  The voice acting is bad, and the settings are weird.  Nothing quite makes sense.  That being said, this game is clearly meant as parody.  It's so bad it's funny-- does that make sense? Sinister City embraces the cliches of hidden object games and the vampire genre and mocks them.  I love it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011595325', 'num_games_owned': 2477, 'num_reviews': 929, 'playtime_forever': 424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 424, 'last_played': 1494115803}
review:
Sinister City é um game de aventura e objetos ocultos bem regular, a estória é focada no humor bobalhão (o personagem é usado de empregado por todo mundo que tem algo que ele precisa) e pelo valor é bem aceitável (tem umas 3h de duração), mas não se destaca no mar de objetos ocultos do steam. O maior defeito geral é que às vezes ocorre um bug onde é preciso voltar ao menu principal, porque o cursos para de responder como deveria. Para nós brasileiros ainda tem mais uma: a legenda está totalmente porca, dificultando um pouco umas partes do jogo, por exemplo: eu tinha que pegar um dado (dice) e a legenda mandava pegar um morrer (die).
--------------------------------
Sinister City is a very regular hidden object and adventure game, the story is focused on silly humor (the character is used by everyone who has something that he needs) and the value is quite acceptable (it has a 3h duration) , But does not stand out in the sea of steam's hidden objects. The biggest general flaw is that sometimes a bug occurs where you have to go back to the main menu because the mouse stops responding as it should.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970314107', 'num_games_owned': 2304, 'num_reviews': 917, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1492838259}
review:
Games can be bad in a lot of ways. They can be too hard, they can be too dumb (it's true), they can be too rough, and so on. I've played plenty of games that were perfectly good at what they wanted to be, and what they wanted to be was bad. Sinister City is the opposite, in a way. It wants to be dumb and goofy in a charming way, and it would be, if not for being genuinely bad on the technical side.

You play John, a regular joe who looks a little like Tom Cruise with a painted on short-sleeve button-up and tie. His girl Nina gets whisked away by a vampire to Sinister City, an actual fucking place full of vampires that everyone is totally okay with for some reason. After getting his bearings and some vampire hunting tips from the melon-headed veteran, John makes his way into the auspicious burg to wrest his fiancee from the clutches of the undead.

It's nowhere near this epic, mind you, and that's a good thing for once. Whatever you're expecting of Sinister City is going to get upended because the story is acutely aware of its absurdities and tries to top itself constantly. Within minutes of starting the game (spoiler alert I guess?) the kindly hotel manager assembles a mystical hypnosis machine that sends you to the astral plane. To defeat the villainous vampire you'll need the help of his real estate agent wife and his therapist. There's a vampire Teletubby. And all of this is spilled on you not with a wink and a nod, or awkward tryhard dialogue, but with some refreshingly earnest humor and a willingness to just roll with the weirdness.

The reason I'm telling you all this up front is because despite the solid kookiness, you really shouldn't play Sinister City. As wonderfully campy as the story ends up being the gameplay cannot sustain it, and the technical issues just demolish what's left. The hidden object scenes here are a combination of the genre's worst habits: You can only seek five items at a time, you have to move completely unmarked objects to get at things behind them, the scenes themselves are hard to spot and tend to be in strange places, and you have to do them multiple times until you find almost every single item. This means that scenes are incredibly easy as long as you're randomly clicking on everything, which is the only way to find the movable objects anyway.

On top of that, you need to find multiples of items across multiple scenes or areas to get inventory items to use on NPCs or puzzles. These can be hidden anywhere, including hidden object scenes for OTHER items, and you get no indication that you've found everything in a given scene. Plus, you can't even pick up obvious items until you trigger the dialogue telling you to get them! On top of all this, some scenes are misaligned graphically which make it super hard to click the right things, and some objects blend far too well into the muddy backgrounds.

The amateur-hour graphics don't do Sinister City any favors either, with inconsistent 3D models and some incredibly blurry backgrounds. I must admit, though, the sound design is decent and features some nice, campy voice acting and appropriate music. But it is clear this was a mobile title first, with a lack of options and plenty of "Tap here to X" prompts. It wouldn't take you more than 90 minutes to beat even on the harder mode, so as decent as the story is in its goofy way, you're better off staying far, far away from Sinister City.



Did you enjoy this review? I certainly hope so, and I certainly hope you'll check out more of them at https://goldplatedgames.com/ or on my [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/audish#curation]curation page[/url]!

author: {'steamid': '76561198106657336', 'num_games_owned': 1170, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1491895521}
review:
Začnu shrnutím - asi nejhorší hra z kategorie hidden object co jsem zatím hrál. 
Příběh je (přemýšlím jak to vyjádřit slušně) divný. Hledání předmětů se taky nepovedlo - máte najít 12 kousků něčeho a rozmístění je třeba ve třech různých místech kde část je volně, část poschovávaná za/pod něčím a poslední kousek dostanete po "klasické" hidden kdy vybíráte předměty podle názvu. Rozmístění/typ věcí k hledání mi připomělo "vtip" je to žluté je to na stěně -> volně pohozená kupa písku, bez nápovědy/zběsilého náhodného klikání po obrazovce to často nejde. Občasné chyby grafiky (stačí vyskočit do menu a pokračovat ve hře) - vtipná byla bílá obrazovka na které svítila jen část hledaných předmětů - asi vyšší level nápovědy. Minihry celkem ušly (nic překvapivého, nic náročného), herní doba krátká.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036328736', 'num_games_owned': 3959, 'num_reviews': 727, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1491125795}
review:
Sinister City marque les début des Finlandais de Jetdogs Studios dans les jeux PC et ça se voit.
C'est techniquement un désastre avec notamment des affichages fantaisistes du personnage principal, un bug qui oblige à relancer le jeu ou des erreurs de traduction à la pelle.
On peut regretter également une durée de vie extrêmement faible, un scénario ridicule et des personnages auxquels on ne s'attache pas.
Dommage aussi que l'idée d'inclure un personnage à déplacer comme dans un point&click ne soit techniquement pas maîtrisée.

Au niveau jouabilité, pas de difficulté particulière. Il s'agit exclusivement de chercher des objets dans des scènes classiques d'objets cachés, soit selon la liste de chaque scène, soit, selon la demande d'un PNJ, des objets dispersés dans plusieurs scènes.


Bref, dans le genre, y a largement mieux même si c'est plus cher. Alors pour le prix (et encore plus si c'est en soldes, éventuellement même le pack avec Alchemy Mysteries), on peut envisager de l'essayer et de juste le prendre pour ce qu'il est : 2h max de recherche d'objets.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048260522', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 343, 'last_played': 1490667054}

author: {'steamid': '76561198056359918', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1490618053}
review:
Sinceramente non saprei da dove cominciare: la grafica lascia a dasiderare, la trama è ridotta all'osso e la traduzione pessima e piena di errori. Gli enigmi sono tali solo di nome, ripetitivi nella ricerca degli oggetti, le ambientazioni scarse. 
A dirla tutta neppure la colonna sonora è un gran chè. Il peggior gioco di questo genere che io abbia mai giocato finora.
Preso in saldo, pagandolo la metà, ma non vale comunque i 50 centesimi spesi.
Se volete cimentarvi, solo iper scontato, e se proprio non avete niente di meglio da fare. Per me 2/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049330632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1455448541}
review:
Среднечковый point&click. Сюжет довольно простой. 
Графика так же не отличается, порой даже не радует.
Сложность никакая, атмосферностью я не проникся (либо ее нет).
Игра на один вечер, но он явно не будет отличаться весельем :)
Есс-но цепляет тот факт, что по акции за игру хотят копейки, а в замен дают карточки.

author: {'steamid': '76561198149384609', 'num_games_owned': 714, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1608493478}
review:
This isn't a horror or scarey game.  It's more like a spoof with funny vampires.   
Clunky interface.  I had some buggy issues in the start of the game.  Disappearing graphics (like whited out boxes in some parts of the 'hog' scene) and when I was in a 'hog' scene at this part not long from the start every time I clicked on an item it would go out of the 'hog' back to the scene and I had to keep clicking back and forth to finish.  
I fixed both things by just going to the main menu and back in the game but at first I had to do it a couple of times.

After that I didn't run into any more buggy stuff like that.

Graphics are a bit clunky.  ( older game though)

 I didn't take this game to seriously and just played it for something to do. 

 The game is  short.  I think it says I played for 2hrs but I'd say you can finish this in less then that.  Those times are reflecting me trying to figure out what was going on with the bug parts and leaving game up when I afk'd so this is a really short game if you play straight through.

Humor is rather silly though I laughed a couple of times because it was so campy.   Dialog a bit corny and over the top and not particular well acted.  One vampire had such a terrible voice but I think that's supposed to be funny because [spoiler]he is an actor in a children's show. [/spoiler].

There is one voice I know I have heard before, he's an actor and that voice is unmistakeable however I can't place the name.  I didn't wait to read the whole credits so I may just look that up.   It's kind of fun to hear a recognizable voice in games. 

The Hogs, nothing special, kind of silly and uneventful.   Puzzles? uhm not really.

 you find yourself clicking a lot because the mouse icon has no visual changes to them like object icon, area icon and so on.  I played in advance mode though didn't get that achieve because at one point I simply clicked off advance in the main menu options to see what the other mode was like and then switched it back when I realized advanced mode for this game is better.   

anyway I'd say don't bother to purchase this game unless it's in some bundle sale ( which is how I got it) and it comes down to under a dollar or less.

There is nothing Sinister about this game.

happy gaming~

author: {'steamid': '76561198133177124', 'num_games_owned': 920, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1489691286}
review:
Неплохая такая ироничная, но короткая история про вампиров в XXI веке. 

Сюжет просто как две копейки. Молодой человек узнал, что его возлюбленная на самом деле из древнего рода вампиров аристократов. И злой папаня кровосос не желает отдавать свою дочуру за простолюдина, да к тому же еще и человека. Но наш протеже не пальцем делан, а придумывает хитрый план как расположить к себе графа.

Сами вампиры представлены  классическом образе Брэма Стокера. Не страшные как Носферату, а такие все стильные, властные и с хорошими манерами. 
Действие происходит в одном городе, передвигаемся по карте, но заплутать не дадут, свободы так таковой нету. Классические мини игры и места поиска предметов, стандарт для такого жанра.

 Понравились отсылки к творчеству разных людей о вампирах и оборотнях. Всякие книги, брошюры, плакаты. Надо просто внимательней смотреть локации. Тот же постер "Дракула 1931" года, висит в кабинете у графа Мордога. 
Музыка соответствующая, мрачная с примесью органа и пианино. Юмор тоже неплохой. Типа каждый вампир после 500 лет, нуждается в личном психологе, хочет быть Голливудским актером и вообще забывает какая кровь на вкус. 

3D модельки персонажей сделаны очень добротно, я знаю игры такого жанра которые стоят дороже, но с отвратным 3D, или вообще просто статичные картинки без озвучки.

Вообще этой игре довольно сложно поставить палец вверх. Многочисленные баги, глюки, ошибки и прочие жуки не дают нормально поиграть. Создается впечатление что она попросту не доделана, брошена и не тестирована совсем. Был глюк когда не срабатывал поиск предметов, я думал сам что-то не так делаю. Провозился пол часа. Потом перезашел в игру и  о чудо! 

Короче поиграйте, ироничная, немного стебная и глюченная на всю башку игра. И да,не смотрите вампиро-пузиков перед сном.   
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DKqYkseiYLI

author: {'steamid': '76561198049572840', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1498632869}
review:
Adoro jogos com temáticas vampirescas, coloquei esse na minha wishlist e qdo estava em oferta comprei por um valor bem baixo.
Bom, eu fiquei desapontada nos primeiros minutos que joguei, não gostei do Menu, achei pobre, nada atrativo. Os HO são constantes, repetitivos e o som que a dica faz quando mostra o objeto é muito irritante, fui nas opções, coloquei tudo no volume minimo, mas o som da dica nao mutava. Puzzles muito simples, sem desafio.
E o que falar da historia? Estava até conseguindo engolir até eu ler que o Dracula queria ser um ator de Hollywood. Tipo, o que?!
Tentei, mas não deu.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996141785', 'num_games_owned': 911, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1489208546}
review: Um point and click dos mais sem graça, com uma história sem pé nem cabeça, com um fim mais ridiculo ainda... Houveram várias tentativas de piadas, mas algumas acho que só crianças da quinta série ou abaixo consegueria rir... Afinal, vampiros vestidos de telletubies não é lá algo muito... Risível? Pelo menos, não num humor adulto. Poderia recomendar para uma criança, já que a temática e os acontecimentos da narrativa são simples de entender e digerir para uma mentalidade mais simples, mas para quem gosta de jogos com histórias elaboradas (mesmo que clichê), passe longe desse jogo...

author: {'steamid': '76561198046065881', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1487920261}
review:
This game's graphics, gameplay, mini games, puzzles, all of it, not so great. It's also somewhat short in duration. But I thought the story and characters were actually pretty good. Both have an understated absurdity and humor to them I wasn't expecting. It was sort of like a B movie that's entire purpose is to make fun of B movies. But they don't ever hit you over the head with it. About 10 minutes into it I was thinking I was going to give it a thumbs down, but ended up enjoying it enough to it a mild recommend. Played well for me on Linux Mint 18 (Wine/PlayOnLinux).

PS I almost exclusively play offline. I typically only play online long enough for Steam to allow me to write a review. So Steam only shows that I played 0.1 hrs as of the time of this review, although I've played at least 1.5 hrs and have completed the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158196956', 'num_games_owned': 3737, 'num_reviews': 189, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1487380992}
review:
[b]Sinister City[/b] applies a mixture of classic horror themes with a great dosage of humour while playing as John who tries to save his bride.
I honestly thought this was going to be a true horror game, but I quickly realize I was going to have more laughs than scares! 
As an HO game, the story has to be fulfilled, and although it's simple, It was nice enough to entertain me for a second playthrough!

The game has a minor glitch, where -by some reason, the screen becomes white, as some objects suddenly are missing. I had to restart my game twice. But since [b]Sinister City[/b] was the first game from [u]Jetdogs Studios[/u] (at least here on Steam), I have to give them a break. other than that the game works as it should!
The HO's scenes could use a much higher resolution to increase the objects quality, this is a common problem with tons of other games as well. There is no other spot I can press in terms of negativity, everything else works fine in a cool vampiric atmosphere!
The puzzles are interesting and not exhaustive, some are challenging, but far from nightmares that exist to annoy you. The characters are interesting and their role well played considering the storyline is short and doesn't make much sense other than to amuse you.
I also enjoyed the scenarios and the city map, although I wish I could visit randomly more places just for the fun of it!

I enjoyed the storyline, even though it's short and looks silly at times and extremely stupid in a funny way, I think most people would enjoy a good laugh or two from a trip to [b]Sinister City[/b]!
5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198082502149', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1487707077}
review:
I know the story and references in this game are supposed to be tongue in cheek but I still didn't find it funny. I knew it was trying but I cringed because it didn't hit the mark. It might have pulled it off better if the game wasnt so poorly made.

The hidden object scenes were easy and overall the game was boring.

I got this game cheap in a bundle and still kinda which I didn't play it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999921146', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 423, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1486227984}
review:
Il y a une tentative réelle de sortir des sentiers battus dans le genre "Objets Cachés", notamment par la réalisation graphique. Mais l'ensemble ne m'a pas convaincu : les mini-jeux sont beaucoup trop faciles, les SOC sont de piètre qualité et en plus il faut clicker un peu au hasard pour découvrir les objets convoités car certains sont dissimulés (j'aime personnellement plutôt faire un click - un objet). J'ai du recharger le jeu au début à cause d'un bug (plus rien n'était accessible à l'écran dans le tableau du "rêve"). Du coup, il est rapide (2 heures sans trainer). Je ne vais pas le conseiller car il y a vraiment d'autres jeux d'Objets Cachés plus intéressant.

A la rigueur, il n'est vraiment pas cher mais prenez-le quand même à petit prix (je l'ai eu dans un Bundle en promotion).

author: {'steamid': '76561198211390004', 'num_games_owned': 1259, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1594645222}
review: Gerade noch einen Daumen nach Oben. Für zwischen durch macht "Sinister City" Spaß. Grafisch ist es aber völlig veraltet. Das Spiel punktet hier mehr durch die lustige Geschichte, anstatt durch die Wimmelbilder. Diese sind nämlich eher langweilig und simpel gestaltet. Oft muß man sich erst wild durch belanglosen Objekte klicken, um diese damit zu verschieben. Erst so gelangt man an die richtigen Objekte. Unterm Strich aber für das Geld noch OK.

author: {'steamid': '76561198187374231', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1524647598}
review: Игра отличная. Вот сколько я уже поиграла в игры такого жанра, где надо искать предметы, то прямо скажу, здесь понравились отличия. Где и что нужно искать, подствечивается, что облегчает прохождение. Сколько и что нужно собрать выводится на экран. Очень удобно сделано. Все-таки для меня главное сюжет, а он есть. Задачки в целом не сложные, что для меня важно, не люблю долго корпеть над одной задачкой. Очень понравилась Нина, нарисована очень красиво. Даже за свои 29 рублей она того стоит.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999786343', 'num_games_owned': 3499, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1485100121}
review:
Okay, i will try to keep it short. But, to be clear, it's 1€ game, don't expect high quality and unforgettable experience. And, mixed review are right, i wouldn't recommend this game, but still, i am giving it thumb up. Why? Just because :) I will explain it:

Pros (+):
+ 1€ game
+ nice story (i expected worse), but still nothing extra
+ puzzles are fine, but mostly just find hidden objects
+ funny jokes, lines and references (i dont't want to spoil anything, but, you know, the line: "Thanks, Mom, I'm going to kidnap Nina back!" is not something you can use everyday :D
+ around 2 hours to finish the story
+ achievements (you can get almost all of them in one play)

Cons (-):
- bugs (i found some, but they can be solved by restarting the game)
- not really game in which you have to use your brain (especially in story, just let it go, enjoy that simple story)
- some of hidden objects puzzles are quite dark and hard to find some stuff (and also, you have to move some objects, because there is another object under them)
- that's all, you can't nitpicking every single thing in 1€ game (sorry, but it is true - indie game for that price can't have the best graphics and overwhelming soundtrack)


There's one more thing. Logic in some puzzles. Like, you have to install some computer software, but you have to find 10 floppy disks in the office. Well, one is in trash, because, why not. You will have to prepare a tea for psychologist. But you have to find teabags. And they are everywhere. Literally. Her office is messy, same as she is. So many issues, not even Windows Vista had those. But as i said, relax :) Enjoy that story as it is. Again, i will mention the price, which is pretty nice for this game. I've played much worse hidden objects game, which were more expensive and even sh*ttier in story and bugs.

So, that's it. Mixed reviews, so this is obviously not the best game, if you are looking for hidden objects game. But if you are in a good mood, and have 1€ to spend, you can spend it here :) Trailer is showing everything what you need to see to decide, if you will buy this game. But it is worth for that good time it can bring :)

review: Don't get me wrong, it is a bad game, a really bad game, but due to its badness, it's highly amusing. If you want a proper HOG, don't buy this one (even if the price is tempting), but if you want to have fun laughing at a (rather short) game full with bugs and total lack of logic (even less logical than "normal" HOG), take the chance. It's definitely not a good game, but I had quite some fun with it, so I'll have to recommend it, even if not for common reasons.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143201050', 'num_games_owned': 2526, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482790665}
review: If you're acchv hunting it's not too bad. The game itself is boring and filled with awkward targeting. Including one spot where I kept having to exit to menu to get it to let me trigger an area for the Hidden object. It has lazy dialog and several spots where the wording was off.  The ending credit dialog is super cringy. For 50 cents 3 hours of play time isn't too bad. Jetdogs Studios has come so far in their devolpment of their games. You're much better off picking up any of thair newer games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087829022', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1450490727}
review:
Eu peguei esse jogo junto com um outro em uma promoção muito boa, o jogo em si não é mau eu diria que ele é bem divertido, de um ponto de vista zuado. o problema dele são os bugs que ele tem.

Como coisas sumirem da cena, texturas desaparecem, cenario aonde está o quebra cabeça sumir, e outras coisas que só atrapalham de forma brutal a mecanica do jogo e a jogabilidade.

Evite este jogo se não quer problemas, a história dele é divertida mas é pra lá de louca, não é algo que salve o jogo, na epoca que joguei não tinha salve em nuvem, isso é uma melhora, mas eu não me arrisco a comprar qualquer coisa cheia de bugs. Por sorte o outro jogo que veio junto com este que foi o motivo da compra foi muito satisfatorio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065842379', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1482242437}
review:
[h1]Review zu Sinister City[/h1]

Sinister City ist ein typisches Wimmelbild Spiel das erstmalig im Jahre 2011 veröffentlicht wurde.
Für damalige Verhältnisse wäre es vielleicht ein ganz gutes Spiel gewesen aber mit heutigen Standarts kann es nicht mithalten. Da hilft es auch nicht, dass es im Vollpreis für 0,99€ zu haben ist. Der erste Durchgang spielt sich zwar ganz lustig, aber nicht weil es so unterhaltsam ist, sondern weil es durch seine eher lieblose Umsetzung öfter schmunzeln lässt. Obwohl das Spiel nun schon einige Jahre auf dem Buckel hat, ist es nachwievor voll von Bugs, Übersetzungsfehlern und sogar komplett fehlenden Texturen! Auch die Bildschärfe ist für heutige Monitore nicht mehr optimal, es wirkt zum Teil verzerrt und sehr unscharf. Die Story selbst hat auch sehr wenig Tiefgang.

[b]Bugs etc. die mir aufgefallen sind:[/b]
[list]
[*]Im leichten Modus hatte ich in der Spiegelwelt in einer Wimmelbildszene einen Gegenstand den ich suchen musste, der eine komplett fehlende Textur hatte (weißer Bereich im Bild)
[*]Im fortgeschrittenen Modus hatte ich in der Spiegelwelt wie oben eine komplett fehlende Textur der normalen Szene die etwa ein 1/6 des Bildschirms ausmachte
[*]Im fortgeschrittenen Modus ebenfalls in der Spiegelwelt wurde es richtig zur nervtötenden Angelegenheit eine Wimmelbildszene abzuschließen. Jedesmal wann man den Bildschirm angeklickt hat, egal ob auf ein gesuchtes Objekt oder Fehlklick, hat man automatisch die Wimmelbildszene wieder verlassen. Danach habe ich das Spiel im 2. Durchgang abgebrochen.
[*]Teilweise starke Übersetzungsfehler bei gesuchten Objekten (zB.: Gesucht Palme - Gegangstand Hand). Das ist störend für 2 Erfolge: Bei einem muss man 5 Objekte innerhalb von 10 Sekunden finden und beim anderen muss man das Spiel abschließen ohne öfters als 3 Mal einen Hinweis bekommen zu haben. Weiters erschwert wird das ganze durch die sehr schechte Grafik.
[/list]

[b]FAZIT:[/b]
Ich habe das Spiel auf leicht einmal durchgespielt, für den fortgeschrittenen Modus hatte ich keine Geduld mehr, da mir vorkommt, dass die Bugs da noch mehr sind. Leider fehlen mir jetzt 3 Achievements für den 100% Erfolg. Das Spiel ist sehr kurz (2-3 Stunden) und lässt keine Spannung aufkommen, wie bei manchen anderen Vertretern in dem Genre. Auch wenn das Spiel um 0,99€ und im Sale für ein paar Cents zu haben ist, ist es kein Spiel das man nun unbedingt besitzen muss. Auch für Erfolgsjäger ist es eher eine ärgerliche Angelegenheit, da durch die ganzen Bugs das ganze noch erschwert wird. Ich rate zu anderen Titeln in dem Genre, die kosten zwar etwas mehr aber man bekommt auch ein besseres Produkt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198324925228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1482439653}
review:
This game is unplayable. I've restarted it twice to find that it will randomly disable the mouse or necessary items won't be aknowledged no matter how much you click on them. The hint button will circle the thing, but no matter how many times you click on it, around it or near it, it won't acknowledge it. It's not even always in the same place. I made it past the hotel the first time to get to the castle grounds and it wouldn't find the object. I had to restart and this time didn't get even half as far.
Also there is no cursor change when you're in the right place and you have no idea of what areas you need to click on (i.e no eyeball for things you can look at etc) It's literally a case of clicking randomly. Also it doesn't leave a HO scene when you've found everything which means that you could be searching an area to find the items are scattered across several.

It's just not user friendly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052965201', 'num_games_owned': 1046, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1484418123}
review:
Game Mechanics:
The game uses extremely simple puzzle mechanics, easy as pie hidden-object-scenes (with the exception of items hidden behind interactables, which are not indicated in any way) and the overarching collectibles you need to progress the story (which can be found spread across multiple hidden-object-scenes and, as well as hidden behind the non-indicated interactables). Seriously, the game's mechanics are more boring than challenging.

Plot:
What seemed, at the onset, to be a tale of a man rescuing his beloved fiancée from a wicked vampire, quickly plummeted into the lowest depths of Hollywoodesque sitcom. Seriously, the only real joke in this game is the fact that it got published.

Presentation:
The graphis are grainy and outdated, the entire thing gives instructions as if it were on a tablet and the character models feel wonky and out of place (possibly because they seem to be able to magically clip through buildings).

Completion:
In a single run you COULD get every achievement... but I recommend you don't get any of them instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561198227942340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1481808541}
review:
One of the worst HO games I've ever played..
Story? "Hello, I don't know you at all and I see you only want to rent a room in my hotel, but let me hipnotize and send you to a different dimension in exchange for a room key. Glad you're ok with that." I don't think I need to add more...
Gameplay? Seems, well, random, but not "let them think a little" random. It is "I don't know what I'm doing, I always wanted to be a hair band designer" random. And annoying, very much.
Music? Let me use the word of the day to describe it - annoying. After 20 minutes into the game you suddenly realize the construction noise from the site outside your window is like a touch of an angel to your traumatized ears.
I regret every minute I've spend playing it. Counting blades of grass in the backyard is way more appealing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197973059038', 'num_games_owned': 2548, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 477, 'last_played': 1480171075}
review:
I got this game through a giveaway group. Glad I didn't pay for it.

It feels a very rough, low budget title. The kind with basic voice acting, graphics that can make you cring,
and other things that cry cheap.

Some of these titles can have a decent plot, but the plot is borderline bizzare, not interesting and short.
The puzzles are mostly basic and sometimes not very clear. The HO scenes are basic and require some 
extra clicks. Somehow I didn't get an achievement i definitely think i deserve.
They help you get objects, but there's so much wandering about for additional objects, it makes you
feel as if they wanted some fillers to lengthen the game.

On the pro side - It is short. I thought whether I should stop playing as i did feel I'm wasting my time, but i was
hoping the end was near, and it was. luckily.

So - If you are really bored or must do every HOPA you see - go for it.
Otherwise - There are definitely much better ones.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037157856', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1474699023}
review:
This game is one of the most hilarious point-and-click games I've ever played. It conjures up Ed Wood at his worst (that is, best). As a send-up to to B-movies, I can't find a better game. 

And the graphics couldn't be better. By better, I don't mean you'll mistake this game for Crysis. I mean, it's got all the charm of a cheap budget title -- which it is, but with a wink and a nod. All-the-more self-aware.

Regarding the voice acting, it reminds me of Castlevania Symphony of the Night at is worst moments. And so if you're a fan of all the awkward conversations in that game, you'll think this one is a hoot.

The drawbacks are that this game is short and the puzzles easy. Even when you're stuck -- which you won't be often -- the game is more than happy to give you a hint that practically solves the puzzle.

But don't buy this game for the gameplay. But it for the over-the-top plot, and the hilarious satire.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113499259', 'num_games_owned': 252, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1473770730}
review:
Купил это игру ради карточек, когда зашел заметил русский язык. Сам не понимая того - полностью прошел её. Игра лёгкая максимум на 2 часа, при игре был один баг, когда перезашел в игру он пропал. Вобщем "кликер" сходи туда, принси "это" вполне неплохой, не заметил как 2 часа прошло. 

Плюсы:
+ Купил за 3 рубля, выбил карточек на 11 рублей
+ Лёгкие достижения
+ Вроде есть какой то сюжет )

Минусы: 
Нет

Да и для игры за 3 рубля впринципе минусов быть не может ))))
