author: {'steamid': '76561198016437391', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1449897429}
review:
I'm not the biggest fan of hidden object games in general, but I think even die-hard fans wouldn't enjoy this one.

The hidden object sections were not great. The game progression was terrible. You basically work within a section of three areas, then advance to a new section. There are no long-term puzzles. The story is goofy, but poorly written.

The one bright spot were the non-HO puzzles. They were varied and interesting.

Even on sale, I can't recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129837089', 'num_games_owned': 549, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1449844791}
review:
Bei Sinister City handelt es sich um ein Wimmelbild Spiel in dem es mehr Bugs als Wimmelbilder gibt.
Beispielsweise kann man plötzlich nichts mehr anklicken oder wird nach jedem Klick aus dem Wimmelbild geworfen.
Die Synchro ist zusammen mit der Übersetzung noch das gruseligste an dem Spiel, trotz Vampir Setting.
Der Soundtrack ist nervig und die Handlung einfach nur lächerlich inszeniert.  1/10 ( den einen Punkt gibts auch nur für die Sammelkarten)

author: {'steamid': '76561198012362002', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1449642814}
review:
[quote=Wasterbull] Reseña en español[/quote]

[i]Un vampiro quiere ser un actor... Suena cursi, no? Para que sea más cursi, obliga a que su hija se case con un actor.[/i]

[h1] HISTORIA	- 5/10[/h1]
John y su novia Nina es secuestrada pero no sabe la verdadera razón del por qué es secuestrada y aún así sale en su búsqueda para hallar a su amada. Al final es bastante cursi.

[h1] GAMEPLAY - 7/10[/h1]
Un juego de puzzle, Point & Click bastante sencillo y nada difícil, el gameplay es algo raro pero igual termina siendo decente, habrá pocas veces unos bugs, si eso pasa; salir del juego e iniciar nuevamente, podrás continuar y no pierdes nada, Replay Value algo pobre.

[h1] GRÁFICA - 7/10[/h1]
Decente y no tengo mucho que decir.

[h1] MÚSICA - 0/10[/h1]
Poner silencio y escuchar otra cosa, el del juego me pudre.


[h1] OPINIÓN SOBRE EL VIDEOJUEGO	[/h1]
Para ser honesto, es un juego que pudo mejorar más pero como sea termino siendo decente y totalmente corto.

[h1] PRO +[/h1]
[list]
    [*]17 logros fáciles de completar
    [*]3 Cromos y tienen valor, no pierdes nada.
    [*]Un Point & Click decente.
[/list]

[h1]CONTRA -[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Gráfica
    [*]Historia algo cursi
    [*]Música bastante deprimente que puse mute y escuchar otra cosa.
    [*]Si eligen Modo Avanzado y no gastan más de 3 veces para hallar pistas; dura 2 horas y media, en mi caso fue 4 porque jugué dos veces, recomiendo Modo Avanzado para facilitar los logros.
[/list]

[code] Aún así recomiendo que compren o reciban una Key de manera gratuita, completen el juego al 100% por si quieres aumentar cantidad de juegos completados. [/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2563, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 169, 'last_played': 1458519046}
review:
"Sinister City" ist ein kurzes Wimmelbildspiel. Und ein sehr schwaches obendrein.

Die Story ist flunderflach: Freundin wird von Vampir entführt. Wir müssen sie retten, auch wenn unser Drang dazu eher gering sein mag. Versuche des Games, sich selbst zu ironisieren, scheitern kläglich.

Die Grafik ist schwach, teils peinlich. Insbesondere die Gesichtszüge und Animationen der Protagonisten laden zum Lachen ein.

Der Vertonung ist schlichtweg unterirdisch. Würde man die Sprecher als Laien bezeichnen, es wäre eine Beleidigung für jeden Laien. 

Die Rätsel sind zwar an sich sehr einfach, meist aber kryptisch und unlogisch. So manchesmal weiß man nicht so recht, wo es eigentlich weitergeht.
 
Aber das Schlimmste: an allen Ecken und Enden merkt man dem Game seine Touch-Screen-Herkunft an. Es wirkt alles wie eine unausgegorene, schnell hingeschluderte Portierung.

Nach zwei Stunden ist das Ganze - erfreulicherweise - vorbei.

[h1]Wertung:[/h1]
3/10 Atmosphäre
2/10 Grafik
1/10 Sound
3/10 Spielmechanik
3/10 Balancing
2/10 Story 
3/10 Spielspass

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Nur für Hardcore-Wimmelbildspiel-Fans mit Leidensfähigkeit oder Trash-Liebhaber geeignet. 

[h1][b]3/10 Gesamtwertung

author: {'steamid': '76561198200119165', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1450613550}
review:
Yes, this game may be riddled with bugs left and right, and everyone's complaining about how the crazy amount of bugs have ruined or stunted their gameplay (at some point, it did for me too), but once we learn how to get over the bugs, it turned out to be actually a pretty decent game. The puzzles are very simple and the hidden objects aren't that hard at all, good for a casual play, and I suppose the humor of the story isn't for everyone, but it really hit the spot for me! Great twist in story and merging of stereotypical realms to make it not so stereotypical xD

If you're the type who prefers quality graphics and smooth gameplay with challenging puzzles, then this game may disappoint you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018625414', 'num_games_owned': 3829, 'num_reviews': 1257, 'playtime_forever': 626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 626, 'last_played': 1449532661}
review:
クリアまでプレイしたのでレビューします

日本語対応、トレカあり、実績あり
ストーリーは吸血鬼物…と思ってファンタジーな物を思い浮かべると
かなりの肩透かしを食らいます（食らいました）

・良かった所
OPロゴの犬がかわいいよ
ヒントがすぐ光るのでそっちに行けば迷わず安心

・良くなかった所
アイテムを探す所が解りづらい
探しものパズルが終わっても収集すべきアイテムを見つけてないと
次のステップに行かないので（効果音とか無い）気が付かないで
ずーっとその画面を見てたりすることになったりする
ストーリーに期待してはいけない（戒め）
たまに捜し物アイテムで間違い翻訳が炸裂

パッケージから感じる雰囲気とは真逆の方へストーリー展開するので
色々割りきった方がいいのかな・・・という気持ちになりながらプレイしました
アイテム探しがいつ終わっているのかが判別つきにくいのが難点です
とはいえ、プレイ出来ないレベルのゲームではないです
セールで過去に￥9だったこともあるので
そのあたりの価格だったらやってみてもいいんではないでしょうか

ツッコミどころは満載なのでセール中なら買ってもいいんじゃないでしょうか


追記　2015/12/8

全実績解除しました、注意点が一つ
実績全解除をする場合「ダイアログを飛ばさない」がネックになって来ます
会話（ボイス中）途中でクリックすると飛ばしたとみなされてしまうので注意が必要です。
飛ばせという罠のように会話ログ下に枠外には「スキップ」という文字が常にありますので
目指す方は会話をよく聞いてゲームを進めてください

Steam Curatorでも紹介しました→3D酔いでもゲームがしたいhttps://store.steampowered.com/curator/41056472/

author: {'steamid': '76561198119835199', 'num_games_owned': 616, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1504858045}
review:
よくあるHidden Objectのゲームだと思いセールにて購入しました。
ストーリーはコメディ寄りに近いものです。

Hidden Objectというよりは、お使いのためのポイント＆クリックの印象が強いです。
「～～するために～～を探して」みたいなものが何度も出てきてテンポが悪いような気もしますし
誤訳と思われるものも、ちょっと多めな気がして地味に厳しいです。

通常価格で購入はやめておいたほうがいいでしょう。微妙に余ってるし暇つぶし程度に買うのがいいでしょう

author: {'steamid': '76561198158739744', 'num_games_owned': 698, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1471840772}
review:
在约翰悬浮在半空中走入旅馆的时候，我本就应该明白，这个游戏的剧情、设计、画面、关卡，整个，都是飞起的。

优点：
· 有简体中文
· 折扣期Jetdogs Adventure Pack - Volume 1 仅一元，有卡
· 玩过这个游戏后会让你对游戏包内的另一款游戏好感大增

缺点：
· 极糟的3D画面
· 傻傻的配乐
· 让人哭笑不得的剧情
· 所有的NPC都有一大堆东西要主角找，找东西找多了很烦躁好嘛！！！！何况还是个机翻

完成这个游戏的时候，看着男主角一脸邪魅摸着脖子自以为性感的笑了，我哭了，我哭我自己为什么要花时间来玩它，受折磨，这个世界上明明有那么多好玩的游戏，免费的付费的，玩什么不好啊我....就算这个游戏很便宜，就算这个游戏有卡，但让我给这个好评真不如让吸血鬼咬死算了......(-_＼)

********************************************

一年后回顾的更新：

回顾时发现这玩意居然更新了免费DLC，原声？原声？原声？这游戏居然还更新原声？

一共十首曲目，总长度17分钟，不幸的是真的没有一首值得收藏的曲子，精神污染的倒是有几个，看到这条评测的同志们，你们可以省却下载的功夫了，虽然只有几十MB也省掉吧......(-_＼)

author: {'steamid': '76561198046407276', 'num_games_owned': 6090, 'num_reviews': 233, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1437825382}
review:
[h1]Vampires, unintended funnyness, and some hidden objects[/h1]

The game is actually not a good HOG, if you run over it, please don't even mind to turn around and pick it up. It will bite you in your face and make you cry a lot...

The story is painful, to say the least, all superficially set up, a story about vampires, yes... but a real stupid one. It's funny in a very naive way, and the [i]weird[/i] funnyness does set the game into the right clownery. If you want a square and fair, Hidden Object Game, please look elsewhere... this is... ugh!

[b]Pros:[/b][list][*]Graphics are on the ok side, but that's about all.[/list]

[b]Cons:[/b][list][*]Tries too much to be funny, or is too funny unintended... I don't know and I won't bother.[*]The game is so stereotypical, that it does cause physical pain... I am still fighting back the headaches.[*]Puns, puns, puns... the devs should have learned, that sometimes less is more.[/list]

[h1]Not Recommended[/h1]

This hidden object is neither a hidden gem, nor is it a pearl that is cast to me... It's plain painful to play the game, and you can take it only in small doses, or it will make you go mad. 

The game has a babyish attitude around the topic and it's story. The characters are very, very shallow to say the least.

If you want to play a HOG, don't put this on your choice list, there are a lot of games better suited!

review: Отличный квест, сюжет интересный, Да и позитивный в общем. Советую!

review: The dialogue is so bad you'd almost think it was done on purpose. The story is weakly done but only tolerable because the dialogue's medicrity makes it utterly laughable. On the upside, even the most annoying puzzle is easy enough to get past. If you buy it on sale, it's an amusing way to kill a few hours if you want a find the crap game that isn't just staring at hidden object puzzles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134161766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1520086134}
review:
É jogável...

A história em si é bem triste, por ser a realidade de muitos, claro que não numa versão vampírica !
Sabemos que até hoje acontecem esses casamentos arranjados, e pior e mais comum, filhos seguindo sonhos dos pais. 

Acho uma palhaçada o Jão querendo salvar a Nina e nego ficar pedindo pra ele arrumar ponte, câmera, fazer chá. WTF mano o cara é o que ?! Pior que ele faz... 

O jogo é bem interativo, os "quebra-cabeças" são bons e realmente deve se parar pra pensar pra conseguir fazer alguns destes. A tradução do português é horrível, tanto nos diálogos quanto na escolha de itens. Eu nem vou falar de gráficos ! 

Eu comprei pra platinar as conquistas, e porque acho legal esse estilo de game. 
Enfim, eu joguei e gostei, claro que poderia ser melhor em diversos aspéctos, mas...

author: {'steamid': '76561198074204472', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1448790293}
review:
Just by looking at the reviews for this game, I knew I was in for a cringeworthy title. Everything in this game was cringy, but I still enjoyed it. It's like a Bollywood movie, complete with bad acting and scenery, but it's part of the joke. Plus, puzzles and mini games. 

You play as John, who is searching for his bride Nina, who is being held captive by her father Count Orlock. You must solve puzzles and unlock the path to free her and complet Orlock's wish: to become a famous Hollywood actor. Not much more can be said about that, pretty much tells it's own story right there.

Aside from the acting, I enjoyed the puzzles because some actually were challenging. 

P.S. How is Ipkis married?

author: {'steamid': '76561198105564790', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1448536167}
review: Очень... Необычная игра. Чисто случайно наткнулась на нее, когда мой внутренний еврей листал страницы со скидками. Прошла игру за два часа (пропустила пару загадок, увы, для некоторых из них я оказалась слишком глупой D:), но однозначно, игра мне понравилась, даже не смотря на некоторые минусы, типа багов или клишированного сюжета. У нее есть свой определеный шик и прекрасный юмор. Нина и жена Графа полюбились сразу, очень милые персонажи. А концовка в виде сцен снимаемого фильма оказалась даже неожиданной) Не пожалеете, если купите, тем более, не такая уж большая цена за удовольствие)

author: {'steamid': '76561198027776061', 'num_games_owned': 1626, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1448047989}
review: Sinister City is some incoherent mumbo-jumbo concerning show business vampires.  Short and easy but the story is poorly translated garbage and the gameplay is a little clunky for a hidden object game.  One of the lesser hidden object adventures.

author: {'steamid': '76561198156158654', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1448737678}
review: Игра очень интересная, окупает свою стоимость т.е 3 рубля (cкидка). Быстро проходиться, не напрягает. Вообще игры где нужно найти предметы или разгадать загадки, мне очень нравятся. Sinister City имеет некоторые баги, но игра очень старая и это ей простительно, даже спустя столько времени с её выхода, в неё можно ещё играть. У компании выпустившей эту игру, есть ещё подобные игры и они тоже стоят очень дешево и так же очень интересны. Ещё хороший плюс от игры это карточки, которые окупают стоимость игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168114460', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1448671369}
review:
What can I say, played one HOG played them all. It's a fun waste of time if your brain is looking for something to do but hardly anything groundbreaking or exciteing. The puzzles are fairly easy once you figure out what they want you to do and the only hard part seemed to be finding them, even in easy mode where things are suposed to tell you where to look I sometimes found myself randomly clicking around the room till I found something. Once you know where to click and what to look for odds are you'll beat it in an hour.

The plot is goofy and the overdramatic dialogue is worthy of a saturday morning cartoon but I think that was the actual intent this time, like the developers knew no one actualy takes the story part of a HOG seriously and decided to just have fun with it. While good for a laugh or two it's hardly engaging or suspenseful but considering it's dirt cheep you can't really expect Shakespeare.

Taken for what it is, a cheep brain teaser with a B-movie plot then it's worth playing if only to score some easy acheaves or take a break from shooting zombies, but if your looking for something more serious I'd give this a pass.

author: {'steamid': '76561198193227553', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1448475214}
review:
Such a fun and cooky point and click game!  I read some of the comments and was worried with gamers saying it wasn't starting and achievements were not unlocking... however, it went smoothly for me.  You have wonderfully cheezy voice acting and puzzles that are not terribly difficult.  This is a fun four hour romp and well worth the price of admission.

Note: I would start the game on the Advance difficulty, the game does not penalize you (in other words... achievements are not missed) for clicking away if you are somewhat lost.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166510048', 'num_games_owned': 160, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1448467905}
review:
И вот я прошел эту, довольно интересную игру в жанре "Инди". Эта игра о мире вапиров, где живут как ни странно вампиры.
В этой игре разработчики нам раскрывают историю о том, как могущественный злодей-вампир похищает невесту главного героя, а тому в свое время нужно её "вырвать из лап" этого злодея.
[u]Отметим плюсы данной игры:[/u]
 + Хороший, но банальный сюжет, местами смешной.
 + Перевод на многие языки мира.
 + Бесплатный саундтрек.
 + Около 50 мест, для поиска предметов.
 + Около 15 мини игр.
[u]Минусы:[/u]
- Не очень хорошая графика.

Покупал за 2 рубля по скидке 98-99%. Сюжет интересный, в некоторых местах смешной, но и банальный. Выбил карточки. Графика, конечно, хромает. Прошел всю игру на легком уровне сложности за 2.8 часа. Планирую перепройти на сложном, для получения "Идеальной игры".

Рекомендую, 9/10 вампиров! Любителям поинткликеров советую приобрести и пройти.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=412611650

author: {'steamid': '76561198056281817', 'num_games_owned': 262, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 612, 'last_played': 1448300875}

author: {'steamid': '76561198017309563', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1447102092}
review:
A search & find objects game. Can pretty much find these for free on the nets.. bought it for less then 20 cents.. if it was worth the money? sure, it kept me entertained for longer than anything else of 20 cents would :P This game contains a storyline.. which is just.. weird and stupid.. Kind vampires? Reminded me of twilight, that bad. xD

Overall; if you enjoy the search and find objects in a "picture", you'll enjoy this game. If you dont.. then you wont. xD As you surely dont want to play it for the storyline.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086985944', 'num_games_owned': 555, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1448358228}
review:
[h1][i]-Нина, это действительно ты? Или видение? -Это действительно я. Прекращай свои поиски, не ищи меня. Прости, что не сказала правду.[/i][/h1]

Что сказать о игре. В кратце, это простая, типичная point-&-click игрушка. Геймплей состоит на 70% из поиска предметов на экране. Остальные проценты приходятся на различные мини-игры (которых приличное количество). Если б не сюжет, игра бы возможно надоела в первый час. Так хоть есть диалоги и крохотный, но все же забавный сюжетик.

Своей цены игры бесспорно стоит. При всем при том, что я брал ее за 7 рублей, насколько я помню. Для отдыха игра в самый раз. А приятная музыка на заднем фоне создаст еще больший расслабон.

P.S Игра, которая может пополнить ваше кол-во идеальных игр :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198013485259', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1448142322}
review:
I give this game points for charm because I liked its outrageous story line and campy quality, though a lot of the humor was labored. My favorite line was Ms. Seward's: "Now, goodbye forever, you handsome manifestation of my childhood complexes!" I agree with her. The voice acting was fine, except for Ipkis, who was overdone. It was hard to believe he was star material.

This game should be called "Fetch Quest City"; and many of those quests were silly or illogical. A bunch of lazy characters waiting around for a needy fool to show up and do their work for them. The innkeeper was particularly inept at keeping track of stuff in his own establishment. Also, some of the HOG scenes closed after every click, requiring a lot of unnecessary work because I had to reopen those scenes and click, and reopen those scenes and click again, ad nauseum. Upon replay, I discovered that by exiting to the Main Menu and clicking on Continue, that problem was resolved.

The game has no help system to explain how the game saves. Since exiting to the Main Menu and clicking on Continue resulted in a "loading" message, I figured that it was a way to force the game to save, which was handy for working around the bugs. I saved a lot to avoid problems.

I have two issues with the game's graphics. The first problem was the screen aspect ratio. It was stretched side-to-side; so everything was wide, which was especially noticeable with circular objects like wheels and gears and the two globes on the HUD at the bottom of the screen. It looked like the game was designed for a standard monitor (4:3 ratio). I tried the only option available—Window mode—but the window was the same wide-screen ratio and everything was still distorted. And the window could not be resized to reduce the distortion. My nVidia graphics card is incredibly capable of handling aspect rations, but this game did not cooperate.

The second graphic problem involved HOG scenes and puzzles. Parts of the screen were blank. Meaning: solid white. In the case of the HOGs, I was able to able to access the Main Menu via the HUD and resolve the problem as described above. When I clicked on Continue and returned to the game, the visual problem was solved. However, there is no HUD available in the puzzle screens; so, there is no way to work around the problem, except to cancel the game via ALT+CTRL+DELETE. I was unable to solve one of the puzzles because of this problem and had to skip the puzzle; so, I didn't earn the Enigmatist achievement. Upon replay, I exited to the Main Menu prior to the puzzle and clicked Continue to fix the graphic issue and earned the achievement.

"Sinister City" was cute and fun, but clunky. I'm surprised that such a recent release has these problems.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062448641', 'num_games_owned': 2313, 'num_reviews': 305, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1448137567}
review:
Sinister City - городок, размером с один квартал моего города (поверьте, это очень мало), населенный вампирами и людьми в вампир знает каких пропорциях (простите за тавтологический каламбур). И у нас есть одна ночь на то, чтобы вернуть оттуда свою ненаглядную. Какие тайны скрывает этот городок?

В игре достаточно немало отсылок к поп-культуре и нашей жизни вообще. Взять хотя бы местного телеведущего-вампира детской передачи в образе телепузика-вампира. Или - "Психологию для чайников", в стандартной черно-желтой обложке. Или - вечный поиск порядка в нашем таком насыщенном хаосом предметов мире...

Конечно, стандартный от JetDogs пойнт-энд-клик, завязанный на поиске предметов, со слегка мистическим (в этот раз  - даже забавным) сюжетом про спасение своей возлюбленной. С постоянно шаблонными фразами и предложениями типа "Поищи болты и кулеры, чтобы починить вентилятор, то бишь кондиционер, а то жарко что-то, или я с тобой не разговариваю!". В отличие от других игр данного стиля, предметы находятся быстро и легко, паззлов мало, игру можно пройти в ускоренном темпе примерно за час (не смотрите на мое время в игре - я сначала карточки выбивал, потому дальше стартового меню не заходил). Сюжет, как я уже говорил, в игре забавный, и много наивного в нем - ох уж эта детская мечта 500-летнего вампира стать актером или за 6-7 монеток "взять" такое же количество книг по психологии! А чего стоит доверительное отношение любого персонажа, со спокойной душой позволяющего покопаться в своих вещах, не боясь за их сохранность и неукраденность...

Но это всего лишь придирки. Не смотря ни на что, Sinister City оказалась игрой довольно позитивной и, хоть не хватает с неба звезд (простите за шаблонную фразу), является продуктом неплохим. А что? Баги не фатальные, ачивки легкие, юмор не туалетный, время прохождения короткое. Игра в духе "прошел-удалил", но с остатком в виде легкой улыбки.

[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/32313063/] Куратор	[/url]

Ставьте лайк, подписывайтесь на кураторскую страничку и ищите новое в играх!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198199722773', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1477970354}
review:
Пазлы до неприличия лёгкие, большинство заданий просто одинаковые, сюжетные обоснования для заданий нелепые. Очевидно, создатели задумали игру-комедию про вампиров, но вышло не смешно, а скучно. Пара забавных моментов за всю игру не в счёт. Всё прохождение - 3 часа вместе с походами за провизией.
Из хорошего - возможность подкрепить словарный запас, играя на английском, например, и ища предметы по английским названиям. Ну и цена, которая точно порадует охотников за карточками. 
Есть "мышкотыки" и позабористей, причём этого же самого разработчика. Лично мне игра досталась в нагрузку к сборнику, но покупать её специально, отдельно не стал бы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115199502', 'num_games_owned': 380, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1448055306}
review:
Ich habe dieses Spiel für 9 Cent gekauft während des Halloween-Sales und diese sind das Spiel hundertprozentig auch wert. Man hat nette Rätsel, einige nette witzige Szenen und eine für ein Spiel dieses Preiskalibers ordentliche Story. 
Leider hat man es nach gut 3 Stunden auch komplett durch.
Dennoch ist es für mich lohnenswert gewesen, dieses Spiel zu kaufen. Nicht nur, weil man bei 9 Cent nichts falsch machen kann, sondern auch, weil man das Geld durch die Sammelkarten auch direkt wieder drin hat bzw. 100XP gefarmed hat :D.
Die 99 Cent Normalpreis wären es für mich auch wert gewesen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113209031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 223, 'playtime_forever': 283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 283, 'last_played': 1446636993}
review:
[table]
    [tr]
        [th][h1]Sinister City[/h1][/th]
   [/tr]
[/table]

[h1]Вступление[/h1]
[i]Вообще, я любитель вселенной о вампирах. К тому же, если это связано с загадками или тайнами, от которых просто не хочеться стоять на месте. И не смотря на смешанные отзывы об игре, я вижу перед собой, довольно неплохой квест о вампирах. Да, в игре встречалось пару багов и что теперь, плакать? Описывая, что игра этим плохая и ставить палец вниз? Не бывает идеальных игр. Так что ставить игре минус из-за пару багов это полный бред. [/i]


[h1]Об игре[/h1]
[i]О квесте как всегда, можно сказать пару слов:
[list]
[*]Простенький сюжет
[*]Поиск предметов
[*]Головоломки
[/list]
В данном квесте мы возьмем роль парня, по имени Джон, у которого внезапно пропадает девушка и разумеется мы пойдем на всё, чтобы найти и спасти свою любовь.
На протяжении всей игры мы будем искать предметы и разгадывать не сложные головоломки, загадки. 
 
Это маленькое, но незабываемое приключение.[/i]

[table]
    [tr]
        [th][b]Квест "Sinister City" --- 7/10[/b][/th]
   [/tr]
[/table]

author: {'steamid': '76561198005701579', 'num_games_owned': 2413, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1448027056}
review:
Mediocre hidden-object game. 
+ Some nice puzzles.
+ The sound is ok and the graphics are good, too, but nothing special.

+/- The story is so rediculous that can get funny at times. 

- The voice-overs are horrible, though I kind of liked the director's voice.
- Small - it took me about 2.30 hours to complete - but this could be a thing for some.
- Quite a lot of bugs and they can actually make the game easier since, for example, some h/o scenes were totally white exept for the places that the items I needed to find were. 

For the 1€ it asks, it can be an idea for h/o fans that don't have anything else to play...

author: {'steamid': '76561198259875104', 'num_games_owned': 58, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1447952464}
review:
Было лень самим писать вот все самое самое собрал:

Sinister City это хороший квест в духе поинт клик. Интересные загадки и поиск предметов. Игра проходится за 3 часа и не успевает надоедать. По ходу игры мы можем получить 100 % ачивок , так как их получаем по ходу игры. На скидках игра стоила всего лишь 2 рубля, и мы можем окупить ее карточками. Советую поиграть :)

Скажу вам так, друзья дорогие...
Вы, зажрались!
Вас не устраивает игра, которая стоит 2 рубля, при этом вы получаете выгоду в размере карточек.
Видно, что разработчик старался, так поддержите его!
Скажу так... в игре есть казусы и неловкие, так скажем, моменты, но это не делает игру плохой.

Сегодня днём зашёл в раздел "Скидки" и решил, а почему бы мне не купить игру - SINISTER CITY. 

Начну сегодня я нестандартно - С МИНУСОВ: 

1) Стандартный сюжет. Ну это классика жанра, пропал любимый человек - ты пойдёшь на край света (в нашем случае в город Sinister)
2) Баги. Я встретил парочку багов, но всё же.
Ну впринципе, для меня это всё из минусов, перейдём к плюсам: 
1) Модели пресонажей. В этой игре они сделаны превосходно.
2) Цена. Цена в 29 рублей (я купил её за 2 РУБЛЯ) для такой игры (тем более она с карточками) - это отлично.
На этом у меня всё, если Вы любите игры в жанре Point&Click или просто хотите пополнить свою коллекцию - берите :) 
Если Вам понравился мой обзор, пожалуйста не скупитесь и поставьте лайк :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198161773201', 'num_games_owned': 1509, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1448024061}
review:
I think that the people who didn't recommend this game clearly missed the game entirely.

It's a quick game, done in 3 hours (plus a few more: now that I have to go find a few achievements that i missed).

Story is hilarious, the graphics and voice acting fit perfectly together, and the art is good. Great game that had me laughing and ended up turning the night into a family night as we all played the game together.

The object finding side isn't repetitive, and the mini-puzzles are fun and challenging, but not too challenging. 
The steam achievements and cards round out the rest perfectly. 

Don't take the game too seriously, it wasn't meant to be.

review: It seems like the creators of this game couldn't quite decide what kind of game they wanted to make.  After making it all the way to the end, I'm pretty sure they made it on a dare.  The voice acting isn't terrible, but I haven't seen writing this bad since they cancelled the American remake of Coupling.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144895555', 'num_games_owned': 483, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1447930744}
review:
Гра сподобалась, щось в ній є що змогло зацікавити. Простий, хороший квест, приємна музика, атмосфера, навіть без знань англійської мови все зрозуміло. Інколи зустрічаються баги, 4 рази починав гру з початку тому, що в цьому тому чи іншому місці не міг взяти квестовий предмет, але тим не менше це не помішало пройти гру до кінця. 
В колекцію обовязково, рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141158731', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1447720325}
review:
Классный квест, конечно - банальная история, но увлекает.

Плюсы:
• Приятная графика. Даже не побоюсь сказать красивая. Достаточно качественные текстурки.
• Геймплей. Когда начал искать предметы - почувствовал дуновение 2007 года. 
• Цена. Взял по скидке за что-то около 15 центов, так что к прохождению обязательно за такую-то цену! 

Минусы:
Иногда вылезают баги, но они элементарно лечатся выходом в гл. меню и обратно в игру. Благо занимает это действие секунд 10 максимум.

8/10 похищенных невест.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115673548', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 229, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1447797635}
review:
[h1]モノ探しメインのポイント&クリック[/h1]

謎解き要素はかなり少なく
ひたすらモノ探しを繰り返す部分が目立ちます。
ヒント機能はありますが出来が悪く
「モノ探し画面のアイテムを光らせる」だけなので
「どうすればモノ探しの場所に行けるのかわからない」まま詰む可能性があると思います。
マウスアイコンを使ったガイドは無しなので、部屋の探索も苦労します。

ところどころジョーク（？）があってこの手のゲームでは珍しく大笑いしました。
ただ、どこまで本気なのかよくわからないストーリーで
シリアスでもなければコミカルでもない変な雰囲気になってます。

日本語対応ですが誤訳が多数あります。
弓→蝶ネクタイ、アザラシ→スタンプ、ヤシ→手

author: {'steamid': '76561197993334025', 'num_games_owned': 1230, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1447756944}
review:
セールで9円で開発しておいてなんですがオススメできません。

[h1]Hidden Objectものとしては致命的なミス[/h1]
他のHidden Objectものと同じくゴチャゴチャした画面から必要なものを探すのがメインのゲームですが、書かれている日本語と実際に探すものが違うケースが2シーンに1つくらいの割合で見られました。
翻訳ミスなのか元のゲームがいけないのかわかりませんが、この種のゲームではやってはいけないミスだと思います。

[h1]いつ探索が終わったかわからないシステム[/h1]
他のゲームでは必要なものが終わったら一旦探索モードは終了しアイテムが得られるというシステムが一般的ですが、このゲームではそれとは別に進行に必須なアイテムを探すことを求められます。また必須アイテムはモノの陰に隠れていることもあり、動かせるか動かせないかはクリックしてみるまでわかりません。他のゲームではマウスオーバーでカーソルが変わるなどの工夫がありますが、このゲームでは変わりません。
そのためいつ探索を終えればいいのかがわかりにくい。それを補うためにカジュアルモードでは、行くべき場所へのヒントが（ヒントボタンを押さなくても）出てきますが、本末転倒感があります。

[h1]その他[/h1]
主人公と婚約者が婚約した経緯、吸血鬼と人間の関係、この世界での「映画監督」の位置づけがよくわかりません。ギャグなのかなんなのか…こまけぇことはいいんだよ、って感じのストーリーですがなんかのパロディなんでしょうか…
褒められるのはトレカ対応でセール時に買えば元が取り返せるって点だけかと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198092696413', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1447786281}
review: As a season veteran at Sinister City (having all acheivements), i can whole-heartly say that is was the best game i have ever played. I sit here, in my computer chair; the credits begin to roll across the screen - i stand, pants around my ankles, eyes filled with tears. My mind racing, a smile fixed upon my face still trying to process the peice of art i have just witnessed.. This game is revolutionary and life-changing. I recommend experiencing this rollercoaster of emotions as i have, you will return a forever changed Vamp Kid.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113464441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 169, 'last_played': 1456077189}
review:
Sinister City, это когда все персонажи ленивые и ждут, когда кто-то прийдёт и найдёт все бумажечки, которые были потеряны на пути в туалет.
Sinister City, это когда ГГ говорит, что он не вор и не может украсть пару журнальчиков, а потом открывает чужим ключем почтовый ящик для того чтобы пособирать в нём и возле него монетки.
Sinister City, это когда не можешь переустановить тещё операционную систему.
Sinister City, это когда на глазах у крутого вампира готовишь для него зелье в викингском шлеме, а он выпивает его, как супчик.
Sinister City, это когда у входа в замок вампиров стоит старый поломанный строительный кран.
Sinister City, это на легкой сложности своего рода "Кликер"
Sinister City, это когда приехал в отель, а его владелец, охотник на вампиров, перед тем как сдать номер просит найти ключи на полке сзади.
Sinister City, это когда собираешь гипноз-машину, чтобы попасть в астрал.
Sinister City, это леденец в старом шкафу, рабочие диски с программами в мусорке, обезбаливающее в цветочном горшке и т.п.
Sinister City, это шедевр :D

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198042767543', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1468497423}
review:
The first thing you need to know about this game is that it is a parody. It makes fun of old B-movies and doesn't take itself too serious.

If you like "hidden object" games this is a neat little game to keep you busy for an hour or two, and at this price I have to recommend it.

As a "hidden object" game it is not overly hard so you can actually get through it without using hints.

There is one small, somewhat annoying bug where the game sometimes doesn't let you click on a destination. When this happens, simply exit to menu, wait a few seconds and then continue and it should be resolved.

To sum up, a "hidden object" game of medium difficulty level, that parodies old B-horror movies.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126910930', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1447435324}
review:
Игра достаточно хороша. 
Если у вас есть 1-2 часа свободного времени, то можете занять их прохождением этой игры. Игра не надоедает и легко проходится. Почти все ачивки вы будите получать за какие-либо действия во время игры. Прошли головоломку=получили ачивку. Я советую купить вам эту игру так, как во время скидок она стоит 2 рубля. За 1-2 часа игры вы получите 3 карточки, которые окупают её в разы. Но у игры есть маленький минус. У меня и у большинства пользователей пролагивает игра. Лично у меня было 3 проблемы. 
1) Когда во время задания я собирал вещи, меня выкидывало из ящика и приходилось заходить в него снова. 
2) В какой-то момент половина экрана стала белой.
3) В середине игры персонаж перестал реагировать на клики мышкой.
Чтобы исправить все это надо просто перезайти в игру.
Подведем итог.
+
1)3 карточки, которые окупают игру во время скидок.
2)17 ачивок
3) банальный, но неплохой сюжет.
4)цена во время скидок
-
1)несколько багов из-за которых надо перезайти в игру 
________________________________________________________________
Советую купить игру и пройти её полностью. Я думаю, что вы не пожалеете о времени потраченном за прохождением этой игры.



Если у вас есть ненужные вещи или карточки, то я готов их принять.  https://steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/new/?partner=166645202&token=fDOZM3fB

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198083652056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1447594966}
review: It is a really good game for ONLY 7p! If you don't get this game your not very smaaaart. I completed the story mode in 2 hours and I personaly feel they were the best 2 hours of my life. Also if the puzzles bore you, you can just skip them by waiting 10-20 seconds....I skipped all the puzzles. I would  say the story line was great but I don't really know what the story was even after completing it.... Also the graphics need MASSIVE improvements as some things just look disabled. No other way of putting it tbh. Also when you have to find things it's really easy as you get unlimited hints and you can just spam your mouse and you basically find all of them in seconds!

author: {'steamid': '76561197963164050', 'num_games_owned': 999, 'num_reviews': 221, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1447594181}
review:
Hard decision. It has a few bugs and the gameplay isn't flawless. You never know if you found everything in a HO scene, because there isn't even an indicator wether you can find anything there or not, which means that wild clicking is the easiest and fastest way to finish it. There is no penalty for it even on advanced, The puzzles are so easy, that they are just there for making the game a little bit longer. If they are not too easy, then they are annoying. Sometimes you have no idea where to go or what to do.

BUT! The story and how everything is told is so hillarious, that it compensates everything! It makes jokes about vampires, adventure games, hollywood and all the classic cliches about lovestories and movies in general. Sure, it has a hard start and you will probably need a little bit time to get in, but after that, it is really nice to watch the characters. Wish, that i could say the same for the actual gameplay, which is only "acceptable".

So if you are a hard boiled fan of HO games and horror-commedy, then you can have fun with it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013571930', 'num_games_owned': 1012, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1598673206}
review:
Hidden object games can be pretty hit and miss but this one's really good fun. It realises that the story is just a flimsy premise to find objects so has fun with it and takes the piss. The setups to find x number of y object are predictably ludicrous and presented with a knowing wink of the fact.

Overall a fun above average hidden object game that'll kill a few hours.

The best part was the price. I got this game at 91% off during one of the sales so it cost me 11 cents (NZD) and as the game also has trading cards which can be sold for more than that I'll actually make money from playing this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030258012', 'num_games_owned': 384, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1506007357}
review:
Sinister City is certainly the most breathtaking game of 2014, and as for me buying it for only 0,09€ is a massive steal. 

Anybody looking for a deep, thought provoking mystery drama should definetly check this wonderous game out. The amazing world building and dynamic characters are only the beginning, as they only scratch the surface of the actual genius and innovative gameplay.

 Now as opposed to todays RPG, shooting and action based this game takes a creative path in making you think deeply about your choices, as you uncover the mystery of what happened to your missing wife. You're always forced to stay focused and look for subtle clues in your enviroment, and the aesthetics just makes the experience a whole lot better.

 When I first saw this game on steam I was unsure about it's directional capabilities, however I found myself surprised by the sheer level of thought and care taken into crafting such a epic and emotionally investing story that will keep you thinking about it for days on end. I would have to give this game a solid 20/10 and I hope that more people will be able to experience this hidden gem amongst the rocks. -Aru

author: {'steamid': '76561198197181459', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 546, 'last_played': 1447976173}
review:
Σίγουρα δεν είναι ένα από τα καλύτερα HOG παιχνίδια που έχω παίξει, αλλά για την τιμή του, στα 9 cent είναι λουκούμι. 
Αποτελεί μία σύντομη παρωδία με βαμπίρ, με ωραίο φινάλε, αστείους διαλόγους και εύκολα puzzles. 
Δυστυχώς έχει ορισμένα bugs τα οποία μπορεί να σε εκνευρίσουν, όπως στην σκηνή με την κουφάλα που σε πετά κάθε φορά που βρίσκεις ένα αντικείμενο και πρέπει συνεχώς να επιλέγεις το αντικείμενο για να συνεχίσεις, καθώς και στην απόδοση των επιτευγμάτων, που αρχικά μπορεί να στα δώσει και ύστερα να μην στα εμφανίζει μέσα στο steam. 

Για την τιμή του είναι ένα τίμιο παιχνίδι, αν δεν σε νοιάζει και το perfect game δεν θα φτάσετε στα όρια της απόγνωσης :P 

Y.Γ. Μην κάνετε το λάθος να ξεκινήσετε νέο παιχνίδι με καινούριο όνομα, όλη η πρόοδος με τα επιτεύγματά σας θα σβηστεί.

review: Best 9 cents I've spent on Steam. I sold trading cards for 20 cents and spent a few hours enjoying the game.  I had to remove special characters from my Steam name to run the game, which was very annoying, however after I launched the game all was forgiven. This game is funny parody of its genre and is so glitchy that I cry and laugh all the time - check out my screenshots. The vampire teletubby is awesome as well as the psychologist character (outdated stereotype). I can't believe I'm saying this, but I would buy this game for it's full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198195042190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1447449690}
review:
j'ai acheter ce jeu 10 centime en sachant que ce jeu est pourri
point positif:
Aucun! (A moins que vous vendez les cartes mais encore...)
Point négatif:
-Graphisme a chier
-Histoire digne d'un navet qui ne ferais même pas sourire quelqu'un sous LSD
-Bug d'affichage qui vous oublie de relancer le jeu (plusieur fois pour certains bugs)
-Bo énervante pour un jeux d'enigme
-Jeu d'une facilitée êtreme et ce même en mode difficile
En conclusion:
Sinister city est un jeux qui ne mérite absolument pas votre achat ni votre temps!Le pire Hidden object que j'ai jouée de ma vie (et j'en n'ai jouée une centaine)
0.5/10 (uniquement car il a des cartes pour me rembourser le jeu)

author: {'steamid': '76561198076462559', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1447438650}
review:
My friend gifted me this game for 9 cents. Here we go.

I knew from the Jet Dog Studios intro that this was, in fact, something I would enjoy.

The voices do not match up to mouth animations. I was not deterred.

First time leading man talks, his spoken lines do not match up to what is written in the text box.

Classic wheelin' and dealin' from receptionist. Thumbs up.

First creepy scene. You know what I mean(no spoilers). Was actually pretty good. Thumbs up. Short and sweet. 

In my youth, I loved Where's Waldo and the knock-offs, but I-Spy wasn't my thing, so the gameplay is knocked down a little due to a bias against. Although, the way the puzzles are introduced is well done.


-Glitch Report #1: After being locked in Astral Plane and told to search for mirror pieces, the game would not let me click on anything except to walk around. Had to return to main menu and continue. This fixed the issue.

-Glitch Report #2: When I reloaded to fix glitch #1, while I can click to search areas, when i click to check or pick up an item, it brings back to the walking section. Everytime. This makes searching very tedious. 

-Glitch Report #3: I reloaded, but #2 prevailed. So I continue, despite frustration. This lead to accessing a puzzle and half the items are whited out. Impossible to search for everything. Correction: I found everything very easily as they were about half of what was actually visible. Nice.... for a while. Until the items are in the white areas. Eventually have to keep using hints to show me where they are, so I can click them. Now I have to repair the mirror and half the screen is white.

-Glitch Report #4: I have one piece left. everytime i try to put it in place, it askes me "Are you sure you want to skip puzzle?" I keep saying no.

Glitches subside. Will let me take garlic and knives to a fight, but not the guns. I even had to find a bullet in a puzzle. I have at least one. Let me take the gun. Thumbs down.

Orlock didn't notice I was preparing a truth potion right in his fire? Got to Tv Station. I'm kinda bored, and was gifted two wishlist games. I'll go there for now.

Recommend: For ISpy fans, yes. Umm....4/5 for what it is. A find-the-item-puzzle game with a few walking sequences between puzzles and a very cheesy "hollywood" vampire love story. Might finish someday.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996273719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 798, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1443715228}
review:
Vorwort:

In Sinister City gehören Vampire zum ganz alltäglichen Alltag und mischen überall mit.

Du spielst einen jungen Mann, der allerdings ein Mensch ist und gerne seiner Freundin einen Heiratsantrag machen würde. Doch diese verschwindet eines Tages spurlos. Somit beginnt deine Geschichte.


Zum Spiel selbst:

Bei diesem Spiel überwiegt vor allen Dingen das mehrfache Suchen von Gegenständen am gleichen Ort, z.B. 12 Lampen usw. Das wird auf die Dauer langweilig und monoton. Die gesuchten Gegenstände erschlagen fast einen und fallen einem meist direkt ins Auge, so groß wie diese gezeichnet sind. Allerdings bei wenig anderen musste man schon ganz genau hinsehen,da diese winzig in irgend eine Ecke geschoben wurden. Das wiederum frustet deutlich.

Aber das Größte Problem sind die vielen Bugs wo vorhanden sind wie z.B. Grafikfehler wo das Spielgeschehen drüben oder wo man sich auf der Karte nicht mehr bewegen kann und auf der Stelle eingefroren ist und so ein voranschreiten der Story nicht gewährleist. Die Bugs lassen sich aber alle beheben durch Neustart des Spiels, zumindest war es so bei mir. Die Story hat man in max. 3 Stunden durchgespielt, dies kommt aber auf euren Typ an.

Im Groß und Ganzen ist es ein unterhaltsames Spiel für einen Abend, dass auch witzige Szenen enthält und man manchmal schmunzeln muss, aber kein Spiel, das man mehrmals spielt. Ich von meiner Seite aus würde es trotzdem nocheinmal kaufen, aber nur wenn es im Sale ist und wer mit gelegentliche Bugs leben kann.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092232110', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1447621635}
review:
Kann die negativen Reviews nicht wirklich verstehe - und ich bin jemand, der Spiele relativ kritisch sieht.
Wollte es mir erst aufgrund der negativen Reviews nicht kaufen, jedoch war es auf 0,09 Euro runtergesetzt und ich hab's versucht. Ich war äußerst positiv überrascht! Die in anderen Reviews beschriebenen "mangelnden Texturen", welche einen angeblich "Tränen lachen lassen solchen", konnte ich nicht mal ansatzweise finden. Die Story gefällt mir ganz gut, wobei die immer noch sehr simpel und vorhersehbar ist. Die Rätsel sind aber hingegen abwechslungsreich und interessant.
Was mir auch gut gefällt ist, dass man viele Achievements bekommt. Sammelkarten gibt es auch noch, welche man gut verkaufen kann.
Sprich: Selbst, wenn man das Spiel hasst, macht man Gewinn (sollte man es für die besagten 0,09 Euro gekauft haben).

author: {'steamid': '76561197992290308', 'num_games_owned': 974, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1699676468}
review:
セールで91%OFF（9円）で買いました。カードも付いてきてオトクですね。
スマホ向けゲームの移植らしく、操作はマウスクリックのみ。

ゲーム内容としては簡単なパズルとアイテム探しだけ。あんまり楽しくはありません。

字幕とインタフェースは日本語に対応しているのですが、翻訳の精度に多少問題があります。
最初の探しものの時に「手袋」を探せと言われるが全く見当たらない。困ったぞと思い手当たり次第にクリックすると「地球儀」が正解でした。そうですね、GlobeとGloveの取り違えがあったようです。あるいは「弓」とあるのは「蝶ネクタイ」（bow）だったり、「ヤシ」とあるのは「手のひら」（palm）だったり、多義的な言葉にも弱いようです。幸いにもヒントは充実しているので答えはすぐに見つけられますけれど。

セリフの字幕にも多少違和感（主人公が女ことばになったり）はありますが、まあ物語の理解を妨げるほどではなかったです。たぶん。

背景の位置がずれてオブジェクトや人が浮いて見えたり操作がおかしくなるバグもありましたが、何せ9円。字幕の問題も含め、何か見つかるたび「どうせ9円だしな……」と優しい気持ちになって目をつぶってしまいます。

ゲーム内容が単純なだけに、本作に魅力を見出すには物語を評価するほかにないと言っても過言ではありません。
ストアページを眺めるとさらわれた花嫁とか吸血鬼とか古城とか「それっぽい」風を装ってますが、その実態は楽しいコメディです。
だいたい2時間くらいでクリアできますから、ちょいと安っぽい映画を1本見るくらいの気持ちで挑むとそれなりに満足できるかと思いますです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198032518991', 'num_games_owned': 591, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1447317713}
review:
The positive reviews that convinced me to give it a try claim that this game is misunderstood satire. What they don't say is that it's bad, poorly made, and glitchy as hell "satire" (let's be honest though, this is not satire, this is a parody). Even its puzzles are a laugh (to a point where one could theorize that maybe it wasn't intended as a parody of the vampire genre but of HOGs -hidden object games- in general).

Yes, it has a couple of funny moments here and there and yes, it's real cheap, but that doesn't make it a good game that's worth your time.

If you get it at it's current sale price (0,09 cents) you won't lose any money, since it has trading cards, but again, this doesn't make it a good game, just an affordable one.

If you like over-the-top, absurd comedies that feature vampires and don't mind glitches that could prevent you from finishing the game, then yes, it's worth it. You'll get a couple of chuckles and I have to admit, a funny HOG is a rare and refreshing thing. But that's about it.

I am tempted to give it a thumbs-up for it's campy glory, but it has some of the worst glitches I've ever seen in HOGs and that's one of the biggest faux-pas a game of this genre can have. I can stand bad art, bad or non existent voice acting, a flimsy plot and random fetch quests. But I have to be able to play the game, to say that it's at least mediocre, don't you think?

author: {'steamid': '76561197992856964', 'num_games_owned': 1022, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1447315146}
review:
Tepid casual gameplay, absolutely ridiculous writing that doesn't take itself seriously but plays it straight, and a lot more fun than it actually deserves to be.

If you know what you're doing, you can power through this with no walkthrough in around an hour; so assume you're getting around an hour of stifled chuckles out of this one.  If it's on sale for a dime, absolutely get it.  If it's the full price of around a dollar?  Maybe still worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066577948', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1447192950}
review:
For 0.09$ , there's not much you can expect, so the game managed to exceed my expectations. 

Pros:
- Good enough story - don't expect nothing deep, but it's great for what it is. An simple, but effective story with many refferences and ironies
- Puzzles are easy and well done
- It's engaging enough to make you want to finish it
- The price - It costs as much as an bubble gum when on sale and offers 2-3 hours of non-repetitive gameplay. 

Cons:
- Some bugs on some parts of the game. Nothing game breaking, but they made things harder than they should have
- Pretty short
- Graphics are kinda outdated for 2014 (would have prefered isometric view than 3D)
- Some objects are hard to spot

Definetly recommended due to it's sale price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103169070', 'num_games_owned': 1325, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1463256243}
review:
Вы знаете, довольно неплохая игра, я особо не играю в такие игры(Point & Click), но за 2 рубля такую игру продавать, да и с коллекционными карточками - это просто щедрость как она есть. И причём это не так, как было с игрой Frankenstein: Master Of Death, т.е. за всю игру всего 3 карточки, и то выдаются они в конце игры, а тут сразу три в начале, а что будет под конец я даже представить не могу, тем более в этой игре есть юмор, а это уже отличительная черта от других игр такого жанра.И я вот что ещё заметил, она на русском, тот же самый Frankenstein полностью на английском, там помогали мои базовые школьные знания английского и Google переводчик, а тут всё на русском, и сразу видишь и знаешь что искать, это просто превосходно! Да, там были некоторые баги с текстурами, но всё решилось проверкой кэша и перезагрузкой компьютера, так что я ставлю 10 из 10!

P.S. В общем я прошёл игру, и оказалось, что у неё тоже всего 3 карточки, и все они в начале, и игра оказалась очень короткой, да и я смог сделать чего никогда не мог сделать, а это получить все достижения(с моими кривыми руками-то), но для меня эта игра всё равно кажется хорошей!:)

author: {'steamid': '76561198179954131', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1446964892}
review:
万圣节打折，0.09美刀入。说是个 HO 游戏，非弄个第三人称视角主角放里面，搞的像传统 AVG。品质实在不敢恭维，画面像是90年代作品，各种贴图错误，人物能走到墙上，垃圾桶上。
    剧情也无厘头的紧，为了找未婚妻，主角来到邪恶之城，去旅馆住店结果被老板送去了异次元，回来后当着大 BOSS 面把毒药做出来然后送给他，这老头就高高兴兴接过来喝了，然后被催眠了。接着主角又去找未来岳母，俩人一看就对上眼了，然后这母子俩联手找了个莫名其妙的导演一起把老吸血鬼给骗了。老吸血鬼完成了童年的梦想成了专业演员，不料拍戏过程中太投入，把女婿给咬了，一家吸血鬼就这么幸福团圆了。
    对这剧情实在是无力吐槽。
    BGM 挺不错的。
    HO 部分零难度，鼠标快速乱点即可。
    流程不长，2个小时。
    男主角在大地图上移动时会去汉堡店是个什么鬼？

author: {'steamid': '76561198001081236', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1446940278}
review: Me ha gustado mucho este juego aunque se me hiciese algo corto(pero por 0.09€ en Halloween no se puede pedir mas). Como diria el de Bricomania "facil, sencillo y para toda la familia" y lo más importante, divertido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020748121', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1446916190}
review: Tengo que admitir que los juegos que consisten en buscar objetos por los escenarios me gustan y por 9 céntimos que costaba no iba a dejar pasar la oportunidad. Me ha salido a 3 céntimos la hora así que en ese sentido ha cumplido, malo si hubiera que pagar 5 euros.  Solo me han salido dos bugs y ambos relacionados con el fondo, el personaje no era colocado de manera que encajara y se fusionara con el escenario. Y por lo demás poco más que comentar, ameno y con una historia entretenida a pesar de que no se toma en serio ni a si mismo y varios puzzles en los que será díficil quedarse atascado. Trae cromos así que si lo veis barato como yo merece la pena darle una oportunidad, y teniendo eso en cuenta mi voto es positivo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093220384', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1446341543}
review:
I've played many hidden object games but have never bothered reviewing any of them, partly because I think everybody generally gets the idea by now and more or less knows what to expect, but also because, with a few exceptions, there's usually so little difference between the content and quality that were I to write reviews for each and every one I'd essentially end up trying to find dozens of different ways to say the exact same thing. (By the by, just about anything published by Artifex Mundi should see you right if you're looking to get into the genre) But I'm writing one for Sinister City as I feel I need to come to its defence a little and share my own take on it.

It seems like such a cop-out when people say the only reason somebody doesn't like something is because they don't understand it. It's sort of a thinly-veiled way of calling someone stupid rather than accept they might understand it perfectly but just not like it, that they simply have a different preference than you. But after reading a lot of the negative reviews, this is one occasion where I actually feel like some people kinda didn't get it. As pretentious and w*nky as it is to say, there is a difference between something being parody, pastiche and just plain bad, and this game dips its toes into all three, which is where I think a lot of confusion comes from.

Let's get it out of the way and say what needs to be said, many parts of this game are bad, unintentionally so. Graphically it's kind of somewhere between looking like a PS2 and PS3 era game and there were quite a few times in the hidden object sections when I wished everything was clearer or more distinct. In other games in the genre these sections can have a more artistic slant with their high quality renders of interesting scenes and items. Here, everything is far more workmanlike and pretty forgettable; a straight on view of some open cupboards or top down into a box with a small handful of items in it. They don't feel hugely inspired. But worst of all are the bugs and glitches that plague the game. It happened to me a few times where some strange artifacting would appear in the form of white blocks across the screen and completely obscure my view, or every time I'd click anywhere in a hidden object scene it would kick me out of it forcing me to manually enter the scene repeatedly after every object I found. In fairness, this only happened to me in the second stage of the game then never bothered me again after (exiting to the main menu then hitting Continue eventually seemed to fix this for me. In some cases I think Steam pop-ups may have triggered this to happen, but I'm not completely sure). They were the only issues I had personally, but others have complained of far worse, like losing save data every time they closed the game or buggy achievements not registering properly, or in some cases, not even being able to start the game at all. And if anyone had these issues then they'd be absolutely right to give it a bad review as their experience with the title. But, thankfully, I had a far better time with it. Well... eventually.

[View Comments for the missing 4th paragraph]

You play as a sort of Tom Cruise lookalike trying to find his kidnapped fiancé and being lead to Sinister City in the search. A kindly old hotel receptionist tells him to stay away from there, that it's a vampire city, and the guy doesn't even bat an eyelid at the mention of vampires. Nor does he when he's invited to a session of telepathic communication to try tracking her down, he just accepts the offer and follows an old man into a darkened back room. I think pretty much everyone who plays it either laughs their *ss off at these points or else says it's stupid and loses all hope for the game, I know they were certainly my reactions. But then I got to a point where it just sort of clicked with me. I realised they understood these games are dumb and their stories make no sense, so they start having a little fun and going all out ridiculous with it. The head vampire kidnaps his own daughter to arrange for her to marry a kid's TV presenter to vicariously live out his own failed ambitions of movie stardom that he's secretly harboured for centuries. Oscar Wilde, this is not. But I love that they have fun with it rather than being so serious like most of the other games and I was surprised at how much I laughed at some genuinely funny moments in it. If you have to make a crazy, nonsense story, I think it's way better to go funny with it instead of trying to be respectable with how legit you are with your craft, and I applaud them for making that move here.

Like I said, if anyone had a bad experience with this on a technical level then I can't argue with that, and to begin with I was right there with them. But by the end this game thoroughly won me over and I had a great couple of hours with it. With some funny moments, some interesting hidden object play that I eventually came around to, and at least an attempt at a new variety of mini games for the genre, I can easily say this was the best 9 cents I've ever spent.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079634434', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1448528758}
review: This hidden object/puzzle game is a great way to pass a few hours.  Great characters, a storyline, and objects are not so rediculously hard to find that they take away the fun aspect.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009026799', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1446861603}
review:
This game is a perfect example of why I wish Steam had a "Meh." option, instead of just yes or no to a recommendation.

I have played several point-and-click, hidden object games at this point, and there are definitely some things that Sinister City does that I appreciate, albeit not well enough to not be a bit, frankly, dumb. 

Here's the break-down for me, + signs being positives and - being negatives.
+Incorporation of 3-dimensional character models. While most games of this type simply present you with a two-dimensional scene, in this you do actually have to move the protagonist, John, around in a space.
- However, on that same note, the areas where you can move are more or less two-dimensional and not all of them seem to have been designed with a character walking around them in mind. This results in some frankly hilarious looking scenes, like John and the TV Station security guard just hovering above the ground in front of the TV station, as if they were part of the door and not actual characters. 
+ Voice Acting - for a casual game of this type, it's actually really good.
- Except for John's voice. And he's the main character. So he talks all the time. (Ipkis is pretty bad too but you only have to talk to him a couple times)
- The background music isn't bad, but it is extremely repetitive.
- Game is short, even for a HOP game. 
+ Price. Guys for real, it's a dollar. Even if you end up despising it, are you really gonna cry over that dollar?
+ Story...it's satirical of your typical spooky vampire motif, which is actually genuinely amusing at times. Not funny, but amusing. Worthy of a slight smirk. Also, John and Nina's lovey-dovey-ness is so over the top that it becomes a humorous exaggeration of dime-a-dozen love stories. Whether or not this was intentional is debatable, but seeing it as satire makes it more bearable.
- Story ... buuuuutttt a lot of it feels rushed and nonsensical, even for a game about a town full of vampires (who completely openly exist and no one really questions it....?). Spoiler free example: When your character finds out his fiancee is being held in a town full of vampires, he at no point stops and says, "Woah, man. Slow your roll. VAMPIRES? Vampires are real?" He's basically Anakin Skywalker in Episode 3 of Star Wars, but without the death, ("Oh my god, what have I done? Waaaahhhhhhh"  ... "So you wanna join the Dark Side?" ... "Yeah, okay.") He just immediately accepts something that you would think would be a hell of a revelation for your average human dude who just wants to get married.
- Saw the last bit of the ending coming a mile away.
+ All the characters actually have a unique design and personalities, however minimal those personalities may be.
+ Several objects in the HOPs were genuinely difficult to find, which I like.
- But all the other minigames were horrendously easy.

All in all, it really is a "meh" kind of thing for me. I didn't like it, but I didn't dislike it. Had it been fleshed out more into a bigger and longer story, and more time taken on animation, it could have been really good. The developers definitely have some skill; it's just in need of serious refinement. 
I labeled it as recommended in the end because of the price. It's only a buck, and there are definitely worse things to do when you're bored, and worse games that I've played for more money--on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092735548', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1479165627}
review:
This game is so laughably good, everything made me chuckle, the corny dalogue, the WTF did I just solve that puzzle for moments... Everything. 

Its not a difficult game by any means, there are loads of hidden object puzzles about the place but theres a hint button should you get stuck. (I did when an item I needed to find did not show up so I just clicked about where the hint mentioned) 

I got this game in a steam sale for 9p and to be honest grab it on a sale like that, its a few hours of corny entertainment as long as you dont take it seriously.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994830200', 'num_games_owned': 744, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1446710227}
review:
Worth it for the 10 cents I paid, wouldn't be dismayed if I paid full price. Actually found it pretty funny and some of the puzzles were overall fun. It really owns its kitsch and plays in it. In a way it felt more like a point and click adventure game of old that happened to have some hidden object areas.

I did hit the mirror glitch some people talk about but I just escaped to main menu and hit continue and I was able to play on without issue.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019738163', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1446690249}
review:
Tommy Wisseau approves this game.
Sinister City es el "The Room" de los juegos. Una verdadera joya que puede ser mejor apreciada entre amigos y bajo el efecto de algún estupefaciente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198182144897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 346, 'last_played': 1446683408}
review:
Vieteri, sukka ja mitä niitä olikaan

Vampyyriteemainen kevyt piilotettu objekti pulmapeli. Hahmot ovat hauskoja karikatyyreja. Pelasin pelin kahdesti läpi illassa jopa vaikeimmalla tasolla alottaen, joten peli ei ole hankala seikkailupelikonkarille. Pelissä on joitain jumitusbugeja, joista pääsee eroon käymällä lataamaassa pelin päävalikosta, peliä pitää pelata yhteensopivuusasetuksilla, jos uudempi Windows alla. Pelin heikoin elmentti on sen musiikki. Musiikki ei juurikaan vaihtele ja se siihen kyllästyy pitemmissä pulmissa. Pulmat loogisia. Suosittelen, jos saa halvalla. Helppo peli saada tavoitteet ja hyvä täytepeli.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987210144', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1446673952}
review: So, this game takes a bit over an hour. It's a pretty simple hidden object and puzzle game. If you like those, you'll like this. The story is seriously stupid and goofy, which it is supposed to be, but still, I had a good time playing it. Recommended for people who like hidden object and non-challenging puzzles. Not recommended for people who like well scripted storylines.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050674926', 'num_games_owned': 515, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1470790425}

author: {'steamid': '76561198038179737', 'num_games_owned': 581, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1446600364}
review: I have a low bar for hidden object games but the dialogue is AMAZING...ly awful. It's really really bad, they didn't put even a modicum of effort into the story. But who cares, that's not why you play Hidden Obect games RIGHT? The 3d models are fairly nice, textures are okay in the beginning but the 3d model sometimes just walks up into thin air and about halfway through there's just MISSING TEXTURES that never load and so you can't beat that chapter. Lame.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057423211', 'num_games_owned': 612, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1446591291}
review:
Corto, simple, barato y entretenido. Si te gustan los juegos de buscar objetos y puzzles, por el precio que vale en rebajas te merece la pena muchísimo. Un par de horitas muy interesantes, no pido más en un juego de este estilo porque puede repetirse la misma historia y hacerse aburrido.

Los logros se pueden sacar todos de una vez, y si no te mola del todo, siempre puedes vender las cartas que te dan más de lo que vale incluso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004014764', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1446578215}
review:
Очень прикольная игра,в общей сложности мне хватило на 2 часа,пройти полностью.
Очень схожа с игрой "найди тот или иной предмет...."заработала конечно не все дотижения,но у меня все еще впереди)
Графика конечно не HD,но что вы хотите за 3 рубля(покупала со скидкой)не помню сколько стоит без скидки

author: {'steamid': '76561198083850224', 'num_games_owned': 337, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1446393919}
review: Отличный квест, напоминает о тех времеах, когда такие игры были на пике популярности. Интересный (хоть и очень странный) сюжет, красивое графическое оформление, старый добрый поинт энд клик.  Прекрасный саундтрек и добротная атмосфера. И всего за 29 рублей? (Я лично успел ухватить сей шедевр аж за 2 рубля.) XD

author: {'steamid': '76561198099485293', 'num_games_owned': 189, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1446511733}

author: {'steamid': '76561198032002347', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1446511318}
review:
Ce jeu d'objets cachés a un scénario (et des dialogues) tellement mauvais qu'il en est parfois hilarant. En outre, les bugs d'affichage, les intempestifs retours à l'écran précédent chaque fois que vous cliquez sur un objet sont d'un énervant... A noter aussi qu'il est hideux, comparé à ce qu'il se fait chez d'autres studios, plus exigeants en matière de qualité et de respect du public.
Si vous voulez rire devant ce nanar ou que vous êtes un accro aux objets cachés, attendez les soldes !

author: {'steamid': '76561198156854478', 'num_games_owned': 646, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1446505824}
review: Had to tweek some things to get the game to launch which was a slight annoyance but forgivable considering what I paid for it. The game itself isn't great - just badly executed - but again, that's ok considering the price tag. However, I reached a point, less than half an hour in, where it stopped responding and though it could probably be fixed with some more tweeking, it didn't really seem worth the effort.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081145379', 'num_games_owned': 738, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1446422189}
review:
Como fan de los point&click, este juego me parece bastante malo. Es un juego de encontrar los objetos ocultos, mezclado con algunos puzzles más (MUY fáciles). 

Los puzzles son muy sencillos, el argumento es un poco bobo, y tiene algunos bugs en los que hay que reiniciar el juego para solventarlos (imperdonable).
Gráficamente es muy poco uniforme: modelado de personajes correcto, pero no cuadran con los decorados. La interfaz no encaja por ningún lado. 
Por otro lado, el hecho de que los diálogos estén doblados al inglés es un punto a su favor.

Posiblemente sería un buen juego si estuvieramos en el año 2000, pero... no lo estamos.

Puedes plantearte comprarlo si está de oferta al 90%; ya sea por probar, o para que jueguen niños (que no le suelen dar importancia a este tipo de "detalles"). En cualquier otro caso, por tu bien, mantente alejado de él.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027593749', 'num_games_owned': 214, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1644262222}
review:
Игра в жанре поиск гавна. 

Ищем всякую чушь, продвигаемся по сюжету. Два часа неторопливой комичной истории про вампиров, которую обыгрывали миллиарды раз в кино\играх\музыке\книгах и тд. На удивление - вышло бодро. Здесь даже есть вампиры-телепузики. Треш во всей своей красе. Любителям пародий на вампиров рекомендуется.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134678166', 'num_games_owned': 551, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1446346053}
review: The story is the worst and corniest of all JetDogs games I've played so far. The advanced mode removes all navigational aids so you have no idea what is actually clickable or not. I can only recommend this game for people seeking easy achievements. When it's on sale, and you have a few hours to waste cringing, and you want to collect a few easy achievements, then buy this game. If you don't want any of that, don't buy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069159582', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1446322020}
review: En vrai je suis pas aussi dégouté que sa. Pour 0,09 centimes j'ai achetais le fameux Sinister City. Certe à la base s'était pour les Cartes puis en y jouant un peu je l'ai trouvé plutôt marrant. Même si l'histoire est super bidon (On va pas se mentir) une facilité amplement nul et des graphisme de merde bah j'ai passé 2/3 heures à jouer à un jeu de recherche bon même si je me suis amusé à cliqué comme un boeuf partout et tout le reste mais j'ai quand même était FULL SUCCES (Tellement Hard) Bref je conseille le jeu quand il est à 0,09 centimes pour avoir x3 Cartes à vendre ainsi qu'une petit collection de succès.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102948932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 279, 'playtime_forever': 1434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 893, 'last_played': 1423202926}
review:
英語の感想多くが否定意見はなっとく。

作品名から
連想する陰欝な要素がない。

登場人物は陽気そして映画監督やてれび番組製作者が笑いを狙った会話は滑っている。

行方不明の嫁を探すために
不動産屋、精神科医を訪問する。など脚本も滅裂。



日本人からみると確かに三流映畫の氛圍気だけどこの作品を推薦したり高評價を
あたえることはできないな。

author: {'steamid': '76561198002252866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 526, 'playtime_forever': 1, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1446290500}
review:
コメディ調の不条理なノリのADV。

「フィアンセが吸血鬼に攫われたので、ボコりに行ったら、実はその吸血鬼が彼女のパパでさ」みたいな果てしなくライトなストーリーが合計10分程度で展開されるあたり、なんかもう逆に凄い！

ゲームそのものは、同種のポイント＆クリック系アドベンチャーと比較してややパズル部分の出来が悪く、しかも致命的な誤訳がごろごろしているので、ひたすら遊びにくい印象。

9円セールならば許容できるが、逆にいえばそれ以外の状況で褒めるべき点はない。

ただ、安くてバカバカしいのでギフト投擲には大変よろしい。

author: {'steamid': '76561198091959655', 'num_games_owned': 1347, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1445674884}
review:
As fan of point and click games i have to say that this game doesn't was that i expected.

Sinister city is an Point & Click / Hidden Object game, that it's messed up. After 4 hours (4 boring hours), i have finished the game and i would like to give you my view points from this game.

- First of all the story doesn't have sense, as example you have to help a receptionist to find some documents, but 60% of them are behind him, is him so fucking lazy ?

- The graphic quality looks horrible (i don't care graphics like the rest of the people), have to say that to be a game made on 2014 looks horrible (like a PSX game) compared with other games from same dev.

- It has some bugs that makes you restart the game and start from the save point.

- It has teletubbies, seriously.

Something that i enjoyed was the voice actuation and some music background from stages.

I do not recommend you this game, unless it's on sale (just for a few cents), you have been warned.

4 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198027759437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1446147624}

author: {'steamid': '76561198029726549', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 421, 'last_played': 1446051163}
review: If you don't care about achievements, the game was ok. Not too hard. Silly dialog to enjoy. Vampire satire. Not recommending because achievements were bugged. Some popped up as 'earned' in game but they did not register on Steam. Finally got Steam credit for 17/17 achievements after 3 run-throughs... yes, I'm a bit obsessive..  BUT did not get Steam credit for a 'perfect game'. Finally found a solution in the Guides on Community Hub. Suggest you check out the discussions before purchasing the game. Paid 0.99. Have really enjoyed other unbugged JetDogs games. Don't judge all by this one.
