author: {'steamid': '76561198022104383', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1464894721}
review:
This is a nice little "Hidden Objects" game with a neat story. Not a great story, but a neat story.

PROS
====
1.) Pretty good puzzles and interesting locations
2.) Nice graphics
3.) Plenty of side puzzles to keep you amused
4.) $0.99, although I paid $0.49 with coupon

CONS
====
1.) Grphic glitches once in a while
2.) Game itself glitches (Sometimes won't let you click on stuff)
3.) Story is not the best, in fact it's not great at all
4.) Once in a while, some text doesn't match the voice
5.) Better to get it 50% off or better
6.) Sadly, there are better "Hidden Objects" games out there

Overall it's not THAT bad, but you may hate the graphic glitches it has. Just a side note, if you get to a point where it says you can do something, but you can't click on anything, just restart the game, it should fix the problem. Ideally, this was really designed for "Touch Screens", such as Android or touch pads.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094025596', 'num_games_owned': 1200, 'num_reviews': 446, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1444717778}
review:
Данный продукт обладает след. достоинствами:
♦ Визуальное оформление эстетичное.
♦ Игр. проц. легок в освоении. 
♦ Цена скромная: в РФ запрашиваемая сумма составляет 29р. 
♦ Сист. требования низкие - пользователи слабых/устарвших машин смогут наблюдать стабильно высокое кол-во кадров в сек.

Минусами можно назвать однообразное муз. сопровождение и скучный сюжет. Ему мешают условности, навязанные жанром, он лишь  слабый придаток игровой механики, что вызывает чувство сожаления о потерянном втуне потенциале.

Я могу рекомендовать Sinister City к покупке тем игрокам, кто хочет провести свое свободное время, отыскивая различные предметы... не задаваясь  вопросами "зачем?" и "почему?".

author: {'steamid': '76561198003545953', 'num_games_owned': 3094, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1444710938}
review:
It's hard to review hidden object games because I don't really believe anyone expects them to be "good" games.  This game is fine.  It has other puzzles besides hidden object, but none of them take any more brain power then hidden objects do.  Just color matching and what not.  Great game for kids I guess.  

The trailer for this game presents itself as something dark and dramatic, like you'd expect from other popular hidden object games, but really it isn't.  The game is meant to be campy and tongue-in-cheek.  All the jokes are pretty flat, but of course that fits the rest of the bill of a simple, casual, hidden object game.  I had a couple of glitches, but they went away with a simple reloading of the game, so I can't really complain about anything here.  Definitely worth the dollar if it's what you're into.

If you've played hidden object before, you know what your getting into.  Nothing is advancing the genre here.  If you haven't played hidden object before, if you're above the age of 14, you might want to start with a more interesting title.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058026970', 'num_games_owned': 1881, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1444508875}
review:
Простенькая игра из серии "Поиск предметов" с дурацким сюжетом. Проходится за несколько часов. Головоломки все простые и для любителей данной серии игр не составят сложности, как и сам поиск предметов... За одно прохождение можно собрать все ачивки (только нужно начать на сложном уровне игры, не использовать подсказки, не пропускать мини игры и не пропускать диалоги).

P.S.
В игре много багов... иногда просто выкидывает, иногда, во время поиска предметов, выкидывает из локации, или пропадают текстуры... можно попробовать перезайти, но не всегда помогает...

P.P.S.
...и еще раз про сюжет... такой бред придумали... но чтобы получить ачивку, пришлось все читать...

author: {'steamid': '76561198101342452', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1443984623}
review:
[b]Spielwertung:[/b] 3 / 10

Dieses Spiel bekommt von mir ein dickes und fettes Jein. Lachen oder weinen? Empfehlen oder Nichtempfehlen? Bug oder Feature? Man weiß es einfach nicht. 

[b]Spieldauer:[/b] 2 – 3 Stunden

+ Errungenschaften sind THEORETISCH beim 1. durchspielen erreichbar (Bugs)
+ Sammelkarten
+ geringer Preis (besonders im Angebot)

+/- veraltete Grafik und (steife unfreiwillig komische) Animationen

- Bugs, Glitches und Bugs
- seltsame Hitboxen 
- wildes Klicken und noch mehr wildes Klicken (Fehlen der Hinweise auf „interessante“ Stellen, sodass man in den Szenen und Wimmelbildspielen einfach alles anklicken muss, wenn man alles finden möchte.)

[b]Story [Achtung enthält kleinere Spoiler]:[/b]

Der Stiefvater in spe entführt die Verlobte von unserem „charismatischen“ Protagonisten (ich habe es irgendwie geschafft mir nicht mal seinen Namen merken zu können), weil dieser nicht gut genug für seine Tochter ist. Stattdessen soll diese zwangsverheiratet werden - mit einem Vampir seiner Wahl. Da der Protagonist John (ja, ich habe gerade nachgesehen) seine Verlobte dummerweise liebt, ist es nun an uns dies zu verhindern – mit allen Mitteln. 

[b]Zusammenfassung/Kommentar:[/b]

Dieses Spiel ist nicht total schlecht. Ich habe wirklich lange überlegt, ob ich das Däumchen nach oben oder unten gebe. Letztendlich stand der günstige Preis, für den man nicht so viel erwarten kann, gegen die negativen Aspekte, die dann doch überwiegen. 

Grundsätzlich finde ich den Preis für das Spiel mit 0,99 € in Ordnung, wenn da nicht die Bugs wären und die Tatsache, dass das Spiel irgendwie lieblos und unfertig wirkt oder wie ein Scherz der Spieleentwickler. 

Die Grafik empfinde ich als okay - natürlich ist sie nicht das Gelbe vom Ei. Und einige Animationen wirken unfreiwillig komisch aber damit kann ich gut Leben. Vielleicht liegt das einfach daran, dass ich bei einem Hiddenobjectgame, besonders für diesen Preis, nicht soviel erwarte. (Dafür hat man bei manchen Animationen ein bisschen was zum Schmunzeln. Ist doch auch etwas, oder?) 
Was bei mir jedoch den, bereits oben erwähnten, lieblosen und unfertigen Eindruck bewirkt hat, war der deutlich in der Luft stehende Charakter. Passiert in mindestens 2 Spielszenen und ist so deutlich, dass man es als Spieleentwickler eigentlich hätte sehen müssen. Liegt vielleicht daran, dass ich den Gedanken habe, dass man sein Werk als Spieleentwickler noch mal auf Bugs & Glitches prüft. Behindert nicht beim Spiel, wirkt aber nicht sehr professionell. 

In vielen Hiddenobjectgames gibt es einen Hinweis, wenn man über eine „interessante“ Stelle fährt. Meistens ist das wohl die Veränderung des Mauszeigers. Darauf wurde hier verzichtet oder es wurde vergessen. Die Folgen dessen sind absehbar: Man klickt ziemlich orientierungslos in den Szenen alles an, was verdächtig sein könnte. 
Und als wäre das nicht genug wiederholt sich das Ganze in den Wimmelbildszenen. Es gibt in diesen Szenen sehr häufig versteckte Gegenstände, die man erst findet, wenn man einen anderen Gegenstand verschoben hat. Somit klickt man wieder alles an, was man finden kann, weil es ein potenzielles Versteck sein könnte. Mich persönlich hat dieses stupide geklicke sehr schnell ermüdet und genervt.

Die Wimmelbildszenen sind von den versteckten Gegenständen mal abgesehen sehr einfach gehalten. Die meisten Sachen kann man sehr gut finden.

Die Hitboxen der Gegenstände sind teilweise etwas größer. Dies hat bei mir dazu geführt, dass ich manchmal Sachen gewertet bekam und eigentlich gar nicht wusste, was ich angeklickt haben soll. Das ist meist dann passiert, wenn die Gegenstände sehr eng beieinander waren. 
Kleinere Übersetzungsfehler haben sich ebenfalls eingeschlichen, hält sich aber gut in Grenzen. Ein Beispiel wäre: Palme = Handabdruck. 

Die eingebauten Minispiele empfand ich als sehr leicht, die meisten sollten daher kaum Probleme bereiten oder wirklich herausfordernd sein. 

Wer dennoch über die Anschaffung dieses Spiels nachdenkt, sollte sich mental auf mögliche Bugs vorbereiten. Ich hatte welche aber wenn ich mir die Reviews anschaue, muss das nicht immer zutreffen. Bei Interesse einfach mal Forum oder Reviews lesen dort stehen einige mögliche Bugs. 

Das größte Problem aber was ich mit dem Spiel habe: Es geht nicht in den Kopf. Zumindest nicht die positiven Dinge. Es sticht nichts wirklich heraus an was man später noch gerne zurückdenken würde. Es bleiben keine Minispiele oder Wimmelbilder wirklich hängen. Namen des Protagonisten und anderer Figuren? Bereits kurz nach dem durchspielen vergessen ...
 Was aber bei mir hängen geblieben ist, sind die Bugs und die Szenen in den unser menschlicher Charakter scheinbar in der Szenerie zu schweben scheint. 

[b][i]Fazit:[/i][/b] 
Ich habe mir die Frage gestellt: Würdest du dieses Spiel noch mal spielen wollen? Und die Antwort war: nein. Obwohl das Spiel nicht nur schlechte Seiten hat und mich auch mal herzhaft zum Lachen brachte, gibt es von mir leider keine Empfehlung – egal wie günstig es sein mag. Wer das Abenteuer dennoch wagen möchte, dem empfehle ich das Spiel im Angebot zu kaufen und dann Humor und ein paar Nerven mitzubringen.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972281569', 'num_games_owned': 2950, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1445554701}
review:
Sinister City is a hidden objects game where you are going to look for your girlfriend dissapered in a city ruled by vampires.

The different locations are drawn in 2D and characters are well modeled in 3D.

Music and enviroment sound are normal, all characters talk to you but their performance do not allow them to win an Oscar :)

There are different kind of puzzles, mini games and tasks to find many objects from a list in the screen. 
 
The game is in third person and you move your character around different places clicking on the screen. There are some glitches but they aren't a big problem.

There is a hint button in a corner to help you. Depending on the level of difficulty, it refills quickest and tells you which are your next step.

There is no map available.

You can choose the difficulty between: easy and difficult but there is no difficult instead. 

The game has achivements and trading cards and you could finishit  easily obtaning all of them.

I think, this is one of the first games of this developer, because Alchemy Mysteries is much better because they learnt from the mistakes of this game.

A game to play if you are bored at home and  don't want to think a lot.

PD: Thanks to Shade00

review: The game itself isn't really that bad. The story and the graphics aren't perfect, but the game did entertain me most of the time. BUT it is also bugged as hell, so I can't recommend it. I had white boxes covering up the hidden object scenes, some of the objects seemed to be invisible and at some point I could't go to the next screen and had to restart the game. Right now I have to find an object but I'm unable to pick it up which means I can't proceed in the story. It's just really frustrating and takes away the fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049252970', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1444103370}
review: I don't really know why people complain about this game. For what it is, the game is hillarious. The only thing I'd like is a cursor change or something when you're hovering over a clickable spot to save some spam-clicking. The hints recharge fast enough, none of the puzzles are overly difficult, and overall I enjoyed it. I mean, don't expect it to perform miracles, but it's a perfectly cromulent game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999548234', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1444133157}
review:
Sou fã de jogos de Click-to -Point e Hidden Object, tenho e jogo muitos desse estilo.
Tentei jogar Sinister City, mas a forma como o jogo funciona me frustrou bastante.

Prós:

- Legendado em PT-BR***
-Comprei o jogo num pacote por R$0,62 e o jogo dá cartas (bom para que vende, assim o jogo se paga e gera lucro e para quem gosta de fazer as insignias)

Contra:

-A interação dos Personagens 3d com o cenário 2D não é boa, muitas vezes o personagem aparece voando no cenário ou andando na parede. Além da movimentação do personagem ser desnecessária.

- Toda a tela é clicavel, então para encontrar o local correto para iniciar o jogo do Hidden Object torna o jogo chato, acaba não sendo um Click-to-Point  e sim um "clique como louco em toda tela até encontrar o que procura".

- Em 1hora de jogo ele "bugou" 2x onde... mesmo clicando no objeto correto, ou no local onde o se inicia o  Hidden Object nada acontece, quando isso ocorre tem se que voltar ao menu do jogo, clicar em continuar aí o jogo "desbuga". Isso é ruim demais! Pois quando aconteceu a primeira vez fiquei clicando em todo o cenário e nada... recorri ao botão de ajuda e este indicou um local o qual já havia clicado e continuei clicando. Fiquei com raiva e fui procurar informações na comunidade do jogo e descobri que quando isso ocorre, tem que sair do jogo e entrar novamente.

                                         -------------------------------------------------------

***  O único ponto positivo (ainda sim com ressalva) é que o jogo é legendado em PT-BR, Excelente que as Produtoras tenham essa preocupação em traduzir, porém se Você for jogar... Atenção. Alguns objetos tem seu nome alterado. 
Exemplo: "Leque" foi traduzido como "ventilador de mão".

caso tenha interesse em comprar este jogo, pese os prós e contras... Se Você não se importar com os Bugs ou simplismente aprender a ignorar; consegue-se jogar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129220779', 'num_games_owned': 538, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 4463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3600, 'last_played': 1492921686}
review:
Como alguém já disse: que bom que não dei atenção aos reviews ruins!
O jogo é muito bom, muito mesmo. Tem uma ótima história, um ótimo gráfico e ótimas musicas! Tão bom quanto Dracula Ressurrection
É um point-and-click onde você tem que buscar objetos escondidos para ir avançando e completando missões, além de se deparar com puzzles e ter o privilégio de movimentar o personagem principal usando o mouse!
Quem gosta desse tipo de jogo, vai se divertir bastante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084092609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1443999522}
review:
5/10
Из плюсов - хороший юмор и интересные персонажи, из минусов - ужасная (уровня третьей игры про Гарри Поттера) графика и однообразный игровой процесс. К тому же лично я так и не смогла просмотреть достижения - соответствующий пункт в меня оказался неюзабельным.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964732360', 'num_games_owned': 5837, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1443780894}
review:
BUG很多，劇情蠻粗糙、幼稚的，但是遇到BUG退出遊戲再重新讀取還是能玩。
謎題和美工水準都不錯，建議新手可以用簡單模式全破一遍，再來進階模式就能搞清楚卡在哪裡，不需要浪費時間看攻略，因為重玩甚至不用花一個小時！
推薦給一心一意追求全成就達成的朋友，它只要花你五小時左右，就能滿足你了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198139030244', 'num_games_owned': 834, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1443749627}
review:
This game was a bit disappointing.  It's an older style of graphics, which look rather weak in comparison to what people are used to these days, and the movements were clunky.  I also found that the game would bug randomly and not allow me to do the hidden object puzzles, so I would have to go out to the menu and begin the game agian to make it work.  This was frustrating, but it at least did not hinder my ability to finish the game.   Besides that, the game is short and not terribly well written plot-wise.

This being said, the mini-games were actually quite entertaining, I liked how the game map was used as opposed to being an add-on, and I liked that the locations were self-contained and you didn't have to run all over the map to find that little key or that random oil can which has no uses until almost the end.  I wouldn't recommend spending a lot of money on this game, but if you're getting it on a discount for under a dollar and you want something to blow an evening on, it isn't the worst game I've played in the genre before.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137826709', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1440567472}
review:
セール時の9円に釣られて買ったゲーム。
内容は8割ほどが隠されたオブジェクトを見つけるパズル。
小学館のミッケに近いといえば想像してもらえる気がする。
2時間足らずで実績1つ残してクリアしてしまったので実績収集マニアにはおすすめかも。
やりこみ要素は薄いためゲームをガッチリしたい人にはお勧めできない。

author: {'steamid': '76561198174896385', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 512, 'last_played': 1443420876}
review:
Sinister City เป็นเกมแนว Point&Click
ผมซื้อมาตอนลดราคาเหลือ 3บ. อย่างที่เรารู้ๆกันว่า
เกม Steam ราคาไม่เกิน 5บ.
ซื้อตอนลดราคา เอา Card ไปขายต่อยังไงก็คุ้มแล้วครับ

เนื้อหาของเกมเรื่องมันก็ดูตลกๆ เกี่ยวกับพระเอก
ที่ตามหาเจ้าสาวที่โดน Vampire จับตัวไป

สำหรับตัว GamePlay ก็ไม่ได้มีอะไรมาก
เกมแนวเล่นไปตามฉาก Click หาของเรื่อยๆ แนว Casual
ผมซื้อมาเล่นเปลี่ยนบรรยากาศเกมอื่น
เกมแนวนี้ถ้าจะบอกว่าดี ก็คงต้องโฟกัสที่
1 เนื้อเรื่อง สำหรับเนื้อเรืองเกมนี้
ก็ถือว่าพอใช้ได้นะ ก็สนุกแบบเรื่อยๆ
2 การออกแบบเส้นทางการเนื้อเรื่อง
เพราะ GamePlay มันมีแค่ Click หาของที่กองรวมๆกัน
และก็ภาพที่สวยรวม มี Animation
เกมนี้ก็ทำใช้ได้อีกนั่นละครับ ภาพไม่ได้สวยอะไรมากแต่ก็ไม่ได้แย่
ก็ตามราคานั่นละครับ ^^
3 puzzle ต่างๆที่แทรกตามเกม
ซึ่งก็มี puzzle ต่างๆที่เล่นสนุกแทรกตามทาง
ก็ถือว่าพอใช้ได้พอให้เล่นเพลินๆนั่นละ


ผมว่าเกมนี้ ดีกว่าเกมขยะหลายๆ เกมที่ซื้อเอา Card แล้วรกเต็ม Library นะ
มันลดราคาก็ซื้อไว้เล่นตอนว่างๆได้ครับ

author: {'steamid': '76561198057330300', 'num_games_owned': 353, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1457283968}
review:
Costa meno di un caffè in Emilia Romagna, spesso addirittura in sconto anche nel bundle con Prague Legends. 

Però onestamente è un porting da tablet fatto con i piedi.
Non è stata neppure cambiata la didascalia "Tocca per continuare".
La traduzione in italiano dei sottotitoli è fatta con un traduttore automatico e ci sono pure errori ortografici, per non dire di senso ("spring" tradotto "primavera" invece di "molla").
Molti oggetti si trovano cliccando semplicemente a caso. Ci sono di oggetti da spostare per trovarne altri, ma lo si capisce solo cliccando tutto il cliccabile a caso. I fondali rendono gli oggetti stessi un po' confusi.
Alcuni puzzle invece non sono niente male, e la storia - (volutamente??) assurda prende in giro i luoghi comuni delle avventure grafiche.

Però alla fine non è realmente divertente, ed è questo che conta in un gioco per quanto sia a buon mercato.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013270184', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1443558779}

author: {'steamid': '76561198042357362', 'num_games_owned': 284, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 544, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 544, 'last_played': 1443454562}
{'steamid': '76561198002506911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 415, 'playtime_forever': 740, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1443328111}
review: While the game itself as a hidden object game is not bad, it's the bugs and glitches that makes this game difficult to recommend.  The game is simple, the graphics are basic and the sound/voice acting are mediocre compared to others of the same genre that I've played.  I hit a couple graphical bugs where the screen had white boxes covering up part of the hidden object scene.  I also had a bug where after finding an object in the hidden object scene it kicked me out of the scene and back to the main game.  This made it very tedious and frustrating, when casual gaming should not bring up these types of situations and emotions.  The goal is save your girlfriend from a vampire in Sinister City.  The game would be easily recommended even with its below par graphics and sound if the bugs were fixed.  I played the game twice to get all achievements, and both times I experienced these bugs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027424772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1454473358}
review:
[b][u]Game Information[/u][/b]

"Sinister City" is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game. The game was developed and published by JetDogs Studios.

[b][u]The Game Review[/u][/b]

Game Visuals

I want to mention that the visuals in the game are well done. The visuals can be adjusted in the game's option menu.

Game Audio

I want to mention that audio for the game is well done. Even though the audio is somewhat simplistic and repetitive. The audio can be adjusted in the game's option menu as well.

Gameplay

There are two different difficulty game modes to choose from: Easy and Advanced.

There is no padlock feature that is available to lock the inventory panel in place to make it stationary. The inventory panel automatically comes stationary.

The hidden object scenes consist of the following: Traditional word lists and Find 'x' amount. Some of these hidden object scenes may require little or no interactions. (Please be aware that in one of the hidden object scenes, there is a bug/glitch, it causes you to exit the scene every time; when you collect the item. Reinstalling the game would fix the problem.)

The puzzles are fairly easy to solve without having the need to skip any of them.

There are seventeen different achievements to unlock from playing the game. Each of these achievements does come with some requirements that need to be completed before they can be unlocked.

Miscellaneous

There are five different trading cards to collect. Only three of those trading cards are given out by the game. There are several ways to get the rest of the trading card: Purchased from Steam's Community Market; Trade with friends; Booster Packs and its' Booster Pack Creator.

Final thoughts: I have found the game enjoyable to a certain extent. Even though there was a glitch/bug in the game. The replay value for the game is low. I would not recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113485180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1443362341}
review:
[h1] [b]  Não Recomendo. [/b]	[/h1]

Eu sinceramente dou chance a cada um dos jogos que compro, por mais que eles possam parecer ruins. Sinister City teve sua chance, e não me agradou em nada. Achei que seria similar a um outro jogo da mesma desenvolvedora, com temática baseada em Frankenstein, mas esse jogo simplesmente não conseguiu me divertir. A história é muito mal escrita, todos os personagens são chatos, os puzzles são repetitivos e chatos de se resolver... A única coisa boa é que tem cartas colecionáveis. Consegui recuperar o dinheiro que paguei nesse jogo (algo em torno de 50 centavos) e ainda lucrei um pouco. Se quer o jogo apenas pelas cartas, só deixe o jogo aberto no menu e vá fazer outra coisa. Deixe em segundo plano até conseguir as três cartas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026806776', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 302, 'playtime_forever': 773, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1444174682}
review:
If you're [b]serious[/b] about your hidden-object gaming... [i]why???[/i]  Seriously, this isn't chess!  But nonetheless, if for some reason you're  [b]serious[/b] about hidden object gaming, you'd do better to avoid Sinister City.  It doesn't take itself remotely seriously, and there are some serious weaknesses in the game design.

If you're just looking for some brief, cheap, casual fun, though, Sinister City can be just the quick, entertaining, romp you need.  The puzzles are few, the HO scenes pretty easy, so there's little to distract you from running through the goofy, parodic story that plays around with the classics of vampire film.  While there's nods to [i]Nosferatu[/i] and Lugosi's classic portrayal of Dracula, Sinister City clearly draws its influence from schlockier fare like [i]Plan 9 from Outer Space[/i] and the low-budget Hammer Horror films.  If not laugh-out-loud funny, the story is at least far more entertaining than a typical HOG plot.

Gameplay is the weakness here.  Your next action is frequently unintuitive; you often cannot pick up an item you'll obviously need until explicitly told to collect it.  At one point, an object's graphic failed to load, leaving me to collect a white rectangle.  At another time, the game glitched so that I could not progress -- exiting and reopening the game solved the problem, though.  Finally, Sinister City relies on a mechanism where objects that are not your current targets must be clicked to move them, to discover target objects behind them.  This means you must click pretty much everything, rather than just hunting targets.  What's more, an object that was immobile in a previous visit to an HO screen might spontaneously become movable at a later time, requiring you to click everything on every visit to a screen, in order to not miss a potentially hidden target object.

At the price, especially if on special, I can't not recommend this game.  Tolerate the gameplay; enjoy the story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003693447', 'num_games_owned': 1616, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1441419683}
review:
This game is the first game I played from Jetdogs Studios and the least polished, Not a bad game but their other two Frankenstein: Master of Death and Alchemy Mysteries: Prague Legends are much better than this, if you've already completed those first don't expect the same from this one. 

Pros:
- Very few objects repeated
- More objects to find in the puzzles than their other games
- Easy to follow story
- Steam Acheivments and Trading Cards
- Price
- Nice cutscenes
- Soundtrack Free as DLC (though I don't particularly rememeber the music for this game it's always nice when a game has a free soundtrack.)

Cons:
- Length, This game is easily completable in an hour and a half on advanced mode which means even longer of just leaving it open to idle while waiting for cards to drop if you want those.
- Whlle the voice acting was more varied in this than their other two games i didn't find it very enjoyable.
- No Replayability
- Bugs, This game isn't as polished, twice I encountered bugs where every time I clicked one of the objects in the puzzle it would back me out and I would have to go back into the puzzle. Only fixable by restarting the game.
- No fast travel, This shouldn't really be a complaint but when both of their other games have it and this one doesn't with even more back tracking it really needed it.
- Normal hints on the puzzle are fine but this game really doesn't tell you where you need to go most of the time where the other two did via their fast travel system.

Overall Score: 6/10 I was pretty harsh on this game, it was the first hidden object game I played by Jetdogs Studios and the least enjoyable. It's still a playable game and has a good amount of hidden object gameplay to it but it's just not quite the same quality as their other products. I would be giving it a 5 instead of a 6 due to the bug i encountered twice but I didn't see anyone else complaining about the same bug, Additionally the free soundtrack is a nice touch.

In the end if you need a hidden object game there are better to play and worse to play, If you enjoy games by Jetdogs by all means get this you can tell it's one of their games. But if you haven't played one by them play their other ones first, Save this one for later so you don't put yourself off of the experiances their games can provide.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072110088', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 125, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1443107914}
review:
Sinister City ist ein Wimmelbildspiel / Hidden Object Game indem wir unsere Verlobte aus den Klauen ihres vaters befreien müssen. Denn dieser ist ein mächtiger Vampir und möchte sie mit einem Filmstar verheiraten.
Das Spiel hat einen seltsamen Humor,  es gibt sich Mühe lustig zu sein. Ich für meinen Teil fand' das Outro / Extro / Videosequenz während der Credits lustiger als das gesamte Spiel.
Es erwarten uns zahlreiche Minispiele und Wimmelbilder, viele Dialoge und eine eigenartige Story / Handlungsablauf.

Sinister City kann man ziemlich schnell (unter 2,5 Stunden) auf 100% Errungenschaftsrate bringen, für den Preis von 0,99Cent kann man nicht meckern, ich selbst bezahlte in einem Bundle nur 0,29Cent für 2 Spiele.
Eine Fortsetzung scheint ebenfalls zu kommen, bzw. sieht es während der letzten Videosequenz stark danach aus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057528080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1491944001}
review: Более баганой игры в жизни не видел. Не могу поверить, что без скидки она может стоить 80р.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985000150', 'num_games_owned': 578, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1443200016}
review:
I can't be sure that the humour is either offbeat and clever or so wide of the mark that it's cringeworthy, a bit of both really. 
The story is insane and the voice-acting is terrible but these seem to be the norm for the more basic games of the genre. 

It's okay, but far from the first Hidden Object game you should try. I paid 15p for it in a sale and i'd be annoyed if i'd paid any more than that for what the game offers, especially as in total it offers around 4 hours gametime for 2 play-through's on both modes.
"Normal" mode though is a joke as if you just stop to look for 5 seconds then the screen lights-up telling you where everything is, it doesn't give you nearly enough time to search for yourself.

Objects to be moved bear no distinction to background objects. So often you will find you cannot see what you need on the screen and you have no way of knowing which objects can be pushed aside to reveal more.
The only way to get around this is to play it on "Normal" difficulty and have the game tell you where you're supposed to be going next then remember for the next time. I can't imagine playing "Advanced" mode without this knowledge; it would be uber-frustrating. 

The game is locked to a 4:3 image stretched to widescreen: there is no option to reset the ratio. This is the first and only game that has ever done this to me so i just ignored it and played regardless; not going to upset my gfx settings for 1 game.

Overall it's a thumbs-down from me, there are much better HOG's out there and you only really need play this one if you've literally exhausted the other offerings out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066473814', 'num_games_owned': 768, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1443115146}
review:
Ein Spiel mit Bugs, schrecklicher Story und frustrierenden Wimmelbildern.
Die Story sollte wahrscheinlich lustig rüberkommen, ist aber absolut lächerlich und... einfach nur schlecht.
Das einzig gute an dem Spiel sind die Achievements und ein paar seltene, lustige Stellen (und Sammelkarten, wenn man denn das Spiel offen halten möchte, um diese zu bekommen, denn 2h reichen, um Sinister City durchzuspielen).

author: {'steamid': '76561198117382911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1442960597}
review: Es un juego con muchos bugs, malos gráficos, una historia un tanto rara y cutre, pero si quieres reirte por como está montado el juego y su historia, es ideal, te partiras de risa con su historia. Además, tiene rompecabezas complicados porque a veces no se ve lo que estás buscando debido a los malos gráficos, de hecho, por ejemplo, en uno de ellos lo que parece ser un guisante en realidad es una abeja. Bueno aun así, le doy el visto bueno porque es entretenido a pesar de todos los defectos que tenga.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122562742', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1441736811}
review: [h1] Игра очень интересная, окупает свою стоимость т.е 3 рубля. [/h1] Быстро проходиться, не напрягает.  Вообще игры где нужно найти предметы или разгадать загадки, мне очень нравятся.  Sinister City  имеет некоторые баги, но игра очень старая и это ей простительно, даже спустя столько времени с её выхода, в неё можно ещё играть. [i] У компании выпустившей эту игру, есть ещё подобные игры и они тоже стоят очень дешево и так же очень интересны. [/i] Ещё хороший плюс от игры это карточки, которые окупают стоимость игры. 10 евреев из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007688772', 'num_games_owned': 1263, 'num_reviews': 649, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1442663001}
review:
It's not that bad.
Yes, the story is silly but on the other hand it's original, charming and I appreciate they tried to do something different. I even had some good laughs. Hidden object scenes also use original approach, combining words with graphical clues and spreading the objects across multiple scenes.
There are some bugs but the game is playable. The only serious problem was that after certain action I was unable to do anything else; thankfully restarting the game helped.
For such a small price I can easily recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017967750', 'num_games_owned': 1537, 'num_reviews': 1327, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1441893592}
review:
Although I liked the game - 3 hours of 'challenge' for only 0,09 eurocents - I don't recommend it to anyone demanding.
The game has not awesome graphics. The plot is barely funny or interesting, but game had some funny moments. It's more simplistic than any other HOG [hidden object game] and it takes very short time to beat it.

It's awfully funny.

I don't know what to say - the trailer basically shows everything in this game.
So yeah, if you like simple and ridiculous games, buy it.
If you like hidden object games - buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069436762', 'num_games_owned': 460, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1442368318}
review:
Sinister City is a small hidden-object point-and-click adventure game about vampires.

Let me get the first thing out of the way; the graphics are terrible, the voice acting doesn't match the movements of the characters. I often found the main character standing in places that made no sence (Ie, outside of the hotel, floating in the middle of the door, or standing on top of the garbage can) That is the only bad things I am saying about Sinister City in this review - so if you can't over look those, you can move along now.

Now to the good points: It's very, very original. I love the storyline, I adore the characters, and despite not lining up correctly, I love the voice acters. You do enough moving around the game that it doesn't get boring easily, although at the same time I would love if it had some more variety to it - although that's not a big issue. It can be slightly hard to find your main objective objects in scenes if you're not sure what you're doing, so I reccomend playing on beginner's mode first.

Now the main conclusion... Even if you can't or don't want to get through this full game on your own, I promise it is worth it. It is a fairly short game (Maybe about 2 hours for me to complete), but the ending scenes are so funny, and really make a nice tie-in for the end of the game. Over all, I reccomend this game - more so to those who have good patience- and am definately going to play it again. A wonderful deal for $1.09 (Or .99 like I got it) or whatever else the price may be for you. Buy this game. You won't be disapointed for long

author: {'steamid': '76561198096353530', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1442254774}

author: {'steamid': '76561198116619923', 'num_games_owned': 2440, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1442331056}

author: {'steamid': '76561198013821234', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 455, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 455, 'last_played': 1442514374}
review: A très petit prix ce petit jeu sans prétention d'énigmes et objets cachés est bien sympatique. Il faut le prendre comme son histoire, un nanard sur une histoire loufoque de vampires un peu ratés. La technique du jeu aussi ;), très drôle à prendre au second degré et la musique est très réussie. Je le recommande à très bas prix.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009479699', 'num_games_owned': 4296, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1442216375}
review: I love HIdden object games so it may make my views a little bias.  If you have not played HOG games before I would suggest you look else where, because this game might make you hate them before you have given the genre a chance.  I have played a little so far and probably plan on finishing it eventually.  This game is filler at best and not in a good way.  There are very poor tutorials and the graphics feel a little dated, then again this could be just a re-port of an older title.  When compared to other HOG games I have played this game does not seem very polished.  The voice acting is hokey,  Im not sure if it is intentional or not but it is not very good. The graphic are okay I guess but the lips of the characters don't appear to syc up with the speech.  The game comes off like a very jerky hybrid of a point and click adventure game that is trying to be an HOG game, and the soundtrack doesn't fit with the game in my opinion.  Im not sure but I don't think the way the game mechanics are very well explained and leaves you hunting around.  Honestly can I reccomend it?  Barely.  The price is not so high that you are really going to regret it (At the time it was $1.09).  If you can get it cheaper by all means do it.  But yeah if you are looking to start playing HOG games this is not for you.  As an HOG fan, sure I can reccomend IF you have tried the best why not try the rest.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071946975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 745, 'last_played': 1441800138}
review:
会話のドッヂボールが楽しいアドベンチャーゲーム。
主人公「今○○な状況なので解決を助けてください」
相手「わかった、とりあえずエアコンを付けよう。修理してきてくれ」
みたいな脈絡ない会話が続いて「おいおい」ってなりながらも笑える作品。

日本語訳に難があるのか、途中、男の主人公と女性キャラの口調が逆転して主人公が女口調になったりする。
ちょっとした映画を見る感覚でやれば楽しめると思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198201919969', 'num_games_owned': 2298, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1442100967}

author: {'steamid': '76561198170425167', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 591, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 591, 'last_played': 1442006313}
review: Game curto constituído de diálogos sem opção de escolha, diálogos com legendas em português disponíveis, podemos achar objetos em locais determinados de forma que, mesmo que você não ache estes objetos, é só sair clicando que você os encontra e alguns puzzles fáceis. Gráficos bem ultrapassados, musicas adequadas a trama, dublagens medianas, ambientação adequada para a história do game, história que é de filmes de sessão da tarde. Comigo crashou duas vezes, precisei reiniciar o game para continuar. Um bom custo/diversão, ideal para quem quer aumentar o percentual de conquistas na Steam sem “ajuda”.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065637682', 'num_games_owned': 1146, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1442072611}
review:
[h1] Análisis de Sinister City [/h1]

➥Te gustan los vampiros y los juegos género "Point & Click"? Pues juntemos estos dos aspectos y adéntrate en Sinister City a rescatar a tu prometida Nina de las garras del Conde Orlock. 

➥Juego de búsqueda donde tendrás que agudizar tu vista y encontrar objetos ocultos, buscar pistas y completar puzles. Bastante fácil, entretenido y con unos gráficos e historia muy aceptables. 

➥Si te gusta este género, es un buen título para añadir a la biblioteca, 17 logros que consigues fácilmente si tienes la vista entrenada. Lo compré en un pack que estaba muy bien de precio, todo depende de lo que quieras pagar por él. 5/10.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=516333461

author: {'steamid': '76561198093766818', 'num_games_owned': 274, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1441798715}
review:
セールで９円の割りに面白かったです
ミッケとかウォーリーを探せが好きな人にオススメ
日本語字幕あって英語できなくても大丈夫（ちょくちょく誤訳ぽいのあり）
ストーリーは一応あるけど茶番感がすごいので謎解きに集中

決してできない難易度ではないのでサクサク謎解きと宝探しして終わりという感じで
２週目とかやりこみ要素とか隠し要素は皆無
ちょっと意味わかんない伏線ぽいのもあるけどたぶんなんもない

普通に１週終わると実績も全部解除するので終わった後何も残らない感じいいです

author: {'steamid': '76561198129680513', 'num_games_owned': 802, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 427, 'last_played': 1441729857}
review:
I left the game occasionally, and I played it three times to get all the achievements.
There is an achievement to play without skip any dialogue, and I accidentally skipped it on second attempt.
That's why my play time is more than 7 hours.
It shouldn't need more than 2 hours to finish this game.

The story is about John finding his girlfriend Nina, who is gone missing.
It is then revealed that she has been held captive by Count Dracula Orlok.
You play as John, find a way to rescue Nina.

Sound interesting right? But the plot twist makes it rather awkward.

[h1]Pros :[/h1]
[list]
[*]This game do hidden object thing well, the objects are blend well with the background. 7/10
[*]There are many mini games and puzzles. It's not too hard and not too easy either, even a kid can play this game. 9/10
[*]Full voice over, though the actor is not experienced enough with voice tone. I give more scores to a game with full voice over than ordinary games. Voice actors are not cheap. 7/10
[*]Achievements are few and easy to get. I don't like games with plenty of hard and troublesome achievements. 9/10
[/list]

[h1]Cons :[/h1]
[list]
[*]Plain story. Really... The ending is awkward
[*]I see an object with just a blank white box. It seems that the texture is missing.
[*]In some screen, the background and the npc is not matched. See my screenshot. John looked like he's floating. He should had appear lower.
[*]The dialog between John and NPC is kind of weird.
[/list]

Overall I give 7/10 for a dollar game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198193263082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1442069298}
review:
Apesar de ser um jogo simples, é até legal.
As quests são muito fáceis, mas até que são divertidas.
A história é bastante fraca e os gráficos são meio runs mas o jogo vicia.
A dublagem dele está cheia de erros, mas tem dublagem pelo menos, um exemplo, você tem que achar uma taça de vinho, mas fala que você tem que achar um óculos...
Mas eu recomendo muito esse jogo pq ele é legal e barato, ele custa R$2,19 mas eu comprei ele por 0,21 em uma promoção....Espero que se alguém comprar o jogo por esse comentário, tenha a mesma opinião do que eu ;)

review: O game Sinister City e infelismente uma piada de mal gosto pros games,ao contrario do Alchemy Mysteries Prague Legends q esse sim vc interage com os desafios e tem quebra cabeças muito interessantes, o game Sinister Citye e ridicularmente facil e o pior a historia e pobre ou melhor podre ! por favor né ? pelo amor de Deus ! eu faço uma historia melhor q essa,a historia do vampiro com crisi de meia idade foi ridiculo pra não dizer bizarro ! fora q por alguma razão maluca os os enigmas são bem mais faceis do q no game Alchemy Mysteries Prague Legends q nesse sim os enigmas e misterios são mais complicados,bom enfim o game Sinister City serve pra vc q nunca jogo um game do genero de investigação do tipo olhe o cenario e aponte com a seta do mouse e clic ,não tem a melhor historia do mundo mais já e uma experiencia bem divertida ! recomendo !

author: {'steamid': '76561198024972696', 'num_games_owned': 319, 'num_reviews': 262, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1441507058}
review:
It's a shame that "Sinister City" is marred by technical issues.  It's a tongue-in-cheek vampire Hidden Object Game (HOG) that's got good graphics, nice puzzles and mini-games, and darn good voice acting (far better than the norm for the HOG genre).  The story is simple but interesting and the poking of fun at normal HOGs is really well done.  But, the game does suffer from bugs and some irritating design decision.

The poor design decisions are firstly that if you're playing the game in either Easy or Advanced mode, the cursor does not change to indicate hot, live, or actionable areas.  That means that as you search the scene, you have no idea if you can pick something up, use something, open a HOG or mini-game, talk to someone, or even just leave the scene.  Easy mode puts a sparkle on the screen after a few seconds for the next thing you should be doing.  But, you end up watching for that and blindly following it instead of thinking about what's showing.  In Advanced mode, there's no sparkle.  So, you're essentially reduced to just clicking on everything possible in the hopes that something will happen.  Secondly, the mini-games have no instructions at all.  It's not just that there's nothing telling you how you need to manipulate things.  It's also that there's no explanation of what the win-state (i.e., what you're supposed to do) is.  And finally, In the HOGs, the items you're searching for can be so small as to be indistinguishable.  Similarly, the HOG scenes usually have in-focus/out-of-focus, lighted/non-lighted areas implying where you're supposed to be looking for things.  Nope.  The items can be anywhere at all (the out of focus ones were a real treat).

As for bugs, I first tried playing the game in Advanced mode.  I quickly got to a point where nothing I clicked on would activate anything.  I could do no HOGs nor leave the scene.  I had to start a new game in Easy mode to play.  There are also several places where the character floats over the pavement.  In one such scene, there IS no pavement.  The characters are both floating in air.

It's a shame that those issues are spoiling an otherwise very good game.  But, at the current list price of $0.99, I can live with it (it took me 2.4 hours for my playthrough on Easy -- but I still have to go through on Advanced to get 100% Achievements).  So, I'm recommending the game.

EDIT:  I've confirmed the bug I ran into earlier.  In Advanced mode, once you're given the task to collect the magic keys to unlock the mirror, none of the active points will activate.  IOW, you can't enter the two HOGs in the area to get what you need and you can't leave the area to get some other items and unlock the mirror.  I worked around this by exiting the game, re-entering it, and selecting Continue.  When the game loaded up the scene where I was, I could finish the scene (and game) without further problems.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046807512', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 915, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 915, 'last_played': 1441465610}
review:
Criticare questo gioco mi sembra un pò come sparare sulla croce rossa.

Abbiamo un buon potenziale da avventura punta e clicca azzoppato da una scrittura e da uno spirito del tutto fuori luogo. Forse sono io a non averlo preso per il verso giusto, ma il modo in cui è narrato fa piangere il cuore ad ogni appassionato di vampiri, sembra una manifestazione di "american idiots" in salsa Dracula.

Il gameplay è basico, si può muovere il personaggio per la stanza (a volte per qualche bug non si può), per osservare questa o quella zona di interesse, e lì bisogna cliccare su tutta una serie di oggetti da collezionare. Alla lunga è sempre la stessa minesta e ci si annoia, però la qualità di certi disegni lo rende gradevole. 

La traduzione italiana è volenterosa ma sballata e risulta del tutto fuorviante quando si vuole collezionare un oggetto che non corrisponde minimamente al nome indicato. Un pò a casaccio un pò per intuizione ci si arriva.

Paradossalmente, se avesse avuto meno pretese, sarebbe stato un gioco molto più interessante. Non c'era bisogno di animazioni 3D e di legnose animazioni, così come la scrittura di quei dialoghi e il loro doppiaggio fanno venir voglia di suicidarsi.

Ecco, avete presente i b-movie? Questo è un b-game, totalmente privo di atmosfera, con un finto umorismo fuori luogo.
Lo stile da punta e clicca funziona solo in parte, e troppa ripetitività.

Preso in saldo per le carte, non ha molto da offrire...

Voto 5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198047893285', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1678422577}
review:
I don't know what people are smoking when they give this game a bad review. When you buy a 9 cent game, you are most likely going to get a 9 cent game. And for 9 cents, you are getting a lot.

 I was pleseantly surprised at the amount of enjoyment I got out of this game.  It's a point and click adventure with some puzzles mixed in their of varying difficulty. The story is a lot of fun and the achievements aren't too hard to get. I got all but 3 of the achievements on my first playthrough. I will probably get the rest on my second playthrough around halloween! :) The only downside of the game is that it is a littly buggy but nothing too extreme. I had to restart once or twice.

I would definently recommend purchasing this game on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141404871', 'num_games_owned': 910, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 571, 'last_played': 1443347206}
review:
Vampy and campy, twitchy and glitchy, and if this game was a movie it would be shown during the late night double feature creature picture shows where all good "bad" B-rated flicks were shown.

Spoof parody of vampires and B-rated flicks in Hollywood, complete with an otaku vampire fan boy of Bela Lugosi and Nosferatu who wants to become an actor and play Count Dracula in his own film.  Since the otaku fan boy is having a mid-life crisis (at 500 years old), he is causing grief for his daughter and her fiance, who has come to find her.

For the amusement value alone this game is worth the playthrough (and the price of 99 cents).  How serious can the storyline (or the characters, for that matter) really be when the News Station is called "Plan 9"? 

Trivia 1: Plan 9 from Outer Space (1959) starring Bela Lugosi directed by Ed Wood is considered to be the worst creature feature ever made. 
Trivia 2:  Bela Lugosi's protrayal of Dracula (1931) in some circles is still considered one of the best. 
Trivia 3: The 1922 black and white German silent film 'Nosferatu: A Symphony of Horror' is considered to be a cinematic influential masterpiece, and even by today's standards is still considered to be one of the best Dracula movies ever made.  (Dracula's name in the film was changed to Count Orlock.) 
Trivia 4: Jonathan Harker and "Mina" Murray were the bethrothed and eventually married "lovers" in Bram Stroker's 'Dracula'.

Gameplay is twitchy and glitchy (if stuck just exit the game then hit continue when coming back).  There are no  instructions for any puzzles, so previous puzzle experience and a bit of intuition is needed.  (I got stuck once and had to look up the solution, which is randomized I discovered on a different playthrough.)  Plenty of HO scenes to do, and not the usual type of getting an object at the end.  I sorta wondered the entire time why the HOs scenes were even there but they do serve a purpose.  In some ways this game feels like an experiment in third person play by Jet Dogs Studios and reminscent of how Syberia and Niburu plays, without defined instructions on what to do or where to look.     

Worth a look and at least one playthrough just for the campy cheesiness of it.  (This would be perfect fodder for MSTies  (Mystery Science Theatre 3000)).

author: {'steamid': '76561198025248568', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1441291917}
review: Игра просто не хочет что-бы в нее играли. Пытаешься начать играть в оконном режиме - игра открывает Greenlight, пришлось играть в полноэкранном режиме. После того как поиграл полчасика, выходишь, запускаешь на следующий день и пытаешься продолжить игру - открывается Greenlight. Неудивительно что за такую парашу со скидкой предлагали 2р.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113018027', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1441278094}
review:
This is a very nice hidden object game. I'm surprised of the negative reviews!!

It is funny and has surprisingly a very good voice acting! The characters and dialogs are really done very well! It has memorable characters although the story is very short but in my opinion it is much better story than most hidden object games.

If you want a cliche hidden objects game with puzzles, then this is not the one to recommend, but if you want a very nice short story and funny, then this is one of the best games really. 

The price is so low, that made me doubt its quality, but I'm glad I did. It surprised me with how funny it is. 

The only negative thing is the story should be longer, but in the end I recommended it and give it 9/10 if you want to spend your time with funny story  :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198179292281', 'num_games_owned': 251, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1441208427}
review:
It was the first hidden object game I ever played (as far as I remember), so I'm not a real fan of this sort of games and have no experience playing them. In this case, the Sinister City was really entertaining game to me. Honestly, for the money asked for this title, you could get many worse Steam games, so nothing to complain about. 
It took me 1,5h to finish the game, and I did it in one go. Why? Because it was funny, hilarious, and had some riddles to be solved. In terms of graphics, this production is not a top-notch title, but it's good enough. So, if you have an extra 1,5h of your time, buy this game, enjoy its light story and relaxing gameplay, and wander around the Sinister City.

review:
This is hidden object/ puzzle game. If you don't like those kind of games, don't pick it.
I got this game from huge sale (price was 0.09€) and I have to say I might be even positivily supprised.
It's worth of that small money. Even if and when we forget the stupid trading cards.

It's not best masterpiece in gaming history, but it fills its spot on this genre very well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090472752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1441129122}
review:
[h1]「アレ探してきて！」「コレ作って！」そして疲労感が残る。[/h1]

おすすめしないの表示ですが、自分はそれなりに楽しめました。
とはいえセール時に9円で買ったからプレイしたようなものです。
というか9円じゃなきゃ見向きもしないと思うよ！

一言で言えばモノ探し(おつかい)＋パズルのミニゲーム集。
スマホとかでありそう…というかタップとか書いてる時点でスマホやタブレット向けだコレ！

ストーリーは重々しそうなテーマな割には真逆で軽いノリで進んでいきます。
B級と書かれてますがC級のノリです。そういう意味では先の展開が全く読めないと言っても過言じゃない。
最後のオチは…まぁあれでいいか。いいだろう。いいとしよう！

このゲームの特徴として、カジュアルモードにはガイド機能がついています。
一定時間なにもしないでいると次に探すべき場所が光ります。その光った場所でモノ探しをすればいいだけです。
そして、時間回復するヒントボタンが搭載されており、モノ探しパートでも難なく探しものが見つかります。

ゲームとしてはかなり単調、ただし[b]やってる間の没入感[/b]は意外とあります。
とはいえ、クリア後の達成感は先述のガイド機能のせいでほぼ無し…というか一ゲーム終わらせた後のなんとも言えない疲労感が襲ってきます。
そのため、クリアだけしたいならこれからプレイするジョン(主人公の名前)は買ってインストールしたあとぶっ通しでやってください。
途中で中断するとまず再開することはないでしょう。まずガイド機能を使わずとも2時間ちょっとでできますし。

最後に、Sinister Cityは悪いゲームでもつまらないゲームでもありません。
自分には終わった後に疲労感が大きく残ったので、あえておすすめしないをつけただけです。やっている間の没入感は本当にあります。
でも買うならセールの時に買うべきかもしれない。

しっかしこういうゲームの楽しみ方って何かに似てるんだよなぁ…
なんかこう、午○のロー○ショーでやってるような映画を見てる時のような…うん。

Although put together well, it would be a cold day in hell before I recommend a game from the farthest, most hellish depths of gaming: point and click item find games. I actually found a game now where I can without pause say that I would truly rather be playing Warehouse and Logistics Simulator.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142934082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1441074300}
review:
Endearingly awful...  :)

Cheesy B-movie acting, a plot that doesn't even pretend to take itself seriously, and some amusing jokes - for a mere $0.10 on sale I really can't complain too much!  It was a little dull at times, and the excuses for making you go find stuff were lame, but it was a couple of hours of mild entertainment for almost nothing.

The characters who inhabit Hidden Object Games are some of the messiest people I've ever seen - I'm no longer surprised by the piles of junk they seem to have in all their cupboards and corners and desks.  Unfortunately in this game, some of the objects you were asked to find were barely visible behind other objects (just a tiny piece poking out), were hard to see clearly, were named oddly, or were completely hidden behind other objects that you probably wouldn't know you could move unless the hint sparkles told you so...  

Speaking of which, the 'easy' mode was far too easy.  Pause in your random clicking for mere seconds and the game would show you what you needed to find, without you asking it for help.  That said, though, some tasks or locations seemed so obscure that I'm not sure I would have known I could look closer at a particular spot in the room if it hadn't shown me.

I did encounter one bug, where the game refused to respond to my clicking and I thought I'd have to restart, but it was fixed by going to the main menu and then continuing the game.  Other than that, the only issues I encountered were with the clicks picking up objects I wasn't actually clicking on in some cases, which may have something to do with it apparently being a mobile port (I presume, what with it telling you to 'tap here' or to swipe the screen in order to complete a mini game).

I had a few laughs while playing, and especially at the end credits - I'm not sure I would have been happy to pay full price even though it IS cheap, but on sale it's worth a play through.  Just don't expect anything serious and you'll be okay!  :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198107528992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1441041404}
review:
セールで9円という安さで購入したので、
余り期待はしてませんでしたが意外と面白かったです。

ゲーム内容は海外で流行っているタイプの○○を探せ系です。
指定されたアイテムをごちゃごちゃ大量にある中から探し出して
集めたら進行していくタイプのゲームです。

ゲーム的にポピュラーすぎて海外の人には、
ありふれたゲームなので評判は良くないようですが、
日本には余りなじみのないタイプのゲームですので、
日本人がプレイするには丁度良い感じです。

キャラクターも洋ゲーにしては日本人にも
余り違和感を感じない感じで主人公はイケメンだし、
ヒロインも結構美人で良い感じです。

この手のゲームは基本ストーリーが全くないようなものが多いですが、
このゲームには、きちんとストーリーがあり日本人好みじゃないかなと思います。
婚約した彼女の父親に結婚直前で止められて、あとを追ったら彼女が
実は○○○でという感じで個人的には面白いストーリーでした。

あと個人的に良い印象を持ったのが○○を集めてこい系が終わった後に、
ちょくちょくパズルが入るわけですが中々今まで見たことがないタイプの
パズルもあって楽しめました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198188927953', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1467451577}
review:
I just finished this game a few minutes ago and was worth the $0.11 and was a good b grade Stephen King horror like game and you are trying to save the girl you love from her father and had a interesting story. When doing the hint button it can be spooky as a it sounds like that and also I have seen the negative views and some people did experience bugs, but I never did and was able to play the game till the end. If not using the hint system to solve puzzles then it can take longer as you are doing them on your own. 

Sometimes some objects can be tricky  but still enjoyable and also worth the price as the game is well made and more character development could of been added in and maybe more vampires trying to stop you form reaching your goal. This is worth the money and time as it is only a few hours, and have noticed that when collecting objects more get thrown in and you spend more time finding objects since the story is not that strong and still good to pass the time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141453390', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1440956535}
review:
крутая игруха прошел очень быстро еще и лвл прокачал.
+ халявнвя прокачка лвл стима на 210хр себе и 100хр другу всего за 4р. еще и карточку за 5 продал. в итоге даже в + ушел)) 
Кароче схема такая, покупаете игру себе и другу(+10хр за покупку игры). Играете в нее часа 2-3 вам дают по 3 карточки.  Товарищ отправляет  карточки вам - вы создаете значек(+100хр вам) и получаете фон и смайлик. 6 карточку продаете(возвращаете себе свои деньги ). смайлик переделываете в самоцветы(+100хр за первую перековку дают и значек). Дружбану отправляете фон(с этой игры можно не ждать неделю для отправки дропа) и он или оставляет его себе или перековывает в самоцветы(+100хр вашему кенту). Ну вот как то так. Кому занятся нечем, как мне например) - попробуйте.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978705200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 250, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1440952935}
review:
Sinister City is a ghoulish adventure that will frighten you to the bone, seize your soul, and cause your blood to run cold. You will spend the entire hour or so of this game in constant fear and...Whoops!

Got my intros mixed up.

Your fiance has been kidnapped by a vampire! Are you a bad enough dud to rescue your fiance?! Action and adventure await in Sinister City!

Hmm..Nope...That one kinda sucks too.

Truth is, there's not much to discuss when it comes to Sinister City. Not too long ago, this game was on sale for around 10 cents. On top of that, it has cards, so you're all but guaranteed to profit off of the purchase. Therefore, I'm going to assume that you already own this game, and are just reading this review because you assume there will be some funny jokes.


You know what they say about assumptions right?

In the interest of being "helpful" I'll talk about the actual game. Sinister City is a hidden-object puzzler. Look for the object, find the object, click on the object, become a winner. I must warn you though, the objects tend to be hidden. Occasionally there are puzzles to break up the monotony, but nothing too strenuous. For those exceedingly rare situations that you're actually stuck, a handy "HELP!" button is always nearby.

Not all hidden-object games are equal, and Sinister City is IMO an example of a mediocre one. The images are of a lower resolution, which makes objects muddy and difficult to spot. Yeah I know, it sounds ironic when you think about it, but bear with me on this. Another unfortunate technical issue is the prevalence of bugs. These can range from disappearing images to the game no longer properly responding to your inputs. Thankfully, these are usually cleared up by quitting to the main menu. The game saves automatically and constantly, so all you have to fear is those wacky vampires, not the possibility of losing progress.

The following couple paragraphs include SPOILERS!


----SPOILERS----

This next aspect is not so much a complaint about Sinister City, but about adventure games in general. All too often they rely on this logic that is baffling to normal human behavior. At one point in this game you have to find some books so that somebody will talk to you. There is an abandoned bookstand nearby, but the protagonist doesn't want to steal the books. In order to pay for these $20 books, he finds 75 cents in loose change scattered on the ground. If that made too much sense, consider that the protagonist steals a key from the bookstore to open a mailbox. 

Sinister City's attempts at humor are also...pretty laughable. Early on the protagonist acquires some vampire hunting equipment. He's getting geared up to kill a vampire, but then some guy points out that not everything is as it seems. The protagonist takes a closer look at a stake he picked up, and he finds the words "MADE IN CHINA" engraved on it. The "Made in China" gag is as old as time, but it doesn't work when written on a stake. A stake is a piece of wood sharpened to a point. It's possible that the Chinese stake is actually made of soft rubber, but wouldn't the protag notice that? Here's a thought: Crosses are also commonly used to fight vampires. So how about having the Cross say "MADE IN CHINA". Eh? Eh? Okay whatever. The point is this, when you're trying to make a gag out of something that's almost impossible to screw up, it doesn't really work. Yes, I have a nasty habit of nitpicking. What can I say? I love talking about mistakes. 

----END OF SPOILERS! YOU CAN BREATHE EASY NOW.----


Even with its faults, Sinister City is still an enjoyable romp. It doesn't take itself seriously at all, the voice-acting is amazing, and the game ends before you get tired of it. I'm not usually one to recommend bad games - even the ones that are "purposefully" bad - simply because they take too long to complete. This game delivers on hidden objects and puzzles, which is always nice to have when you're not in the mood for more Counterstrike or DOTA2 or Sakura Angels. It's nothing difficult, but at least it'll give you something to do if you have an hour or so to burn.

author: {'steamid': '76561198234944404', 'num_games_owned': 4933, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 991, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 991, 'last_played': 1440905873}
review:
ジャンル：
アドベンチャー+パズル
モバゲーやスマホのミステリーハウスのようなアイテムを画面から探したりパズルを解いたりするゲーム。

内容：
ゲームはホラーやミステリーっぽく、ファンタジー要素でスタートするが、中身は意外とコメディタッチな内容。
最後のオチまでしっかりと。
ストーリーは無理があったりするけど、そこはゲームのご都合主義ということで目をつむって。

難易度：
日本語対応なので悩むこともないし、ヒント機能やスキップを使えばエンディングまではいけるでしょう。
ただ、翻訳がまずいものがあるのと、日本人のイメージするものと名称が違うものがあって悩む場合がある。

画面：
人のタッチには好みがあるだろうけど、全体的に綺麗でよい。
画面酔いはまずしません。

価格：
セールで9円なので文句なし。ゲームがトレカも入るので損はしないかと。
定価だとするとコーヒー買うかこのゲーム買うかは悩むとこ。

評価：
ストーリー物が好きな人にはおすすめです。

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198162351264', 'num_games_owned': 1232, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1440514784}
review:
[h1]Why So Stingy?[/h1]
The majority of people complain that this game isn't worth the money, but come on, this game is 9 CENTS on sale and you can get the money back by selling the steam trading cards from this game. This game has some funny laughs and really questionable puzzles to solve, like the one at the start when the hotel owner makes you find his hotel room keys, when they were directly behind him all along. If you are up for a challenging game to complete and your brain to comprehend then this is the game for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078815095', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 127, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1440904757}
review:
Despite my dislike of hidden object games, I have to recommend this.

The absurd and silly story kept me interested. The voice acting was decent and mindless clicking could find most of the objects. It used all the standard tricks of hiding objects behind scenery as well as having moving scenery. 

The game also had various puzzles. If you didn't mind waiting, you could skip them, but they were fairly straight forward. I found them fairly enjoyable.

The game took under two hours and was well worth the 9 cents I paid.

review: Too bad there are several glitches in this game...otherwise it is a fun romp into the vampire world.  The game itself is commendable, but it is difficult to launch and it became hung up in three different spots.  I did stay with it and managed to play all the way through.  I discovered early on that I couldn't save the game and had to start over on my second attempt to play it to the [ funny] conclusion.  I would recommend this game if it weren't for all the bugs in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198189298709', 'num_games_owned': 545, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1441573800}
review:
Fala a verdade sobre o jogo. o Jogo é ruim pacas. é Irritante. a historia é uma bosta. E O Jogo é rapido, Mas, mesmo assim ele tem seus pontos fortes o principal é que ele dropa carta. Obvio a maioria tem por causa das cartas. pq o jogo em si não tem muito oque fazer 2/3 hrs de jogo vc termina ele e nao tem mais nd pra vc fazer. 
Os puzzle é até interessante bem legal até que gostei. Mais não é nada impossivel qualquer um que tenha um celebro consegue fazer em menos de 5 min Qualquer um. 

Pra falar a verdade só os Puzzle salva o jogo pq o resto é muito irritante. 
Pra quem vai jogar ou quer comprar ainda pra jogar. recomendo nem ir no facil ir logo no avançado. Porque simplesmente é chato jogar um jogo que o unico legal do jogo da pular e nem fazer. A fora as luzes que mostra onde tem que ir.

(O Jogo é de puzzle) nao sei pq colocaram isso. se a pessoa usa isso termina em 20 min o game. 

A Tradução do jogo é uma porcaria as vezes o jogo pede pra vc achar uma taça e vc nao acha de jeito nenhum ai vc clica em um livro ou qualquer outra coisa e vai. não sei se é bug ou é do jogo mais recomendo sair clicando na tela quando não achar nada porque oque o jogo pede pra achar nunca é oque vc acha (só as vezes) Mais não deixar de ser ruim. Eu só recomendo pq o jogo tem boms puzzles para quem gosta. e ainda por cima é barato e tem cartas! ^^

author: {'steamid': '76561198071094731', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1460919797}
review:
Ну чо, 5 карт по 3-4 рубля, значок дешевый, собрать легко, прокачиваем до 5 уровня, получаем 2 или 3 уровня.
Сама игра ну вообще не понял о чем, да и играть не хотел в это, видно, что разработчики хотели просто показать свое детище, ну вообщем, к покупке только ради карт, хотя понастольгировать о былых временах в поинт кликах можно. За 2 рубаса хоть 3 таких взять можно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044952000', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1453993656}
review:
Сегодня днём зашёл в раздел "Скидки" и решил, а почему бы мне не купить игру - [b] SINISTER CITY. [/b]

[b] Начну сегодня я нестандартно - С МИНУСОВ: [/b]

1) [i] Стандартный сюжет. [/i] Ну это классика жанра, пропал любимый человек - ты пойдёшь на край света (в нашем случае в город Sinister)
2) [i] Баги. [/i] Я встретил парочку багов, но всё же.

[b] Ну впринципе, для меня это всё из минусов, перейдём к плюсам: [/b]

1) [i] Модели пресонажей. [/i] В этой игре они сделаны превосходно.
2) [i] Цена. [/i] Цена в 29 рублей (я купил её за 2 РУБЛЯ) для такой игры (тем более она с карточками) - это отлично.

[b] На этом у меня всё, если Вы любите игры в жанре Point&Click или просто хотите пополнить свою коллекцию - берите :)  [/b]

[b] Если Вам понравился мой обзор, пожалуйста не скупитесь и поставьте лайк :) [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198119585759', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1441576629}
review: прошел игру чуть меньше чем за 2 часа а карточек не дали ни одной. 10 2рублёвых кидал из 10. но игра нормуль. за 2 рубля вообще щедевр по нынешнему курсу.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994343225', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1440869927}
review:
Хорошая игра. Покупалась по скидке за 2 рубля, но в принципе за неё не жалко отдать и полную стоимость. Приобретая её, ты, как минимум, убьешь вечер, решая не очень сложные головоломки и ища предметы (может тебя даже зацепит сюжет). Карточки  тоже есть. 
Два главных минуса: 
 -  в какие-то определенные моменты ты кликаешь на вещь, что бы её обыскать, а в итоге берешь один предмет и возвращаешься обратно. Жутко бесит, приходится по сто раз возвращаться. 
 - в те же моменты велика вероятность заслонения части игры белым экраном. Ты не видишься ничего, но при этом игра продолжается и ты даже можешь всё собрать, тупо кликая куда попало. 
Вот и всё.

author: {'steamid': '76561198242858986', 'num_games_owned': 299, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1440842338}
review:
Эта игра весьма неплоха, а очень низкая цена делает её ещё лучше.

+от графики из глаз не течёт кровь
+звуковое сопровождение не отвлекает от процесса и не перебивает диалоги
+головоломки не сильно сложные, но и не скучные
+15 из 17 ачивок открываются просто по ходу игры, а ещё две так же легко получаются за второй заход
+карточки!

-сюжет довольно странный и содержит неловкие сцены
-жуткая неведомая хрень на ветке у замка, которая по идее птица, но я не уверена (это не совсем минус, просто она меня неслабо так напугала в первый раз)

author: {'steamid': '76561197997020330', 'num_games_owned': 3759, 'num_reviews': 166, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1440747823}
review:
Купил по скидке за 2 рубля. Продал 3 карточки по 4 рубля, в итоге халявный чирик.

А если серьезно, игра полна мелких багов, но играть можно. Вобщем скоротал вечер за бредовой, но забавной историей в городе вампиров. Почти все ачивки получаешь в ходе игры, кроме той что дается за прохождение сложного режима без подсказок.

В качестве симулятора мальчика на побегушках сойдет

author: {'steamid': '76561198141257456', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1440846696}
review:
За 2 часа я прошёл всю игру и могу вам сказать, что своих денег игра стоит, но всё же рекомендую её брать по скидке.
Плюсы:
-Неплохая музыка,
-Интересный сюжет,
-Куча мини-игр,
-Имеются русские субтитры,
-Присутсвуют юмористические моменты,
-Есть карточки.
Из минусов могу назвать только один...Графика.
Мне конкретно всё равно какая у игры графика, но в данной игре графику ведь реально можно было бы подкрутить и улучшить.
Я думаю для любителей жанра "иди туда - принеси - то", коим я и являюсь.
Советую брать не раздумывая эту игру по скидке.
Моя оценка: 8.5/10. 
Спасибо за внимание.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965322630', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1440838605}
review:
"Teletubbies - Vampire Edition"

First thing is that I got this on 90% off so I can't complain due to it's nearly a free game for me.

Good:
- Puzzle works, few of them is fun
- Some non sense jokes deliver fun moment
- Have 3D model and Voiceacting for such budget title
- Hint system quickly recharges

Bad:
- Ridiculous Story
- Fictional characters talking non sense
- Bugs happen sometimes cause white screens or no response for any interactive object, although can be fixed by go back Main Menu and Continue again
- Pathetic voice acting
- Blurry hidden objects mixed with background. Some objects is covered too mcuh by obstacle and cannot be recognised at all
- Some objects are quite different from its description
- 3D model movement is dumb
- Very Challenging to tolerate its story and voiceacting through 2 hours

3/10, considering its trading cards and soundtrack surplus your account, I adjust it to 4.5/10 barely pass.
