author: {'steamid': '76561198018726653', 'num_games_owned': 714, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1440847348}
review:
Despite Hidden Objects being a genre I am not exactly a fan of, this cheesy example made it pretty enjyoable, if you are not good at the style, there are a few beginner friendly helps to get through the gameplay in favor of the story.

sadly in the PC version the instructions still say "tap here" or "tap anywhere", aside from that, and some low quality artwork for environments here and there, this game was surprisingly funny, and cheap to boot (bought it highly! discounted, i.e the trading cards were worth more than I paid for it).

author: {'steamid': '76561198174840903', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1440773066}
review:
There are a few very funny bugs in this game. While playing I sometimes had to return to the title screen, because there where some bad textures and it was impossible to find some objects. After returning to the game screen that was fixed. 
The puzzles are very very easy, I don't think that anybody needs help with this kiddy puzzles. The hidden objects are usually easy to find. So that game is not really about puzzles and hidden objects. This game is about all the trashy story and funny dialogues in it. The story is real trash and so stupid, that it makes a lot of fun to play. I am glad, that this game tooks me just 1,5h. It was 1,5 hours of fun and before the whole stuff was getting me bored, there was the final scene. 
1,5h of funny trash, funny bugs and a story so stupid that the developers must have been on a bunch of good drugs. And all that stuff for 0,09 €. Thanks a lot.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985975371', 'num_games_owned': 2194, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1440797608}
review:
I'd buy this for a dollar, or actually a euro... or actually I just paid around 0,09€ for this since it was on -90% discount. You get what you pay for I guess. I recommend this since I was happy with my purchase, see the pros and cons though to see what exactly you're getting with the buck this game costs. Some of the things listed are strong matters of taste.

The review

This game is an extremely short and extremely easy hidden-object puzzle game. It's very silly and the whole plot is just finding your girlfriend, freeing her and [spoilers]kickstarting her vampire father's film career[/spoilers]. Voice acting is bad and the texts don't match the lines, but due to overall campy feel of the game I really didn't mind.

Gameplay consists of you mostly clicking a person / object and seeing what he / it wants / needs, finding the items from nearby and then usually solving a puzzle of sorts. Some of these necessary items are often hidden behind some other items that are involved in a hidden object game, totalling to about 11-16 items (5 at a time), the last of which usually has the final items you are looking for hidden behind them. It's really simple and usually you can just get through most of it by randomly clicking the obvious items in the scene. If you want all of the achievements though, check the items required and then click through 5 of them (the hidden objects, not the quest items) in 10 seconds to get the achievement, that's basically the only one needing bit more effort.

The puzzles are the most interesting part in this game (beside just seeing the silly plot and clunky conversations go by). Unfortunately there were like 2 or 3 puzzles requiring actual thought while the others were passable by randomly doing stuff or just matching things together. There's not much explanation to them, but they're so simple a child will understand their point, you really don't need the included hint system. (also there's an achievement if you don't!)

- Funnily, you can actually tell the main character to walk somewhere in the scene, but it really has no function as clicking on hotspots trigger them immediately. 

That's about it. Game really doesn't span far. I played it 100% through on hardest difficulty in ~2h. More lucky person can probably do it in less time. Well, here's the pros and cons.

Pros:
+ Cheap (like really, got it for 9 cents)
+ Campy (got a few chuckles from some events, couple unexpectedly silly ones too)
+ Money's worth of entertainment and ultra-light brain exercise
+ Achievement icons look pretty cool
+/- Easy even on hardest difficulty

Cons:
- Some bugs (backgrounds messed up or characters floating in the backgrounds, also one time (in the psychic dimension) game didn't let me click any hotspots, closed and restarted the game and it worked again though)
- Typos
- Lame story (and there's barely any of it)
- Harder puzzles can be calculated with a single quaternary digit
- Finger got tired from all the basically useless random clicking
+/- Bad acting
+/- Easy even on hardest difficulty

Score 6 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198058903700', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1440783487}
review:
Эта игра мною была куплена за 2 рубля по скидке. Конечно, от неё не стоило ожидать чего-то особенно стоящего. Сюжет, как таковой, имеется, но очень скудный, банальный и даже абсурдный. Причем этот абсурд (в плохом смысле этого слова) начинается с первых минут игры. Понятное дело, такой сюжет сделан для того, чтобы дать игроку определенные задания, но извините, диалоги должны иметь хоть какой-то смысл. 
Но этот недостаток меркнет по сравнению с тем, что эта игра просто ужасно оптимизирована. Через десять минут игры вылезли графические артефакты, половину экрана просто покрыла белая пелена. Мерцающая белая пелена. Не оставалось ничего, кроме как выключить её. 
Единственное, что действительно радует - это идея. Идея действительно неплохая.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026051943', 'num_games_owned': 899, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1440828169}
review:
Get it while it's cheap!  2 hours of game play to finish the story (minus 1 achievment), but it was something my kids enjoyed watching and helping me play.  A little more than just your basic hidden object game. I did enjoy it :)
2 Play throughs for 100% Achievement..  at 0.09c to buy the game (on special), the cards gets you your money back (and more), locations of items don't change, so second play though is simple.
If you have kids, definatly get the game, a nice little puzzle for them, but for adults, it runs its course quickly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065347866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1442854707}
review:
Das Spiel ist so Banane, dass es wieder gut ist. Insgesamt hat es einen hohen Trashcharakter und ist so kittschig, dass man als Liebhaber des Genres mit einer Investition von 0,99 Cents nichts falsch machen kann. Ich verstehe das Spiel als eine Parodie auf bisher erschienene Games des Horrorgenres. Irgendwie erinnert mich das Spiel an den Ed Wood Film: Plan B From Outer Space, welcher aber an Trashwert kaum zu toppen ist. Fans von trashigen Games kommen hier voll auf ihre Kosten. 

Grafik: OK - also so lala...rifari

Story: voll daneben, aber trashig ohne Ende XD

Rätsel: sind 'nen Witz, also keine höhere Herausforderung für den Geist, sprich; Anspruch = 0,00001/10.000

Wimmelbilder: Manchmal ist der Kontrast unscharf, aber dank der Hint-Hilfe null Problemo

Ich geb dem Spiel auf der Richterskala für seriöse Spiele 2,5/10 Punkten und auf der Richterskala für Trashgames 7/10 Punkte.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163146381', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1441133200}
review: Не пропустите достойная игра в стиле романов Говарда Лафкравта и сериала Твин пикс... Здесь есть все начиная от хорошей (люди реально живые, эмоции зашкаливают) графики, до глубокого сюжета который делает такие неожиданные повороты что начинаешь верить что вампиры существуют, и кстати где то видел, что игра ОСНОВАНА НА РЕАЛЬНЫХ СОБЫТИЯХ!!! Еще хочу поблагодарить Кирила моего друга, который сделал мне такой замечательный подарок на 30-ти летие! Друг жди сентебря!

author: {'steamid': '76561198170221497', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 584, 'last_played': 1442684482}
review: It was a very basic, fetch quest filled hidden object game, but it holds your attention and is just absurd enough in it's story telling to be enjoyable. It also helps in can be completed in about 2 hours, so it doesn't overstay it's welcome. For a dollar (or the 10 cents I payed for it) I think you get what you pay for; a mildly enjoyable diversion for a few hours that won't particularly stay with you, but will keep you busy and entertained for it's duration if you are a fan of the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157198557', 'num_games_owned': 5894, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1440623580}

+ schwierige Rätsel (teilweise ohne Guide nicht lösbar)

Erwartet einfach für den Preis nichts besonderes ;)

review:
Купил эту игру за пару рублей и чёрт побери,эта игра стоит больше!!За все 6 часов игры,проведённых в ней,я прошёл её 4 раза,не выходил из неё даже.Очень увлекательная игра.Пройти эту игру без подсказок очень легко и просто.Что бы что-то найти,нужно сначало убрать лишние вещи.
-Что бы найти квитанции,нужно убрать всё лишнее
-Что бы найти амулет,нужно убрать всё лишнее
-Что бы отремонтировать кондиционер,нужно убрать всё лишнее
Симулятор уборщика и сыщика xD
Моя оценка 10 из 10

review: Oyun indirimdeyse alın 20 kuruşa aldım gerçekten çok sıkıcı bir oyun ama dikkat gerektiriyo fazla bişey beklemeyin oraya buraya tıklayın yeter

author: {'steamid': '76561198055288336', 'num_games_owned': 270, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1449775775}
review:
Das Spiel hat eine schlechte Grafik,die selbst für Wimmelbildspiele  grottig ist. Die Story macht keinen Sinn und hat ein haufen Logik lücken, aber die Mischung aus beiden lässt es irgendwie lustig erscheinen. Wenn einen noch nicht die genialen Kerzen ausblas Animationen vom Anfang des Spiels vom Stuhl gehauen haben (vor Lachen)! Dann die Rätsel,denn einige Rätsel sind sogar gut während andere Rätsel und Wimmelbilder wie sinnlose Beschäftigungstherapie wirken. Das einzigste was dieses Spiel in dieser Form rechtfertigt ist der Preis denn für den Preis von einem Euro kann man es sich vieleicht mal geben,aber für den Sale Preis von 9 cent solltet ihr euch das Spiel unbedingt kaufen.Ihr kriegt ja das Geld für die Karten wieder , falls es euch nicht gefällt.Viele haben von Bugs und Absturz des Spiels in ihren Reviews erzählt bei mir ist nichts der Gleichen passiert, bis auf eine zu große Hintergrundtextur und ein Gegenstand der für ein paar Sekunden keine Textur hatte, ist mir wirklich nichts Wiederfahren.

Rating:4,8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198021121233', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1440686001}
review:
şimdi, her şeyden önce lafa 2 lira olan bu oyunu %90 indirimle 20 kuruşa aldığımı söyleyerek başlamak istiyorum (ben de iyice cimriye döndüm, her oyunun fiyatından söz etmesem olmaz sanki)

oyun gizli-nesne-bulma oyunlarından. bu şu anlama geliyor: elinizde bir listeyle ekrana bakıp listede gördüğünüz şeyin üzerine tıklıyorsunuz. bir ipucu düğmesi de var, sayaç doldukça kullanabiliyorsunuz. peki, mekanik yeterince basit görünüyor, peki iyi kotarılmış mı? eh... görüntüler biraz daha kaliteli olsa daha rahat olurdu (bir de listedeki şeylerin [i]ne[/i] olduğunu da bilmek lazım, ingilizcesine güvenmeyenlere tavsiye etmem, yanınızda sözlükle oynamaya değecek bir oyun değil) bir de bazı şeyleri yerinden oynatıp arkasında ne olduğuna bakabiliyoruz ama bunun şöyle bir sıkıntısı var: neyi oynatıp oynatamayacağımız hikayenin neresinde olduğunuza göre değişiyor ki bu bazı ufak kafa karışıklıkları yaratabilir.

hikaye demişken... hikaye nasıl? tek kelimeyle: felaket (ama "berbat" değil) ve bu yüzden de çok iyi! yani "dünyayı kurtaran adam" gibi, o kadar kötü ki bir noktada iyi olmaya başlıyor. yapımcı da zaten buna niyet ederek yola çıkmış, çok belli bu hikayeyi kimsenin hiç bir zaman ciddiye almamış olduğu. 2 saat boyunca ara ara gülümseyip, sık sık gözlerinizi devirip en çok da bulmacaları çözüp oyunu bitiriyorsunuz işte (sonra da kartlar gelsin diye oyunu biraz daha açık bırakıyorsunuz)

yani diyeceğim o ki bu oyunu 1 liraya alsanız da keyif alırmışsınız.

review:

Hru som kúpil za 9 centov viacmenej kôli kartám netušiac, o akú hru ide. Po pár minútach hrania mi priniesla kopec spomienok na fishdom h2o a podobné hry toho typu. author: {'steamid': '76561198029654835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1440691846}
review:
Unica cosa di dire su questo gioco è di prenderlo , come ho fatto io , superscontato a solo 9 centesimi !
Vi darà tre carte che potrete rivendere guadagnandoci oppure creare una medaglia in modo molto economico
Nel frattempo che passano le ore per avere le carte potete giocarci tranquillamente : è un punta e clicca e trova oggetti con qualche rompicapo carino da risolvere
...Senza Voto...

author: {'steamid': '76561198129518251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1471591509}

Рекоммендую всем, кто хочет просто отдохнуть вечерком за несложными головоломками и задачками на внимательность.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052322506', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1440652496}
review: The game is no Portal but it does occupy time for a few hours. I enjoyed the corny plot. It was kinda like an average 80s movie with vampires.  Plus what are you expecting for $.99? Fallout 4?

author: {'steamid': '76561198028390742', 'num_games_owned': 501, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1441097487}
review: I originally bought this game just because it was only selling for $.09 and I wanted to use the exp to level up my steam profile..... but after starting to play it, I quickly found that this really is a fun nostalgic game, and I'd recommend it to anyone who was a fan of the old point and click adventure puzzle games, specially those who want a spooky themed parody twist.... this game just has a cfertain charm to it that makes you want to keep playing.... honestly, the game just makes me smile whenever I start to play it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070053122', 'num_games_owned': 437, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1440642709}
review:
This game is really a hit or miss. It really depends on who you are. Personally, I can't find interest in this game. It's VERY slow and dull in my opinion and the only real game aspect (that I've encountered thus far) was fetch quests- fetch quests that lead to more fetch quests. And more fetch quests. And more fetch quests. [b]And more fetch qu-[/b] 

[b]You get my point.[/b]

This game is a point-and-click game. Except, it's like one of those games from the old Windows 95 days. The "scene" is just a poorly made background that was quickly thrown together, the only 3D-ish models are the important characters (even the models are poorly programmed), and the diologue is bland as raisins. Now, when I say point-and-click, this will be NOTHING like The Walking Dead (trust me, being a VERY HUGE FAN of TWD, this is NOWHERE near comparable to the games) and like I said, rather it's more of an old point-and-click adventure game.

This game will appeal to you if you-
1. Love old classic games.
2. Love old classic point-and-click adventure games.
3. Don't mind incredi-bad voice acting.
4. Love dull love stories. Because that's what this game is.
5. Are over the age of 20 (because you'll know what an old point-and-click adventure game feels like)

This game will NOT appeal to you if you-
1. Are a normal person.


Cons:
- Incredi-bad voice acting
- Bland "love" storyline
- Bland environments
- Unintresting and nonmemorable characters and diologue
-  Horrible gameplay style (fetch-quests in a 2D environment)
- ANNOYING AS FUCK SOUNDTRACK

Pros:
- I bought this game for $0.09. So can you.


Conclusion & Rating:

........ 2/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198061729496', 'num_games_owned': 389, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1443898544}
review: Dont pay any attention to the negative comments because they were looking for a serious game and came across this game instead. this game was made out of satire and its simplistic design of a game makes it a relaxing game and unless you have no humor then this game is great for you

author: {'steamid': '76561197967366309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1440681215}
review:
I bought this just to get the cards but so far I have enjoyed playing this game and will probably actually try and finish it (whers most I just play until I get the cards).
I have enountered a bug in the game but it was easily fixed by going to the menue and then continuing the game. This game is easily worth the 9c I paid when it was on sale and I am sure is worth the $.99 too. The biggest thing you need to remember as others have said this is not a serious game and I am sure you will enjoy it too.
One more thing afer now finishing the game, it is fairly short and is no more than 4 hours which I would say makes the price right.
3.5/5

author: {'steamid': '76561198197291749', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1440631643}
review:
Sinister city is a point and click hidden object puzzle game set as a dark comedy and revolving around vampirism. It is visually appealing as far as character design graphics, but it has standard bland backgrounds and props. The puzzles are 99% typical hidden item interactions and mini-games, with only one that stood out as unique. The click and touch recognitions are wonky in spots, but a majority operational.  The audio and dialogue are bland at best. Support for the game is untested, as it was unneeded. I was able to complete the game on both easy and advanced in a total of about 4 hrs of gameplay. It has very little replay value beyond its second playthrough.

In short, on my 10-point scale of rating games based on Concept, Appearance, Content & Replay Value, Mechanics, and Sound I would have to give Sinister City a 5/10. This is an overall decent game, but has very little replay value, is short in content, and contains minor flaws.

In the end, I would recommend this game only if it is on sale for the cheap, as in less than 50 cents, so you can make almost half your money back. Its an ok game, but doesn't have enough to it that would make it worth full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095404968', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1440769320}
review: First I was meh, but then Dracula threatened to gladly bite my foot off. Then it got kinky from there while the protagnoist's waifu watched an John Mahoney hypnotize Channing Tatum into cleaning his basement and doing Alan Wake impressions. From there, the game was a great satire until I got stuck staring at Sarah Jessica Parker's face and the game wouldn't let me progress. Heterochromia aplenty, rate it 8 out of 8, mate.

author: {'steamid': '76561198205856919', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1440612820}
review: Completed this game twice (once on easy, and again on advanced) in just over 3 hours, while collecting all achievements. this game was funny, and the achievements managable and easy to collect during normal gameplay, giving a sense of completion. Many poeple are putting this game down for not being scary, however its clear that it does not intend to be, and it is actually quite funny. furthermore, i picked up this game for just £0.07, and will make back more money selling the cards, so overall a profitable 3hrs of engagement.

review: Сложилось впечатление, что это какой-то ремастеринг... Совершенно точно помню, что уже играла в эту игру тысячу лет назад. =)) И, кстати, не могу сказать, что она плоха. Довольно забавные диалоги. Мини-игры довольно сложные, все проходить мне было лень... Музыкальное сопровождение тоже такое ничего... А еще халявные карточки и ачивки. =)) За два рубля-то. Мечта же. P. S. Лагает, по крайней мере, у меня, только в двух местах - у зеркала почти в начале игры и ближе к концу, когда ищешь "хлопушки" для режиссера. "Лечится" элементарным перезаходом в игру...

author: {'steamid': '76561198204840568', 'num_games_owned': 241, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1440683512}
review:
Sinister city.. hra vypadá dobře.. alespoň ze začátku. Příběh se zdá být docela normální.. ze začátku.
Klasická hledačka "staršího" typu.

Poté co pomalu ale jistě postupujete v příběhu se vám otevřou oči.
Hned ve druhém "levelu" jsem narazil na první problém a to že při prohledávání lokace kliknutím na cokoliv (i na to co máte hledat) vás hra vyhodí ven z prohledávání místo toho aby se ukázal červený X. (Restart hry to opraví)

Pokud by vám ani tohle nestačilo, hra vám nabídne mnohem více! Například bílý čtvereček kolem předmětů.
Při otevření Steam Overlay ve hře mi hra spadla a NIC se neuložilo.
Postavy v některých úrovních levitují.. přesně tak! Jednoduše stojí "ve vzduchu".
Pozadí v některých úrovních vůbec nesedí a opět vytváří iluze levitujících postav.
Pravé oko postavy za kterou hrajete "svítí".. co je to.. robot?
V nastavení je možnost změnit hlasiost zvuků ve hře. Bohužel mi nefunguje.
V nastavení není žádná možnost změnit rozlišení obrazovky. (Kromě vypnout/zapnout fullscreen)
[spoiler]Vaše výbava proti upírům je Made In China.. jop. I ten otesaný klacek je vyrobený v číně! :D[/spoiler]

Při dohrání hry jsem získal 4 achievementy zárověň, získal jsem také achievement za "Dohraj hru v advanced modu" i když jsem hru dohrál poprvé na easy. (Ze 4 achievementů mám po restartu jen 2..)

A když už jsme u toho.. advanced režim. V advanced režimu se vám nezobrazuje "jiskra" u předmětů které máte najít nebo u lokací které můžete prohledat + nevidíte váš objective. Také je tam napsáno že jsou větší cooldowny u nápověd.. i když v easy režimu čekáte cca 3 sekundy, v advanced režimu čekáte 5.

Dále mě jako u každé hledačky dostane získávání informací od NPC.
Všechno postupuje následovně:
Váš úkol je promluvit si se ženskou aby vám řekla informace. "Dobře vše ti povím ALE počkej najdi mi karty!" (donesete jí karty a vyřešíte puzzle) "Jsi dobrý. takže je to tak že.. POČKEJ kde jsou moje pytlíčky s čajem??!" (donesete jí čaj) "O čem jsme to mluvili? Jasně informace.. POČKEJ nejdřív musíš aktivovat tyhle kraviny!" (o 1000 let později) "Dobře, takže věc se má tak že POČKEJ bolí mě hlava, kde jsou moje prášky? Jsou na stole, přines mi je!" (Vyřešíte další puzzle..........)

A co se stane potom?! Nevíte? Řekne vám že si máte promluvit se ženskou naproti a HÁDEJTE CO SE STANE..
Nic vám neřekne dokud pro ní nenajdete X věcí a neuděláte X zbytečných úkolů!!!!

Dobré prvky: Hra má konec, "příběh" a dá se dohrát. Achievementy a steam karty.

Příběh?
Co se stane když vezmete špatný horor, špatný humor, Drákulu, Detektivku a pár filmů o upírech a hodíte to do mixéru a stisknete tlačítko "kaše"?
> Sinister City!
3/10  - Příliž málo Teletubbies herců~

author: {'steamid': '76561198121821715', 'num_games_owned': 942, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1440585124}
review: I purchased this game on sale for 9 cents and got about 3.5 hours of entertainment.  It has good puzzles and the hidden objects while sometimes hard they are not brutal.  The story doesn't take itself seriously so if you're looking for a true vampire type story the comedy in this may put you off.  I actually enjoyed the story and found this game to be worthy.  At the low cost being able to get 100% completion and being able to sell the steam cards earned afterwards to make a profit is totally worth getting this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106133146', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1440564858}
review:
-Acabei de completar, e não estava esperando muito. Afinal, é só um '' Hidden Object '' , não tem muita mecânica envolvida. 
-Mas tem uma estória engraçada, apesar da tradução ser questionável.
- Alguns personagens vão parecer estar fora do lugar, mas isso se deve pelo fundo 2D e personagens 3D, nada fica totalmente certo. 
-Mas o ponto do jogo é nos puzzles e no esconde-esconde dos objetos. Me entreteu. Ignorei os bugs, só isso. 
-Tava com saudade de jogos assim, jogava desde pivete.
- Se você quando quer relaxar ou passar o tempo, procura um jogo suave e levemente engraçado, eu recomendo. 
   (7/10)

author: {'steamid': '76561198144943577', 'num_games_owned': 423, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 264, 'last_played': 1440556691}
review:
[h1] 婚約者が吸血鬼に攫われた、今主人公の知恵と勇気と魔法と愛とそして金融機関からの追ってからの試練が試される(大嘘) [/h1]
個人的にはお勧めは微妙です、セール中で９円でしたが。

[h1] ゲーム内容 [/h1]
ストーリ進行上で必要なアイテムをクリックして集めていきの繰り返しのゲームでパズル要素もあるよ、日本語翻訳もされており時々おかしいとこあるけど、分かりやすい、ヒント機能やパズルスキップなどもあり、積むことはないです。

個人的には話にのれれば面白かったのかもしれませんが、個人的にはホラーでもコメディでもないような中途半端感がだめであまり楽しめませんでしたが、話にのれれば楽しめると思います。

[spoiler] 犯人はヤス [/spoiler]からの[spoiler] すいません、大嘘です。ｗ [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198172710614', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1440609432}
review:
Probably the best two hours in my life.
Also Ipkis is v cute would 10/10 date.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055020359', 'num_games_owned': 243, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1440545107}
review:
Пишу обзор,что бы игра не ушла в минус по отзывам. Обычно что бы выбить карточки,люди ставят игру и делают свои дела,но в эту игру я реально играл почти 3 часа. За это время я:
1)поиграл в неплохой инди проект по поиску предметов на экране
2)прошел игру 2 раза(1 раз просто так,второй раз когда понял,что тут можно все ачивки заработать)
3)заработал все ачивки и получил идеальную игру в профиль
4)окупил цену игры в 6 раз с помощью карточек(3 карточки по 4 рубля из игры за 2 рубля). 
Итого:я бы взял ее и за целых 5 рублей,несмотря на свою еврейскую сущность. 
 Если всего что я перечислил недостаточно для покупки этой игры за 2 рубля,то я xз что для вас должен разработчик сделать за ебаных 2 рубля,из которых процент отвалит стиму. А ребята постарались неплохо,можно купить игру лишь что бы их поддержать. 
 Спасибо за внимание.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037002672', 'num_games_owned': 1137, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1440537690}
review:
Мне понравилась данная игра. В меру упоротая, весёлая и в то же время сёрьёзная, ибо как-никак, гланый герой пытается спасти свою невесту из лап вампира! Загадки простые, как и сам поиск предметов.  
Прошёл игру с удовольствием за 3 с лишним часа. Открыл все 17 достижений, +1 идеальная игра.

И да, халявщики оценят, ибо сейчас игра стоит всего 2 рубля, а выпадает 3 карточки по 3-4 рубля.

Рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989712854', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1440534416}
review:
Не знаю, за что можно ругать эту игру. Простенький пазл на поиск предметов на картинке, с сюжетом, юмором, совсем не напряжный (даже в "сложном" режиме подсказка перезаряжается быстро, на "простом" я вообще рекомендую проходить лишь для ачивки "вампир-телепат" - подсказки лезут даже тогда, когда не просят). Игра короткая, что, пожалуй, тоже плюс - заканчивается как раз когда устаёшь от нее.
Единственный минус игры - графика. Мыльная картинка середины 2000-х, кривой пасфайндинг главгероя (впрочем, тут и ходить-то особо не надо - нажав на активную зону, сразу перемещаемся к загадке), а от вороны с шестеренкой я выпал в осадок XD

author: {'steamid': '76561197995194702', 'num_games_owned': 1227, 'num_reviews': 714, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1445937422}
review:
Takže... kde jenom začít? Asi popořadě, co?

[h1]Výborné technické zpracování... nebo ne? [/h1]
Už po prvním spuštění vám bude jasné, že tohle nebude žádný extra zážitek. Čemuž také odpovídá cena, ale o tom až později. Kvalita grafického zpracování je celkem ucházející, i když postavy vymodelované v 3D moc nepasují do prostředí a působí tak jako pěst na oko. Animace tu také nejsou kdovíjak kvalitní a pokud bych měl ještě nějak okomentovat kvalitu dabingu, tak nic moc.

Co tu ale vyniká je hudba, především hlavní hudební motiv (což je snad jediná skladba hrající na pozadí), která je sice průměrná, ale tak nějak hezky doplňuje tajemnou atmosféru. I když... tajemnou... ehm...

[h1]Příběh jako z céčkového filmu[/h1]
Nekvalita technického zpracování by zas tak moc nevadila, kdyby se povedl aspoň ten příběh. Bohužel i zde musím všechny zklamat. A abych to dovedl do dokonalosti, vypíšu ho zde celý... Takže následovat budou spoilery.

[spoiler]Na začátku hry zjistíte, že vaše unesená snoubenka se nachází v Sinister City, což je město plné upírů a asi i dalších potvor. Posléze odhalíte, že ji unesl její otec (upír), který chce, aby se provdala za slavného herce (taktéž upíra) a byla z ní také herečka, i když ona po téhle kariéře netouží. Po zhruba půlce hry zjistíte, že její otec si tímhle léčí své komplexy, kdy sám chtěl být hercem, ale stydí se. Tudíž ho uspíte, unesete jeho dceru, on se pro ni vydá do studia a tam se s ním dá do řeči režisér, který jej obsadí do svého nového filmu. Tečka. [/spoiler]

Příběh je tu opravdu stupidní a i když je nepředvídatelný, tak je místy tak trapný, až si říkáte, jestli je tohle vůbec možné. Nejhorší na tom je, že hra se zpočátku tváří jako horor (nebo spíš tak chce vypadat), ale brzy se změní v trapnou komedii, která ničí odkaz upírů ještě více, než se to povedlo filmové sérii Stmívání.

Kvalitu příběhu ani nezachrání pozdější pokus o vtipy, které působí křečovitě a moc nepasují do hry. Jako kdyby si tvůrci ke konci uvědomili, že tohle nemá šanci moc uspět, tak si aspoň udělají srandu z některých věcí...

Postavy tu jsou takové nijaké, dost často mají opravdu stupidní dialogy, někdy se chovají v určitých chvílích tak, jak by se snad nikdo nechoval a mnohdy řeší totálně zbytečné věci. Dost dobrým příkladem je výroba lektvaru pravdy v kanceláři onoho otce hlavní hrdinky, přímo před jeho očima a v jeho krbu, přitom mu poté tuto dobrotu nabídnete a on ji bez váhání vypije...

[h1]Co mám dělat dál? [/h1]
Pokud se doteď nesla recenze v negativním duchu, tak vězte, že právě teď začíná peklo. Jako každá HOG hra se i tato spoléhá na hledání předmětů. Jenže! U lokací, se kterými můžete provést interakci (typicky dveře nebo nějaká HOG scéna) se vám nijak nezmění kurzor myši, takže jen slepě hádáte, na co jde kliknout a na co ne. Což vede k dost frustrujícím momentům, že prostě jen klikáte všude kolem sebe a čekáte, kdy se spustí ona kýžená HOG minihra.

A když už jsem se zmínil o těchto minihrách, musím dodat ještě další mínus. Grafická kvalita těchto obrazovek je strašně špatná, dost často rozmazaná, u některých předmětů navíc trčí jen malinký kousíček. A dost mě rozesmálo, že jsem kurzor myši neměl nikde v blízkosti oněch hledaných předmětů, klikl jsem a i přesto jich takhle pár úspěšně zmizelo.

Na druhou stranu musím pochválit hádanky, kterých tu bohužel není moc, ale jsou celkem originální a v této hře působí opravdu výborně (na rozdíl od zbytku).

[h1]Bugy, bugy všude[/h1]
Do 30 minut jsem narazil na čtyři bugy:
[olist]
[*]Hlavní postava se nějak naučila levitovat.
[*]U jedné HOG minihry mě po nalezení jednoho předmětu hra vždy vykopla z dané lokace, takže jsem se tam musel neustále vracet.
[*]Po jednom videu nešlo vůbec nic dělat na mapě.
[*] I když jsem na začátku hry vybral obtížnost Advanced, hra se tvářila, že hraju na Easy a já si toho všiml až tehdy, když jsem v menu našel položku Advanced Mode, která byla neodškrtnutá. Nicméně i tak jsem dostal achievement za to, ale pak mě Steam ten achievement smazal... Jako WTF?!
[/olist]

První tři bugy šly naštěstí vyřešit prostým vypnutím a opětovným zapnutím hry. Ale neměly by tu v první řadě vůbec být!

[h1]Plusy[/h1]
+ hlavní hudební motiv
+ zajímavý název hry
+ malá cena (po prodeji kartiček z této hry je možné si něco málo vydělat)

[h1]Mínusy[/h1]
- všechno ostatní

[h1]Konečný verdikt[/h1]
[b]Mé hodnocení: 1/10[/b]

Během těch dvou hodin, co jsem tuhle hru hrál, se ve mě střídalo tolik negativních pocitů, až jsem si říkal, že v tom nemá cenu pokračovat. Na druhou stranu ale toto dílo občas vynikalo, protože se tu navrstvilo tolik absurdností, až mě to rozesmálo. Což ale asi nebyl záměr tvůrců (kteří jsou mimochodem z ČR). Věděl jsem, že hra je to špatná, ale až takhle špatná? Snad nic tu nefunguje dobře, od trapného příběhu, přes otřesnou technickou stránku hry až po hromadu bugů. Díky bohu, že jsem to koupil jen za 0,09 euro.

review: 收集、收集、再收集...剧情很短，谜题难度一般（这游戏唯一可玩之处）。遇到点击bug返回主菜单后继续游戏就行。挺无聊的，全成就二周目就可以了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198079296891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1440530385}
review:
Wlaczyłem sklep steam aby znaleźć tanie gry z kartami aby zrobic profit zobaczyłem tę grę i pomyślałem pewnie znowu jakaś niby horrorowa gra w unity a kiedy ja włączyłem zostalem mile zaskoczony!Gra nie ma jakiejs dobrej grafiki ale to nie jest najwazniejsze.Jest to bardzo przyjemna gra point and click w której nawet noob takich gier jak ja moze sie odnależć.Otrzymujemy troche zadań w grze które skupiaja sie wokół typowego schematu :,,Przynieś wynieś pozamiataj a dam ci klucz bla bla bla'' co nawet troche mnie rozbawiło jak postacie dosłownie wymuszają znajdowanie czegos bez powodu :D.Teraz moze troche o samej grze rozgrywa sie ona w tytułowym mieście Sinister City gdzie ludzie mają ogromną manię wampirów(*kaszel*Zmierzch*kaszel*) a głowny bohater stara sie odnaleźć swoja przyszła żonę i wplątuję w zagmatwana sytuacje której nie bede zdradzał bo kazdy powienien zagrać w ta gre sam :).Dodajac ze gra jest 0,09 centów w wyprzedazy i karty zrobia profit to juz całkowicie polecam
*Plusy
-Bardzo ciekawa historia ktora sprawia ze czasem mozna sie usmiac jak zrozumiesz o co chodzi
-Przyjemna gra logiczna
-Krótka jeśli ktos nie ma duzo czasu mozna ją ukończyc w 2 godziny albo nawet mniej
-Niska cena oraz profit z kart
*Minusy
-Czasem nie wiadomo gdzie pojść i co zrobic ale to rzadko
OGÓLNA OCENA 10/10 jesli masz troche pieniędzy kup nie pozalujesz :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198187284382', 'num_games_owned': 309, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1440525906}
review:
Если не учитывать некоторые баги и весьма глупые задания (собрать драгоценные камни чтобы ворона отдала шестерёнку, или сварить зелье на глазах у вампира, а потом споить это зелье ему же.), то в игру можно позалипать, хотя бы из-за того, чтобы поугарать над диалогами и другими глупыми вещами. А, ну и карточки есть, хотя это скорее основная причина покупать эту игру. 

Конечный вердикт 6\10 бусиков для вороны

author: {'steamid': '76561198185171215', 'num_games_owned': 1043, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 1050, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1050, 'last_played': 1440583558}
review:
Sinister City is an adventure game with a hidden object element which has decent vampire theme.

This game remind me of a classic cult bad movie "PLAN 9 FROM OUTER SPACE" directed by Ed Wood. The movie is bad, and the game mimic all the bad things happened on that movie. Dialougue are cheesy, story are cheesy, the cast & characters are ridicilous too. And all the things right here make me laugh because its funny.

I can't recommend this for a good game, but if you enjoying a cheesy bad movie or a bad game (not a broken game) which is entertaining and fun. You can try this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114317722', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1440524086}
review: It was worth my 9 cents.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057246223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1440474259}
review:
Sinister City is a fairly short Hidden Object Game (HOG) with older graphics... but given it's age, it was  fun and for the price (on sale for  0.09 cents US), I can definitely say I got way more enjoyment out of it than I paid for. If you want a short (about 2-3 hours for most players) HOG, this is a very good choice. I DO recommend getting it on sale however.

This game is especially a good choice if you have an older system or one that has overheating issues, as it will not put a lot of strain on the system like the modern games would.  It has limited replayability (It features two difficulty settings.Difficulty setting easy gives you hints, faster help timer, etc. Normal difficultly does not give you hints as to where to go next, etc).  The story premise is simple and cornball in nature, but in an enjoyable way. 

All said and done, and considering it's age-it is a good little HOG that if you buy it on sale, is well worth the price of .09 pennies.

review: As far as HOGs go this one deserves a look. Not the best in existence but story wise it deviates a little from the generic HOG story (vampires in a situation you probably never expected), alright gameplay (though there's no clicking penalty if you're looking for that) and I liked it overall. The puzzles are easy (except the last one, had to skip it and and couldn't get the last achievement so watch out for that). Get it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119807017', 'num_games_owned': 839, 'num_reviews': 643, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1440517206}
review:
[h1] Игра про которую ты не вспомнишь[/h1]

SINISTER CITY типичная Point to Click игрушка, мне такие нравятся и я ничего против не имею.
Проблема в том, что это обычный проходняк на 2 часа.
Рисовка обычная, люди как и типично для игр данного жанра прорисованы "нуу так себе"
Сюжет, не остается в памяти, и вы явно не будете пересказывать его друзьям сидя в баре или в другом богатым на истории месте.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=506151619

Гемплей, ребят это Point to Click, гемплей уже описан в жанре. Тем более игра ничего нового в этот жанр не приносит.
Звук, порой будто слышишь бесплатные пресеты из рэпчика школьника о своих проблемах.
[h1] Итог [/h1]
Игра типичный проходняк, по скидке за рублей 10-20 можно взять. Затем игра будет висеть мертвым грузом в вашей библиотеке. Любителям жанра понравится, но ничего нового они в ней не найдут.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=879234333

[h1] Подписаться на обзоры [/h1]
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/35534108-OpaGen-Review/] Куратор  [/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/OpaGenReview] Группа с обзорами [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198063066859', 'num_games_owned': 996, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 169, 'last_played': 1441315777}
review:
Como alguém já disse: que bom que não dei atenção aos reviews ruins!
O jogo é muito bom, muito mesmo. Tem uma ótima história, um ótimo gráfico e ótimas musicas! Tão bom quanto Dracula Ressurrection

É um point-and-click onde você tem que buscar objetos escondidos para ir avançando e completando missões, além de se deparar com puzzles e ter o privilégio de movimentar o personagem principal usando o mouse!

Quem gosta desse tipo de jogo, vai se divertir bastante.

11/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198101802351', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1440511622}
review:
[h1]Безудержное веселье за 2 рубля[/h1]

Ну что можно сказать про эту игру: ужасная графика, корявые 3D-модели персонажей, сценарий категории С (а то и ниже), простейшие головоломки и сцены поиска предметов, некоторые второстепенные баги в игре и в получении достижений. Разве что музыка приятно удивляет. С другой стороны, все это такой фэйл, что даже вин: читаешь эти якобы серьезные диалоги и смеешься. Может так все и задумывалось? 

[i]Как бы то ни было, грех было бы жаловаться на игру за два рубля, учитывая то, что она все-таки работает. Для желающих нафармить легкие достижения/карточки - самое то. 5/10[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198005276467', 'num_games_owned': 1985, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1440461906}
review:
O jogo em si até é um bom point and click (com alguns puzzles), os jogadores que gostam deste genero até devem gostar do jogo ou jogares que se estejam agora a familiar com este tipo.

Ao longo do jogo vê-se que os programadores foram um bocado preguiçosos em certas modelações dos objectos. Vê-se claramente que tiraram uma fotografia e meteram-na no jogo. O boneco as vezes até anda por cima do cenário!

Durante o jogo encontrei um bug que não me deixava fazer nada no jogo tive de voltar ao menu iniciar e usar a opção continuar para poder voltar ao normal.

Independemente dos bugs até foi um jogo que me deu prazer jogar, de 1 a 5, dou-lhe 3!

author: {'steamid': '76561198024003277', 'num_games_owned': 1457, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1510426177}
review:
С чего же стоит начать, да наверное с цены. Без скидки на момент написания данного обзора игра стоила 29 рублей, куплена со скидкой за 2 рубля. Да да да... Вы не ошиблись, всего 2 гребаных рубля! Карточки с игры (коих 3 штуки) были проданы по 4 рубля за штуку, итого навару 10 рублей. И ладно бы если бы игра была плохая, но нет. 

[h1]Немного о жанре.[/h1] 
Это легенький квестик в жанре поиска спрятанных предметов, жанр просто, понятный и доступный всем поколениям. В последние годы набравший лютую популярность, но как и с хоррорами (страшилками) когдато так, и сейчас... Куча говноинди разрабов штампует мусор в этом жанре. И скажу честно, покупая игру за 2 рубля я не думал, что она окажется неплохой! 

[h1]Коротко о сюжете.[/h1] 
Как водится в играх данного жанра, акцент на сюжет нестоль большой! Ведь ключевой составляющей гейплея является поиск предметов, который затягивает игрока, а не сюжетная составляющая. Данная игра не стала исключением и в сюжете полно бреда и антиреализма, однако черный юмор и сарказм делают его более приятным для восприятия. Подкрепляет интерес и достижения которые легко и попутно получаешь. Если вы искали игру по сюжету которой будут снимать одноименный фильм, то вы одназначно ошиблись адресом! Однако за такие деньги с игрой одназначно стоит познакомится. 

[h1]Остальное[/h1]
Про геймплей писать смысла не вижу, т.к. он просто и понятный всем, а вот про графику стоит немного рассказать. Такие игры как правило не блещас какой либо запредельной рисовкой или графикой, ибо им это никчему. Однако в этой игре хочется отметить прорисованных в 3D персонажей, что немогло меня не порадовать. К музыке притензий тоже не имею. Головоломки средней сложности, при желании даже ребенок справится! Отдельная благодарность за локализацию игры на Русский язык с помощью субтитров.

[h1]Итоги[/h1]
Это игра с простым и глупым сюжетом, но переполнена юмором! С кучей простеньких головоломок и поиска предметов. С весьма неплохой для игр данного жанра графикой и музыкой. И все это с ачивками, карточками и по превлекательной цене! Вывод однозначный - [b]НАДО БРАТЬ![/b]

review: Not bad if you're into hidden object games, and even better when it's 9 cents. This game gives off a little bit of visual novel feeling while still keeping it's hidden object charm. You have to find items to uncover the mysterious disappearance of John's fiance' Nina, which leads you to "Sinister City". The main vampire looks like it is modeled after Udo Kier in Blood for Dracula, seriously look it up, it's kind of awesome. The SFX volume is extremely loud, even on the lowest setting. Still a nice casual game to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032273592', 'num_games_owned': 581, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1441648806}
review:
In Sum: Playable but not great hidden object game with some glaring flaws. Do not buy at full price.  3/5

This is another grudgingly recommended game, which I would have preferred a neutral rating on.  This is not a horrible game, and I have suffered a share of stinkers on Steam.  It is just a hidden object game, not much more or less than that, and I suspect a lot of the objection here is due to the casual nature of the game.  However even as a genre, within hidden object games, there is something to be desired.  

The concept is seemingly inspired by Dracula and early vampire movies that novel inspired, but with a twist that comes off somewhat amusing but not pulled off as well as, say, a similar theme in Magicka.  Unlike most hidden object games, you actually get to play a character and move around some parts of the game.  The visuals are actually decent for the non-searching parts of the game, and the voice acting is not bad.  It feels like it would have been a well-received, even high quality game in 1998.  I am not saying that the graphics are that ancient, just that I can't help but recall the casual  games of that era.  

The game consists of exploring very small areas for hidden objects, talking to NPCs, and solving puzzles.  Through playing, you effectively unlock search quests where you must find a certain number of specified items.  In some areas, there are item lists that must also be found before a quest item is revealed.  Once the quest is completed, a puzzle must be solved.  The puzzles are not complicated in the least.

Some HO games are difficult for various reasons, including devious trickery in design, such as putting similar looking objects, wordplay in clues, shifting images, interactive objects, and so on.  This game uses it's own method of frustrating the player, and it unfortunately is not very satisfying.  The objects are often hidden behind other objects that are not related to the puzzle (like a book or a plate), which must be clicked on to reveal the item underneath.  Makes it hard to search for something that isn't there.  Worst of all, the lighting and visibility of the objects is often terrible, to the point where I found myself clicking the screen randomly...and still succeeding!  Despite screen settings, the images can be so dim that they are practially not there, and I am sure on some monitors, would not show up at all.  And with the secret movable items and the poor display of items, and a lack of consequence for random clicking, it can become as much of a clicking game as Cookie Clicker...but without managers.  

Some seem to say that the objects are hard to find because they are not what people are expecting.  I have played many hidden object games, and as far as the genre goes, this one is actually very good at properly telling you what you are looking for.  

There are two major glitches, however.  If you are using Windows 7 or above, you will need to set the game to XP compatibility mode, or it won't even launch.  Sometimes during the game, you will not be able to interact with environments after a cutscene.  Going to the main menu then resuming will fix this.

All together, it is an acceptable HO game, purely casual and good for destressing or a waste of time.  On the easiest mode, there is no pressure and no consequence for wrong, and the soundtrack is not bad at all.  It was worth the 9 cents, but not the $10 full price by any means.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048206769', 'num_games_owned': 861, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1440450378}
review:
Weird story (but in an amusing way). The humour and unusual story is (IMO) certaily worth it. And it has cards!

Weird way to do Hidden Objects (in a strange way - random clicking works best). When you're stuck, you can just wait for the game to highlight the next step or item. No hints ever needed.

Weird bugs (but nothing game breaking that I encountered). It sometimes throws you out of a hidden object scene when you click on stuff. Exiting and restarting fixes that. Also, I got 'finish game on advanced' achievement while playing it on easy (which it apparrently undid in between finishing the game and finishing this review).

I got this on sale for 9 cent. Finished it in under 3h without rushing and the occasional pee break and chatting with friends on Steam. It's a bit short, but if you think 99 cent (normal price) isn't much, it's even worth that. Else, wait for a sale with a price of your preference.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121180549', 'num_games_owned': 210, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1440455455}

(for devs)
Also, I've found some bugs where I had to restart the game to fix it.
The first bug I had was because of my name was using special characters (can be fixed easily).
the second one are texture bugs http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=505798613
the third one was when I was trying to go somewhere I had to go, but I couldn't http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=505798470
the fourth one was when I clicked the screen when searching objects I was automatically returning back. Pretty annoying.

Understand me, this is a good game, with his weird story and characters, you can pass your time on it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049020554', 'num_games_owned': 4131, 'num_reviews': 374, 'playtime_forever': 206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1450988679}
review:
This game is realy really buggy.  To start, I couldn't launch this game and I had to fiddle around with the properties from the games location in the Steam folder location. The click location is also not registering excatly where I'm clicking.  To top it off, when I got to the mirror's place, the clicks didn't work anymore, everything gave a red X.  It started off with a kind of interesting story, but the game is far too buggy for it to be considered anything good.  This game should go back to being a free app on iOS or Android.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101432991', 'num_games_owned': 316, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1440449372}
review:
ЭТО КАЗУАЛЬНЫЙ КВЕСТ для тех кто ждёт от этой игры чего-то вроде в  GTA 5 или  Project CARS такого здесь вы не увидите. Игра предлагает дружелюблый интерфейс (с русскими субтитрами), насыщеную графику, интересный сюжет, средние по сложности загадки и весёлую (немного детскую) атмосферу. Цена игры смехотворна, игра прошлась на одном дыхании. Как по мне минус то што игра слишком коротка я прошол за 2 часа и проходить повторно желания не возникло.
Моя оцента 7 из 10 и друзья помните ЭТО КАЗУАЛЬНЫЙ КВЕСТ.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045208825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1440058283}
review:
[h1]Summary[/h1]
Short, decent hidden object game with a delightfully silly story. Some minor bugs and annoying mechanics are out-weighed by the exceedingly low price and the genuinely fun story and dialogue. If you enjoy the genre and you enjoy a good B-movie story, you should have a reasonably good time for a low price. 

[h1]Review[/h1]
You play as John, a generic American guy looking for his missing bride who apparently got kidnapped by her vampire father. You chase her to the titular Sinister City, the haven of all that is unholy. If that sounds rather silly, don’t worry, that’s the point. Not at any point are you supposed to be taking the game’s story seriously. That, combined with competent voice actors and well-written silly dialogue, provided a good amount of fun for me. Luckily the game does not last long enough (I finished it on advanced mode with all achievements in apparently 2.6 hours according to steam) or use the silliness too ham-fistedly for it to grow stale. I especially liked how they incorporated the silly story with the already silly “go find X items” or “go fix my Z” missions that are the staple of hidden object games. It made it amusing instead of just silly. 

The mechanics of the game were not the best admittedly. The hidden objects and mini-games were decidedly average for the genre coupled with an annoying tendency to have items hidden by other items with no indication that you can interact with the covering item. For example you are in a bookshop looking for item X. Item X is hidden behind a book… you need to click the right book to show it, but your cursor will not change as you hover over it. So basically you need to click all the books in the scene to show it. Sometimes it is more obvious which item is the covering one, but quite frequently you need to click a huge number of random items to find the right one. Which is not great design. However, there are no penalties for misclicks and there is a robust hint-system so when you get used to it, it’s not a huge deal (using the hint-system will costs you an achievement though if you care about that). 

Though old areas remain open as you open new ones, the items you need to find is always in the new areas or the game makes it obvious that you need to return to an old area (like, a character tells you to go back to the castle) so there is no annoying backtracking. 

People have reported a lot of bugs it seems. I only ran into one in one area and it was partially fixed by exiting to the main menu and totally fixed by restarting the game. 

Overall, I had a good time with Sinister City. I enjoyed the silly dialogue and story. The mechanics were nothing exciting, but I quite enjoy the genre so that was fine. For the price (I got it for 0.99 euro) I would definitely say it is worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012093560', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1439717244}
review:
Nie wiem dlaczego tyle hejtu leję się na tę grę. Jak na HOPA jest co najmniej średnia, a na plus trzeba zaliczyć też fakt, że dość zgrabinie udaje 3D, co w tym gatunku jest wręcz niespotykane (całkiem nieźle gra się też w okularach 3D). Modele postaci poza krukiem w jednej 5-sekundowej scenie nie straszą jakąś straszliwą szkaradnością. Dodatkowo kierujemy postacią w rzucie izometrycznym, co też jest novum w gatunku. 

Na plus zaliczyć trzeba koniecznie cenę - za ok. 4 zł dostajemy nienajgorsze HOPA. Grałem już w szkaradniejsze tytuły, za które twórcy na dzień dobry śpiewają sobie niebotyczne sumy, a i po obniżkach wychodzi drożej. Moim zdaniem to dobra cena  za 3h grania, gdzie możemy zdobyć minimum 3/4 achievek. 

Zła opnia o grze wydaje się brać z nieznajomości tematu oceniających lub nieobyciu. Jeśli ktoś kupował tę grę myśląc, ze to kolejna ponit'n'clickówka to nic dziwnego, zę się srodze załamał. Dla koneserów HOPA/HOG będzie znośna, a nawet miejscami zabawna, bo - druga cecha, której nie docenili krytycy - gra jest pastiszem horrorów. I muszę przyznać, że całkiem nieźle jej to wychodzi. Kolejne novum w gatunku, bo jeszcze nie spotkałem się z grą, która z przymrużeniem oka sympatycznie szydzi sobie z samej siebie, jak i wszystkiech gier tego typu. 

Słowem: jak wiesz z czym to się je i 4 zł to nie jest dla Ciebie ogromny wydatek - możesz dać jej szansę.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100332180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1438910038}

author: {'steamid': '76561198008914127', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1438602297}
review:
After reading the reviews, I thought it might be 'so bad it's good'. I was wrong!

Yes the dialogue did make me laugh out loud but that's about where the fun ended. This doesn't even work properly as a hidden object game or a point and click. When you have finished with a hidden object scene it doesn't tell you this, you just have to guess. As other reviews have said it's poorly rendered so it's difficult to see the objects (I swear a few were invisible) and it's buggy as hell - after 30 minutes some of the locations just whited out.

Just don't bother.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989596025', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 180, 'last_played': 1438202421}
review: Most hilariously "bad" game I've played in quite awhile. It's obviously a satire and the corny plot was clearly intentional. It did its job and entertained for a few hours, and at its $0.99 price point I can only recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052713577', 'num_games_owned': 2229, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1539593890}
review:
Дешевая игра от уже знакомых мне разработчиков приключенческих игр на поиск предметов.
Я никогда не требую от игр ничего сверхестественного, но в игре разработчики банально не исправили крупные баги, которые бросаются в глаза. Игра состоит из 3D моделей и двумерных фонов, на которых передвигаются персонажи. Очень часто попадаются баги, когда персонаж заходит прямо на здание или дверь, как будто координаты зон и триггеров смещены на пару десятков пикселей. Еще попадались странные баги, когда на локации я не мог выбрать действие (даже то, куда показывала подсказка) и в этом случае помогла перезагрузка игры и зоны стали кликабельны.
В общем игра не понравилась. У студии-разработчика данной игры есть игры и получше.

Ставлю единственный плюсик за 3D модели персонажей, хоть и простенько но со вкусом, времен 2005 г. Сделаны аккуратно и с любовью,

author: {'steamid': '76561197999329596', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 446, 'last_played': 1437197678}
review:
I am glad I ignored the negative reviews for this game, This is a misunderstood game. It was never intended to be a serious blood and gore vampire game, It was a satire on the whole vampire thing, and I found that refreshing. It was also corny like a 1950 B movie, which I believe was done intentionally. There is a lot of comedy in the game. I also liked the fact that the achievements were easy to obtain for a change. The game was also short in length which I consider a plus. I get tired of these epic 100 hour plus games that developers seem fond of creating lately.
 If you want a relaxing game that offers amusement and won't take weeks to complete then you will like this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991310275', 'num_games_owned': 4054, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1436772173}
review:
Here's a thing that annoyed me: You're often collecting some number of objects (bulbs, coins, etc) that appear in hidden-object scenes. These are sometimes hidden behind things in the scene, which you have to click on to move & reveal what you're looking for. But these concealing objects won't move out of the way if you click on them before you've gotten the collection task for the object they're in front of, which seems to me like cheating, in a way. 

And since there is no apparent penalty for mis-clicks, and no clue that something is moveable in this way, the best strategy is often to just spam the screen with clicks everywhere, in case something comes into view. 

The hit zones for hidden objects are also remarkably large, so you just have to click sorta kinda *near* what you're looking for. Several times, I was able to pick up multiple things by clicking repeatedly in exactly the same place.

Aspect ratio is messed up - it's obviously a 4:3 screen stretched to 16:9, in both full-screen and windowed mode. Text size & placement was also messed up on my 3840x2160 screen, and doesn't reset properly when switching from windowed to full-screen without closing & reopening. All-in-all, not one I can recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080027046', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 725, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 723, 'last_played': 1443098671}
review: One of those games that even a hunky main character can't make you like. Nice idea - crude execution. Nope.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028216179', 'num_games_owned': 2423, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1435545959}
review:
I bought this game based on the negative reviews and I don't regret it one bit.

This game is bad, quite bad, but on purpose. The story is dreadful but I found it amusing and unexpected. Game play is simple so nothing amazing there. Art is so-so. Everything about the game is middle ground and forgetable. I almost would regret it if it weren't for the corny story.

It starts off normal enough, John has to rescue his Nina from vampires. Then you realize everything is light hearted and not dark nor sinister. I found myself groaning more than once over the story but overall I laughed at it and enjoyed it for all it's horribleness. So for the cheap price I say give it a shot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056536414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 424, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1494837801}
review:
Bon... que pourrais-je bien vous dire sur ce jeu ? Premièrement il est mauvais, rempli de bug d'affichage ce qui nous empêche de finir certaines énigmes... cependant pourquoi permet-on de vendre un tel truc... PS : J'ai acheté ce jeu en pleine connaissance de cause à un prix très ridicule (0,21$) et lu les critiques des joueurs... ce qui me fait rire aux éclats c'est que je savais qu'il était null... je voulais essayer juste pour le fun pour finalement constatez-moi aussi que ce jeu est pourri :)) Veuillez prendre note que si vous aimez les jeux d'énigme et que vous êtes null comme moi... bien ce jeu est pour vous. 

Amicalement
Le pasteur

author: {'steamid': '76561198077867324', 'num_games_owned': 4172, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1431587104}
review:
I almost didn't buy this game thanks to the multitude of negative reviews. It was on sale, so I took a chance & bought it despite all the bad press. 
I personally didn't have any issues running the game unlike so many others (I'm using Win 8.1 on a stock XPS 8700). Not sure if there was an update that fixed the major bugs, there was no mention of one in View Update History.
A lot of reviewers have ridiculed the storyline - show me [b]ANY[/b] Hidden Object Game that doesn't have a ridiculous, overly fantastic story! 
Yes, the game does have bad voice acting - again, show me an HOG that doesn't!
Some reviewers mentioned low-res hidden object scenes that were overly difficult - I've seen better, but I've also seen worse. I just finished playing another HOG with inferior hidden object scenes when compared to Sinister City, despite being "remastered".

[u]Bottom line:[/u] Not the most polished HOG I've ever played, however the game never crashed on me, I was able to play it all the way through with no problems, & I got 100% achievements plus trading cards. I did see a few glitches, but nothing game-breaking. If you like Hidden Object Games, pick this one up on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010597228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 309, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1525375179}
review:
Skurill, idiotisch, bescheuert, unrealistisch, völlig verasrschend und so ernst gemeint wie ein zu Gott betender Satanist.

Besser kann man die Story nicht beschreiben, welche an sich genommen nichtmal so schlecht ist...

Aber!!! Jetzt kommt das große Aber!!!

Grafik ist eher nebensächlig, es ist die die beste, aber es gibt Spiele wie Tetris die schlechter aussehen ;)

Leider konnten sich die Entwickler nicht entscheiden, was sie eigentlich wollten... ein Third-Person oder First-Person... ersteres ist teilweise extrem schlecht umgesetzt, man fühlt sich teilweise völlig deplaziert oder man rennt in den Texturen rum, welche Wände oder Türen sind... Klickt man auf einen Bereich wird man sofort hinteleportiert, die Laufanimation hätte man sich so schenken können, die gibt es zwar, aber eigentlich nur zur unnötigen Dekoration.

Die Rätsel sind alles nur derselbe Suchkram, wobei es im Gegensatz zu den meisten Wimmelbildspielen in hektischer Klickerei ausartet, da man teilweise nicht weiß was man sucht, bzw. Gegenstände wichtig sind von denen man es bis dato garnicht weiß....
Oft genug verstecken sich die gesuchten Gegenstände hinter Dingen, die man erst beiseite schieben muss, nur weiß man das leider nicht... also probieren! Die ab und an eingestreuten Wimmelbildspiele sind meist sehr einfach und die Gegenstände völlig belanglos. Hinter dem letzten Gegenstand befindet sich immer etwas, was man zum Weiterkommen benötigt.
Sprecher sind ordentlich(Englisch) und die Texte gut übersetzt, der Sound ist nichts besonderes Ohrenkrebs bekommt man aber nicht da er kaum vorhanden ist oder mir nicht im Gedächtnis geblieben.

Was gibt es noch zu sachen... glaube nichts mehr^^

Fazit: 1 Euro ist dafür okay! Der Humor ist nicht jedermans Sache, stellenweise ist es einfach nur unterirdisch schlecht, manchmal aber auch komisch. Eine Empfehlung kann ich aber nicht geben!

author: {'steamid': '76561198036111186', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1434547991}

author: {'steamid': '76561198089568445', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 283, 'last_played': 1434093649}
review:
Before I begin, I have to say, I recommend and don't recommend this game. The problem is that this game clearly isn't for everyone, the story was alright, but not the best. When I read the description, I thought, "Oh, maybe this game will be horror related perhaps or at least have that sense of 'scary' vampires as well as his future wife turning into a vampire possibly making him turn into a vampire." Although, instead it gives you more of a comedy like relief than anything else, to me it really ruined the whole dark, 'scary' vampire part that I wanted. If you want a puzzle related game with a story that has nothing to do with dark vampires, but instead gives you a light-hearted, childish related vampire scenario, then this is the game for you. Although, paying only a dollar just to get it wasn't a total waste of my money for I did enjoy the game.

The problem with this game is the lack of the horror element in the game, this is a vampire game after all and therefore the characters should feel scared. It's also easy to beat the game, I beat it the first time in roughly 3 in a half hours, although that was on 'easy' difficulty.

Overall, I did enjoy the game, it was light-hearted, seemed more like a kids game than an adults game, especially with the 'find the items' part added into play. Do I recommend this to everyone, no, I only recommend this to people who want a light-hearted, puzzle related game that is kid friendly.

I rate the game 7/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106810138', 'num_games_owned': 2232, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1433330377}
review:
[b]An somewhat bland hidden object game that doesn't survive its bugs[/b].

You are John, a protagonist so bland he doesn't have a last name, personality or emotional range. You've come to Sinister City because your fiance has been kidnapped. Sinister City is where vampires live... or something? It's hardly explained, but apparently vampires and other supernatural monsters are not just fully accepted in this world but also big business.

I get what they're going for, a comical deconstruction of vampire tropes strung together with hidden object sequences, but the jokes tend to fall flat. What's worse, far worse, is that there are several glaring bugs in this less-than-two-hour game. Just after the main villain got revealed (your fiance's father objecting to your marriage) I got stuck and only after exiting back out to the menu and returning did it allow me to progress. Later on, at the big finale (...or what passes for it anyway) every click in a hidden object scene not only clicked something but also exited the scene. It was still possible to progress, but it was frustratingly tedious to automatically exit and then manually re-enter each scene after every single click. The icing on the cake is that the very last sequence even had its background bugging out, just [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=454353257]showing the clickable items on a white background[/url]. Comical deconstruction indeed.

With the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/MaraKalat/recommended/284710]Artifex Mundi games[/url] also available on Steam there is no reason at all to pick this up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088012846', 'num_games_owned': 252, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1433179553}

author: {'steamid': '76561198071627951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 190, 'last_played': 1432929486}

author: {'steamid': '76561198057681911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1432882585}
review:
L'histoire est légère. Le jeux pas compliqué. Bref pour jouer sans prise de tète, sur une duré de vie de 1h30 2heurs.
Pour valider le 100% j'y est passé 6heurs (refait le jeux 3 fois) et j'ai réussi en fesant une bidouille...

Le bug des succès est visiblement connu de l'équipe de dévelopement depuis plus d'un an. Aucun correctif apporté...

Il y a pas mal d'autre petit bug qui oblige à revenir au menu principal et relancer la partit.

0/10 (je ne met même pas 1, trop de bug et ce qui ressemblerai à du foutage de gueul étant donné que rien ne soit corriger, et même un bug super étrange avec les succès qui ce valide dans steam et s'éfface automatiquement).

Visiblement ont peut choper la BO pourri du jeux gratuitement maintenant... c'est bien mais je pense que corriger les bugs serait plus utile que de proposer ce genre de contenu suplémentair.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054803370', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1432219511}
review:
Such a bizarre and quirky game. It was like playing a bad movie. While I enjoyed the cheesiness, and the hidden pictures, as well as the mini-games, I really got frustrated because of the bugs. 
There are a lot of bugs in this game. I had to reload several times due to errors that caused the game to be unplayable.

Bug #1 Random white squares during hidden pictures parts of the game causing me to reset multiple times. (Requires restart or going back to main menu)

Bug #2 Bugs causing me to be unable to leave a certain area. (Requires restart or going back to main menu)

Bug #3 Getting stuck on the map screen. (Requires restart or going back to main menu)

Bug #4 Walking through many objects: Walls, doors, floors ETC. (not game breaking, just weird)

Various other visual bugs that aren't game-breaking, but still weird.

If you can look past all of that, then you've got an okay game. Not great, but okay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084062834', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 206, 'last_played': 1431966765}
review:
SPOILER-GEFAHR
In dem Spiel "Sinister City" geht es um eine Liebesgeschichte zwischen zwei verlobten Menschen (?), der Vater der jungen Dame ist ein Vampierlord und entführt seine Tochter damit diese einen lokalen Vampier-Fernsehstar heiratet. Der "neue" Verlobte hat allerdings gar keine Lust die Tochter des Lords zu heiraten, da er bereits in einer Beziehung ist. 

BEWERTUNG
Die Geschichte ist eine der typischen "Ich-muss-meine-Verlobte-retten"-Geschichten und ziemlich oberflächlich. 
Hin und wieder haben ein paar Grafiken gebuggt, sodass der Charakter zum Beispiel mitten in einer Grafik steht, obwohl das nicht möglich sein sollte. 
Die Stimmen, Soundeffekte und Musik waren, trotz herunterstellen in den Optionen, immer zu laut und oft übersteuert. Nach den ersten paar Minuten habe ich meine Kopfhörer dann neben mich gelegt und das war immer noch zu laut.
Die Übersetzungen sind wirklich nicht gut. Das fällt besonders während den Suchbilder auf. So sollte ich zum Beispiel nach "Zwiebel" suchen, der Tipp hat mir irgendwann verraten, das die "Zwiebel" eine Weihnachtsbaumkugel ist oder eine der "Palme(n)" ist eine Hand. Das tritt leider ein paar Mal auf.
Die Suchbilder sind oft viel zu dunkel/haben einen schwarzen Bereich, auf dem nichts zu erkennen ist. Da genau dort aber oft Dinge versteckt sind, hilft dort nur ein Tipp oder wildes, wilkürliches Klicken.
Oft kann man Dinge, die offen herumliegen, erst nach x-maligem Klicken einsammeln, was sehr nervt. 

MEINUNG 
Meine persönliche Meinung zu dem Spiel: 
Die Story ist eigentlich gut gelungen, nur gewisse Logikfehler machen die Atmosphäre sehr kaputt. 
Durch die nervigen Falsch-Übersetzungen ist es teilweise nicht möglich ohne Tipps.
Es hatte Potenzial, das leider nicht ausgeschöpft wurde.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085477429', 'num_games_owned': 1118, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1431935166}

author: {'steamid': '76561198169497375', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1431673116}
review:
セールで99円の時に購入。日本語字幕に対応しているので、英語が出来ない方でも大丈夫です。
ゲーム内容は依頼主から指定されたものを探し、それを依頼主に渡してストーリーを進めていくのが中心で
時々パズルを解いて進む必要があります。
ストーリーは、主人公のジョンの花嫁ニーナが何者かによって連れ去られてしまいます。
連れ去った犯人の正体はなんと500年以上も生き続けている吸血鬼だったのです！という感じのものです。

クリアした感想ですが、ストーリーは他の方も言っているようにB級映画のような仕上がりになっていて、
個人的にはクスッとくる部分があり、楽しめました。
ゲーム内容については、パズルよりももの探しの方が難しいです。しかし、少し操作しないと、怪しい部分に青い
エフェクトが掛かるので、ストレスも特になく進めることが出来ました。

欠点としては、日本語訳が間違ってる部分があり、シール（スタンプ）を探さなくてはいけない部分がアザラシと
表記されている、というような部分が数ヶ所あります。
もし、指定されたものを探しているんだけどどうしても見つからないという時はヒントを使うといいです。

まとめとしては、このゲームは肩の力を抜いて楽しむゲームであり、頭をひねるようなゲームをやりたいという方には合わない
と思います。個人的には、暇つぶし程度にはなったのでおすすめということにしておきます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198062558470', 'num_games_owned': 903, 'num_reviews': 197, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1432136524}
review:
This game is a nice point and click game with some nice puzzles in it. The Story is short and cute.
The only annoying thing I saw was one of the "Quests" if you will call it that, It told me to use my finger across the screen (?) And it was really hard to control it with the mouse. 

It only got 17 Achievement and is one of the games which you can complete easily to a perfect game.

Due to the fact that it is only 2 hours long I wouldn't recommend buying this game for the full price of 5€. Buy this game when it is on sale for 99 cents or less.

I can recommend this game to every 90's kid due to the memories of the floppy disks!

author: {'steamid': '76561197970728484', 'num_games_owned': 3244, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1562563757}
