author: {'steamid': '76561198049045226', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1490822866}
review:
Po kilkunastu miesiącach powróciłam do tej gry. Być może to zmiana karty grafincznej spowodowała, że wymianione poniżej błędy już się nie powtórzyły. 
Grafika nadal jest kiepska, interfejs beznadziejny, ale to co wpłynęło na zmianę mojej opini nt. gry jest pewna dawka poczucia humoru - bezczelne "puszczanie oczka" do gracza. Baaardzo mi się to spodobało :D
Jednak warto było ukończyć grę ;)

[Stara recenzja:]
Omijać z daleka! Niestety, ogromna ilość błędów w tej grze uniemożliwia rozgrywkę:
- w scenach z HO oraz zadaniami białe prostokąty zajmują cały ekran,
- w scenie z zadaniem do zrealizowania co 30 s. pada pytanie czy na pewno pominąć zadanie,
- dowolne kliknięcie w scenie HO powoduje wyrzucenie gracza do poprzedniej planszy,
- czasami na przedmiot trzeba klikać kilka razy, aby go zebrać.
Kolejną sprawą jest kiepski interfejs:
- brak kursorów symbolizujących możliwość przemieszczania się – w każdej scenie trzeba klikać na ślepo, bo może właśnie w prawym/górnym/lewym/dolnym rogu jest przejście do kolejnej planszy,
- w czasie rozmowy po każdym wypowiedzianym zdaniu trzeba kliknąć.
Już na początku gry okazuje się, że nasz bohater potrafi lewitować - w niektórych scenach unosi się metr nad podłożem. Kiepską grafikę oraz animacje można jeszcze przeżyć, ale w połączeniu z powyższym – nie warto zawracać sobie głowy tą grą.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109716822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1430892552}
review:
En variación interesante en los juegos de objetos ocultos ... algunas buenas ideas, pero demasiados errores.
La historia está destinado a ser divertido, pero el humor es pesimo y  muy mal escrito. Hay bastantes errores que requieren reiniciar el juego con el fin de solucionarlos.
Las escenas de objetos ocultos son demasiado fáciles y ademas demaciado corto, lo medio decente por no decir faciles son los puzzles. 
Música aburrida, sensación de que no te estás enterando de nada... en general, para mi gusto, un desastre que no merece la pena a menos que venga en un bundle 
Las animaciones en 3D añaden un buen toque, y la actuación de voz es decente. Desafortunadamente, las fallas mantienen este juego a no ser divertido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056151662', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1430791488}
review:
Bear in mind, just because I can't recommend it, it doens't mean it didn't entertain me for two hours. It works, doesn't crash, and the hint button fills up quickly. However, because of the way it's made, you'll be using it quite a bit.

This game is a bit rough around the edges. The objects sometimes don't look how you'd expect them to, requiring you to use the hint button. This is far from the H.O,Gs from Big Fish.

The achievements pop up as completed yet aren't. Steam says I've got 15 out of 17, but there are actually five missing. Confusing and irritating, I'd rather they be absent than not work.

The story is cringe worthy. It's just awful. I know it's supposed to be tongue in cheek, but the dialogue is the cheesiest going, and the voice acting really quite rotten. Sometimes the written text doesn't match up with the spoken dialogue, which throws one a bit. 

If you can tolerate the bizarre and insane hotel manager at the start, you'll probably have a good few hours of distraction with this game. But I can't recommend this, simply as it lacks any polish and an interesting story line. 

I don't wish to be mean to the developers, and I wish them luck in their future projects, and I will look out for their other works to see if they've improved their writing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000669253', 'num_games_owned': 595, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1438969880}
review:
Chock full of bugs.  Clicking hidden objects sometimes takes you away from the current puzzle.  Eventually I couldn't click into puzzles and so had to give up.  

Hides things completely out of sight (have to click on other things you have no reason to click on to find things).

author: {'steamid': '76561198144055412', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1430359444}
review:
Sinister City... Veamos.

Poco se puede decir de este juego. Y lo poco que se puede decir de él no habla a su favor. Es un juego de búsquedad que, supuestamente, gira en torno a la desaparición de la mujer del protagonista...

Bueno. La historia estaría bien si no fuera por que la mayor parte de cosas que ocurren en la trama son sacadas de la manga.
"¿Sabes qué?, si me ayudas a buscar mis afcturas te dejo la habitación gratis".

Eso sin contar con la gran cantidad de glitches que he encontrado durante mis menos de 50 minutos de juego. Uno de ellos incluso me forzó a salir del juego porque no podía continuar.

Pantallas en blanco. Diálogos insulsos y absurdos. Una historia que no te cuenta nada... (Que a ver, es un juego de búsqueda, la cosa es encontrar lo que estás buscando... pero si vas a meterle historia, por lo menos busca algo que contar... si no limítate a la búsqueda).

Música aburrida, sensación de que no te estás enterando de nada... en general, para mi gusto, un desastre que no merece lo que cuesta.

Esperemos que los diseñadores mejoren para la próxima vez.

author: {'steamid': '76561198173104653', 'num_games_owned': 411, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1430579204}
review:
比起这个工作室的另一款作品(Alchemy Mysteries: Prague Legends)，本作出现了主人公本人模型，可以操作小人在地图里行走，但代价是各种莫名其妙的BUG，经常导致寻找线索变得异常困难甚至无法进行，有时还会出现各种黑片，目前唯一知道的解决办法就是退回主菜单重新进入，考虑到加载时间并不长，如果能接受这个节奏，这个游戏还是可以进行下去的。

个人觉得最搞笑的地方是男主在“好莱坞名导的玄孙”的“指点”下看到了抓鬼道具上“MADE IN CHINA”的标识，让男主对这个小镇的传说陷入了深深的绝望，简直笑瞎，不过转念一想，魂淡！谁说中国货就是假的了？你怎么知道这不是茅山道士抓鬼道具的出口型号？魂淡！扣分！

亮点的话：自带简体中文（有的地方翻译有问题）、有卡片、有成就（易得）

总体来说，如果能够接受BUG时需要退出再进入的节奏，并且想要成就和卡片以及一款外语盲能够轻松看懂的解密类游戏，这款游戏可以入（以慈善包形式）

author: {'steamid': '76561198042831386', 'num_games_owned': 598, 'num_reviews': 627, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1428329709}
review:
[h1]Short version: 23%[/h1]
Ever wanted a Plan 9 level of train wreck in a hidden object game format? Here it is then!

[h1]Long version:[/h1]
Do you believe that Twilight was the worst thing to happen to vampire stories? Did you think that you’ll never find a hidden object game on par with [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/321600/]The Flying Dutchman[/url]? You were wrong.

Because this game is bad. Astonishingly, mind-numbingly bad. For starters, it fails as a hidden object game with almost completely empty scenes. Don’t put much hope in the puzzles either, they are about as complex as a slab of stone.
And there is the story. Oh gods, the story. It has an interesting premise, sure: vampires are an everyday part of society, they work like anybody else. But unlike True Blood, this one was written by dumb people for dumber people. The plot is stupid. The characters are even more stupid. And the dialogues… the dialogues make a five-year old child’s screenplay look like Oscar Award material.

But! If you can enjoy terrible movies like Plan 9, The Room, or Birdemic, then you will surely have a hilarious time with Sinister City.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971278329', 'num_games_owned': 2661, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1483535169}
review:
Que dire... Les modèles 3D ne cassent pas des briques, mais le jeu tournera sur des config modestes. Le scénario est digne d'un arlequin avec des vampires verts aux yeux rouges. C'est telment poussif que je me demande si ce n'est pas du second degré. Le jeu n'est pas dénué d'un certain humour, petit florilège:
- Pieu en bois (made in China), tout se perd.
- Ma femme n'est pas actrice, elle est écologiste!
- Où travail un vampire doué d'une force de persuasion? Dans une agence immobilière.
Les scénes d'objets cachés sont assez nombreuses mais assez courtes, les petits puzzles sympa et pas trop dur. Il est relativement court, compter à peine plus de 3h pour débloquer 100% des succès. Un jeu à réserver à la cousine de 12 ans pour Halloween ou alors pour les fans du genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079076912', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1428752244}
review:
Čo do pekla to je? 
Toto je seriózne najhoršia hidden object hra akú som kedy hrala. 
1. kurzor sa vôbec nemení a preto musíte len slepo hádať, čo asi robiť (ak ste v easy móde, aspoň ukazuje svetielko)
2. po chvíli pri hidden object scénach vás po nájdení jednej veci vyhodí zo scény von a vy musíte opakovane vstupovať a vychádzať zo scény aby ste ju mohli dokončiť
3. po úžasnej scéne kde sa dozvedáme, že Ninu niekto uniesol sa mi nedá klikať už nikde, kurzor po kliknutí na hocičo ukazuje X. Vypla som hru a zo zvedavosti ju znova zapla. Problém bol vyriešený...na ako dlho?
4. lietajúci ľudia (bug kedy podlaha zjavne neexistuje)
5. príbeh - upír chce vydať svoju dcéru za upírskeho herca Telletubbies aby sa z nej stala Hollywoodska hviezda - wtf???
6. titulky nesedia s tým, čo postavy hovoria...pár krát som sa musela pozastaviť aj nad názvami vecí v HOS kde namiesto cranberry kľudne použijú cowberry (predtým som tento výraz nepočula a nie je to ojedinelý prípad kedy je označenie neobvyklé)

svetlé stránky: kartičky + pokusy o humor - vybavenie proti upírom je made in china, Wampire state building
Absolútne neodporúčam. Ani zadarmo: 2/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198083289730', 'num_games_owned': 1424, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1434044714}

author: {'steamid': '76561198112486038', 'num_games_owned': 1524, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1428752918}
review:
For starters, the game is a hidden object game with a great title "Sinister City: Vampire Adventure".  But that is the only thing good it has to offer.  If you are looking for a dark and scary story, forget about it,  there is nothing scary about this game.  
The story evolves around a silly plot that goes like this: Your girlfriend was hidden from you by his father who turns out to be a vampire lord.  Your future father-in-law is basically against your relationship because you are just a mere mortal.  Because you are more interested in the undead than the living, you still went out and searched for your bloodsucking girlfriend.  
You do this and that. Then followed by you look for this and that.  And a little more of you fetch this and that.  Then towards the end the story takes an odd turn which was absolutely ridiculous.  I don't want to spoil the ending for you, but believe me it was rather silly.
The puzzles are rather easy and the only challenge is when you are trying to locate objects that were microscopic and finding things that blend with their backgrounds, other than that it was smooth sailing for me.
In conclusion, I would NOT recommend this game,  I like the artwork and the graphics but I just could not stand the horrible plot.  As they say " Don't judge a book by its cover" or in my case the "Title".  If you are looking of a challenging game, I suggest you find it elsewhere.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034118715', 'num_games_owned': 4134, 'num_reviews': 508, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1426075860}
review:
JetDogs Studiosが贈るカジュアルHidden Objectゲー
これ以外のゲームはJetdogs Studios名義で登録されてて
何故かこれだけストアで浮いちゃってるという謎仕様

Hidden Objectって云うのは乱雑に物が散らばってる
ごちゃごちゃした画面から指定のものを探せっていう
言ってみればデジタル版の「ウォーリーをさがせ！」

海外では市民権を得ていてSteamにもこのタグが付いた
ゲームが100本以上もあるADVとしては定番ジャンル
当然なにかしら工夫を加えないと埋もれてしまう

そこでお出しするのが「婚約者がさらわれた！　しかも
さらった奴は500年もの年を経た伝説級の吸血鬼！」からの
庶民的ズッコケホームコメディっていうよくわからなさ

ドラマだったら間違いなく観客の笑い声が足されるような
気の抜けたストーリーと二時間も遊べば終わるボリュームで
肩肘張らずに楽しんでさくっと忘れるには悪くないゲーム

ただし例えばコンパスを探せと言われても方位磁針なのか
円を書く製図用のなのか判断がつかないところも含めての
モノ探しゲームなんだと思うけど、その辺の解釈のブレが
翻訳で間違ったほうに狭められちゃってるのが少々残念

メモ代わりに正誤表を残しておくから閲覧は自己責任で

誤：コショウ→正：[spoiler]トウガラシ(Red pepper)[/spoiler]
誤：コップ→正：[spoiler]ワイングラス(グラスもコップの内。取っ手付きはカップ)[/spoiler]
誤：標識→正：[spoiler]筆記具のマーカー(Maker？)[/spoiler]
誤：鋤→正：[spoiler]スペード(鋤を図案化したものがスペード)[/spoiler]
誤：弓→正：[spoiler]蝶結び(どっちもBow)[/spoiler]
誤：ジャッキ→正：[spoiler]トランプのJ(どっちもJack)[/spoiler]
誤：ヤシ→正：[spoiler]掌(どっちもPalm)[/spoiler]
誤：アザラシ→正：[spoiler]スタンプ(印鑑もアザラシもSeal)[/spoiler]
誤：手袋(Glove)→正：[spoiler]地球儀(Globe)　誤訳[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198022458781', 'num_games_owned': 2809, 'num_reviews': 206, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1425679105}

author: {'steamid': '76561198049101018', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1425591801}
review: Puffff, bastante tonto, la verdad, pretende ser gracioso pero sólo es absurdo, y con ese nombre, esperaba otra cosa del juego. También es demasiado corto y la interfaz es muy pobre. Los pocos puzzles que tiene son facilísimos y algunos se repiten bastante. Las EOO normales, tampoco para tirar cohetes. En fin, yo entiendo que son juegos que se hacen con poco presupuesto y que para lo que ha costado tampoco se puede pedir mucho, pero, lo siento, me ha resultado un poco decepcionante y bastante aburrido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025759885', 'num_games_owned': 1172, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1440256248}
review:
Atención jugadores!

** Si no les gustan las aventuras point&click y resolver puzzles medianamente dificiles, este no es su juego **

A diferencia de otros juegos de P&C esta aventura cuenta con un entorno 3D bien logrado a mi parecer, no es lo último en gráficos pero tampoco esta muy atrás. Aunque no lo he terminado, no me parece un juego mal logrado, las voces y la ambientación junto con la música crean una atmosfera bastante amena. Aunque la historia hasta el momento no es nada espectacular, tampoco es del todo aburrida, tiene varias cosas que en vez de dar miedo dan risa.

¿Cómo conseguí el juego, lo compré?
No tengo idea, lo compraria si tuviera un descuento de más del 50%

Me gusta el terror ¿debería comprarlo?
Si para ti terror es que los cromos esten súper caros, entonces si

Me gustan los point&click ¿vale su precio?
No tengo experiencia con otros P&C pero si te lo encuentras de oferta, lo recomiendo

Pros:
-Buen artwork
-Buena música
-Modelos 3D moderadamente buenos
-Dialogos, movimientos faciales y voces detallados

Contras:
-Cromos muy caros
-Bugs visuales (camina sobre paredes y esas cosas)
-Traducción al español decente con palabras desconocidas
--Atención spoiler--
-[spoiler]Al protagonista le importa un huevo si su novia se la robaron, el tiene que resolver puzzles y tomarse todo el tiempo que necesite[/spoiler]

Conclusión
No: buh!
No: wow!
Si: meh!

author: {'steamid': '76561198009528477', 'num_games_owned': 1986, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1474451068}
review:
Have you ever lost your keys or any other small object and then spent a vast amount of time trying to find it ? This is the game for you, if you enjoyed the procedure. It doesn't hide its apparent mobile roots by telling you to "tap" a lot and, as if that isn't enough to sell you on this..."game", it also has bugs...I was on the edge of my seat, driven by pure adrenaline and rushing through the experience until I got stuck trying to fix some air conditioner for a vampire lady, which was impossible to do, thanks to me not being able to click and place objects. 
2 hours of gametime wasted ? Yes, sir..But it was worth every second to endure the exciting tale of you, John, some guy and your wife..soon to be wife..Nina, who is staying with her vampire Dad Orlok in SINISTER CITY (where the bats do crap and the wits are shitty..) and you are trying to WHATEVER, THIS IS GARBAGE !

author: {'steamid': '76561198009626740', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1465364050}
review: Отличная игра в стиле: "Ищи предметы". Сюжет вполне себе обычный, но не заезженный. Собственно, сама игра создана чисто для отдыха и, судя по жанру, расчитана на игроков женского комьюнити. В игры подобного плана играю и не брезгую. Они отлично помогают расслабться после тяжелого рабочего дня или сложной игры. Рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979584400', 'num_games_owned': 3454, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1420917998}
review:
ゲーム開始直後、これは買って失敗したか？！と思ったが、遊んでいるうちにだんだんと味が出てきた。
他の方も書かれているように、B級お馬鹿ホラー映画のノリ。
そう思うと、アイテム探しステージでの誤訳や、都合の良いストーリー展開、調子の良い登場人物たち、ちょろちょろ残っているバグも許せてしまう。
よくよく読んでみると、ストアページの作品紹介文からしてB級テイストを感じることが出来る。

アイテム探しステージでは、手前のアイテムを動かしてその奥にあるアイテムを探す場面が多々ある。
が、例えば「釘で打ち付けられた木箱」と「釘抜き」があれば、これは開けられるのかな？と考えられるのだが、このゲームの場合はちょっと違う。無数に置いてある同じような物がひょいと動いてしまうのだからこれは分からない。
幸い、ミスクリックしてもペナルティは無いようだし、ヒントは何度でも使える。

日本語対応、値段も安いことを考えて５点満点で３点。

review: Bardzo przyjemna gra typu hidden objects, tak na jeden wieczór. Jedyną wadą są uciążliwe bugi które powodują czasami że nie możemy kliknąć konkretnego obiektu lub automatycznie wyrzuca nas z 'lokacji' - jednak na szczęście restart gry pomaga

author: {'steamid': '76561198058687420', 'num_games_owned': 685, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1418562623}
review:
Games like this are what makes it dangerous to dig into the obscure depths of your steam backlog. Don't give in because of the cheap price, throwing that money down a gutter is a far better investment.

1) Saying the story is ludicrous doesn't even begin to cover it. It's not even funny bad, it is depressingly bad. Worse even...

2) You can't escape the story. No matter how much you try to fast click through things, the game will not allow you to go find some hidden objects or puzzles, it is *intent* on walking you through the "story". Then again, that would only be bad if you were eager to do the puzzles and HO segments. Which you aren't. Basically...

3) These are easily the stupidest hidden object scenes I have ever encountered, and I've played through alot of crap in my time. It's a hidden object game. Hide the darn thing! If I have a list of 6 items to find and I'm looking at a suitcase with 7 items in it, WHAT IS THE POINT?

4) And so as not to waste your time anymore, let's sum up everything else that's bad: There are zero redeeming elements to the gameplay and puzzles: when they aren't so boring they put you to sleep, or so easy a 2 year old would breeze through them, they're so unintuitive it's baffling. The voiceacting is so unbearably bad I was forced to mute it. As for the art and animations, cringeworthy is the only word that comes to mind. But hey, they are combined brilliantly with the game's general technical incompetence: There is a whole area where you consistently float around because they forgot to add a floor(!). And that's hardly a unique event, since there's a bottomless pit worth of bugs and glitches to enjoy here.

Which brings me to what I loved most about this game: I got a game-breaking bug. :D So I can now in good conscience remove this game from my backlog, toss it in the garbage can, and never think of it ever again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041113007', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1483476966}
review:
I liked it. Yes, there were some bugs, but they disappear once you go to the menu and then come back to the game. Is really easy and short, that's true. But for this price, I'd say it's worth it. Grab it on a sale, if you're afraid. 

Anyway, it's short and has some bugs. But the story is priceless. Some people here said it was [i]bad[/i], but I found it hilarious. The voice acting, the characters, the story and the general mood of the game, is obviously a comedy. And it made me smile quite a few times, so that's good on my book!

I can't really say this is a GOOD game, but it's really cheap, it has trading cards, and it distracted me for a few hours, in addition to being funny. So hey, grab it if you don't have anything else to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005599387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1418045491}
review:
Das Spiel ist lächerlich...
Es geht darum herum zu klicken und zwar auf einer willkürlichen Weise...
Sinister City ist eine heitere, spöttische Komödie, die so wenig Sinn ergibt und doch eine Geschichte hat..?
Man spielt das Spiel und denkt sich: "Was für ein Schwachsinn!", "Vielleicht sollte ich über den Inhalt und über das 'Worum' mir keine Gedanken machen..?"

Wenn das Spiel eine Parodie auf die Wimmelbildspiele sein soll, dann ist das Spiel vielleicht gar nicht mal so schlecht.
Nichts für ungut: Es muss eine Satire sein!

author: {'steamid': '76561198044668090', 'num_games_owned': 1567, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1417900301}
review:
Just finished the game now and honestly, I'm glad I got it in a bundle. The storyline is hilariously bad, the voice acting is terrible and the lines just makes you wonder if you're not seeing a terrible (even worse..)spin-off some bad vampire movie.

Then there's the bugs.You have to quit to the main menu and go back in because you keep seeing tons of white boxes on screen; not to mention the hidden objects scenes throw you out of the scene and you need to keep clicking to go back in, object by object.

I DID have fun tho, the dialogue is so terrible you end up having a laugh or two with it. Not sure if the game devs were trolling or not, but if they were, kudos for this one!

TL,DR--> Don't bother.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060731577', 'num_games_owned': 2394, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1417861173}
review:
Very weird mainstory, easy puzzles and low difficulty level are good for sure. But game still have many bugs and not-so-best graphic.
I would recommend this game for people who like to get easily 100% of achievements and/or funny story. 
Maybe game isn't too long (I completed it twice in less than 3 hours) and is not the best, but for that price it is very good.
My ratings:
*Story* - 4/10
*Music* - 5/10
*Graphic* - 5/10
*Gameplay* - 5/10
***Average*** - 5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198067473432', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1417827615}
review: I really love hidden object games and I really wanted to love this one too since it was cheap and so. The story had potential if only it had better voice acting maybe? The thing that really brought this game down was the graphics, the hidden object areas were so pixelated that you could barely tell what you were looking at. Most of the time I ended up randomly clicking all over the screen until I found all of the objects. The game also was very buggy, in one scene the hidden object area kept kicking me out of the area everytime I clicked on something and certain places had graphic glitches. I wouldn't recommend this game even if it was discounted to barely nothing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141836583', 'num_games_owned': 273, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1419707921}
review:
First of all, this game isn't too bad. Yes, the story is ridiculous and cheesy, but I'm thinking that the devs did this on purpose. It actually made me smile several times during gameplay.

In my opinion the puzzles weren't hard at all, they didn't slow your progress down. So they were a nice change between all the clicking and searching for hidden items.
I did experience some minor bugs (closing the game and restarting it, fixed it), but nothing really gamebreaking.

All in all, if you want to play something that is light and doesn't need much concentration. And you like ridiculous "horror" stories, then this is something for you. It isn't too expensive (although i got mine from a bundle), so just give it a shot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098229889', 'num_games_owned': 5344, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1416583950}
review:
El juego tiene un montón de cosas mal, pero bueno.

La historia es medianamente entretenida, si no tuviera tantos fallos que la arruinan teniendo que salir no sólo al menú sino del juego completamente para arreglarlo, y aunque es un poco quisquilloso se hace ameno de jugar (al menos la primera vez).

Lo recomiendo para que te lo regalen o que te venga en un bundle, realmente no  deberías comprar este juego a menos que esté por debajo de 1€. Habiendo tantas otras aventuras como ésta, no es una buena opción.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026779638', 'num_games_owned': 11361, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1416518045}
review:
This game is one of the worst if not [i]the[/i] worst game I have ever played in my entire life! I really like hidden object game so that's not the issue. The thing is... This game is poorly made. The story, the voiceacting, and you will encounter tons of bugs e.g.:

[list]
    [*]White boxes everywhere in a hidden object scene
    [*]In certain hidden object scenes each click will throw you out of the scene, rinse repeat (unless you restart the game)
    [*]You need to guess where the hidden object scenes even are, how many of a certain item is placed in each one + no indication what is clickable or whether there is an item hidden behind another one or not. In order to complete the scenes, you basicly need to click on everything..
    [*]You often need to restart the game because of bugs e.g. when the game doesn't register any clicks being made in a scene
    [*]Every time someone finishes a sentence you need to click to get to the next sentence
    [*]Generally the story is really poor concerning the dialogue
    [*]The English subtitles are even different from the spoken English
    [*]The graphics are not the greatest thing and sometimes the characters are floating above the ground when they obviously shouldn't.
    [*]The animations in the game are extremely poor. Especially the raven flying away at the castle.
    [*]The puzzles are really dull
    [*]The achievements are not unlocking in right order and there is a broken achievement - but they seemed to have fixed it today (20/11-14), so the game might be further improved.
[/list] 

The only good thing about the game is the ending. The outtakes are a bit funny. But that's all. And the fact, it's 3~ hours game with possibility to unlock all achievements since they finally fixed it. [b]Though I would still not recommend the game at all[/b].

review:

        [td]レビュー[/td]

[td]
[quote=]隠しアイテムを探すこと！　そしてヴァンパイアを倒すこと！
それは無理でも彼女を返してもらえるまでバカにしてやる.
[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/326180] 引用元 [/url][/quote]

クリック型探索アドベンチャーで、指定されたアイテムを入手し
吸血鬼にさらわれた婚約者であるニーナを探し出し救出する事が最終目標.
その他にもパズル要素や、予測不可能なB級ストーリー展開はプレイヤーを飽きさせる事はないだろう.

[h1]プラスポイント[/h1]
[u][b]●圧巻のB級ストーリー[/b][/u]
主人公：ジョンが何故、ヴァンパイアを倒す為に時間を加速させる必要があったのか…
[b]それは自分の目で確かめて欲しい.[/b]

[h1]マイナスポイント[/h1]
[u][b]●見つかりにくいアイテム[/b][/u]
このようなジャンルだとよくある事だが、画面内を片っ端からクリックして
しらみ潰しに指定されたアイテムを探す必要がある.

画像ありの指定されたアイテムは簡単だが
文字のみで「帽子」や「花ビン」など、様々なアイテムを指定される事があり
こちらは通常では見つけにくく、他のレビュアーを見る限り、これが低評価の原因だろう.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=343969479
しかし何度も使えるヒント機能があり
それを使えば確実に見つけ出す事が出来るため難易度は非常に簡単.
これはパズル要素にもあり、解かなくてもスキップすればクリアは可能.
[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]総評[/td]
[td]
スキップ等を使えば一時間半程度でクリアする事が可能で
時間的にも、B級映画一本を見るような気持ちでやると気軽に楽しめる.
カードが付いて来て、全スキップ、ヒント等使っても１周で9割は実績解除が可能.
定価でも十分安いためB級映画好きなら買っても良いゲーム.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067299072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1530121970}
review:
150分でクリア出来る物探しアドベンチャー。日本語字幕つき。Ｂ級ホラーをテーマにしているだけあってゲームの作りもかなりのＢ級。アイテムは隠し絵ではなく、そのまま画面に置かれているだけ。ただし物陰に隠れているものが幾つかあり、これは前面のオブジェクトを動かすまで現れない。そのせいで見えている物を片っ端からクリックしないとクリアできないゲームになってしまっている。描画も粗く、この手の洋ゲーに付きものの誤訳も健在で「ヤシ」とか「ジャッキ」とか「アザラシ」などと言われてもそんな物は永遠に見つからない。幸い余計なアイテムはほとんど描かれておらず、カーソルの当たり判定も無闇に広いので、とりあえずそれっぽい所を順にポチッていけば勝手に何かを拾って終わってくれる。ミニゲームのパズルはどれも子供騙しだし小バグも多いようで、レビューの多くが「否定的」なのも十分肯ける。
が、しかし。

なんだろう。この作品にはこのまま捨て置くには惜しい、禍々しい魅力がある。実際、皮肉でも誇張でもなく、今年Steamで一番笑えたゲームがこれだった。初出はiPhone版で四年ほど前のようだが、なぜ全く話題にならなかったのか不思議だ。
まず冒頭のホテルのミッションからして、Ｂ級ハンターならきっと髪の毛がピンと逆立つほどの妖気を覚えるはずである。そして、その期待は最後まで裏切られることがない。セリフ・人物・ストーリー、どれも非の打ち所のないＢ級展開の連続で、二十一世紀の現代においては文化財レベルの駄作に仕上がっている。マニア受けを狙った似非Ｂ級ホラーは数々あれど、この作品はどこかが違う、「真性」の風格を備えているのだ。そして、それらの期待をも軽々と超越する中盤以降のドンデン返し。この先はもうエンディングが気になって、トイレに行く間も惜しんでプレイを続けてしまった。終わった瞬間の後悔の心地よさは、とてもこの場では言い尽くせない。「ジャンク」「ビザール」「トラッシュ」、こうした文句に胸を熱くさせる人ならば、きっと心の殿堂リストに加えたくなるはずである。

こんな駄文にここまで目を通してくれた貴方にもきっと素質はあるはずだ。安いバンドルやセールで見かけたら、ぜひ購入を検討してみてほしい。いや、むしろ定価の300円で買ってしまってもいいかもしれない。その方が以後ライブラリを眺めた時の苦笑が一層味わい深くなるだろう。いずれにせよ、こけおどしのつまらない新作ホラー映画を借りて見るよりは有意義なお金の使い途になると請け合います。

author: {'steamid': '76561197969267147', 'num_games_owned': 7582, 'num_reviews': 572, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1415808454}
review:
An interesting variation on hidden-object games ... some nice ideas, but too many flaws.

The story is meant to be funny, but the humor is hurt by very poor writing. There were a few bugs that required me to restart the game in order to fix them.

The hidden-object scenes are a bit too easy. It's altogether too short.

The 3D animations add a nice touch, and the voice acting is decent. Unfortunately, the flaws keep this game from being fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030756323', 'num_games_owned': 2067, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1415315123}
review:
The game is easy, short and have a couple of minor bugs.

However, it was a lot of fun for me. I am not a fan of HOG or point and click games, what made it for me was what more people is complaining about, the storyline. Yes, it is too cheesy and badly scripted, but that is what appealed to me. That and the low production value feeling from the nineties that that this gaame has to offer.

As an old school gamer these are days where I need to play many games before I find one to my liking, so I appreciate the enjoyment I got from this game, despite the short experience.

I got this in a bundle but I saw that some reviewers are writing that the game is not worth the full price (3 EUR or 2 GBP) and to wait for a sale. Really? It is totally worth that amount. I have paid much more for AAA titles that gave me less enjoyment.

I do recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995244599', 'num_games_owned': 1780, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1415114055}
review:
From time to time I am partial to point and click puzzle games and while they may not be thrilling I enjoy the challenge non the less. It was that reason I played this game today, completing it in 2.6 hours. 

The good points - 
I did enjoy most of the puzzles 
Graphics were reasonable 

The bad points - 
A story line that is silly and virtually meaningless 
The one off puzzles come with no instructions which is fine for the most part though some are not obvious
I experienced glitches a few times, I would not be able to click anything - had to close the game and re open (3 x in all)


Even for the price of £1.99 I wouldn't suggest purchsaing this at full price, if you are interested then wait for a sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059491329', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1414865392}
review: Nope, nope, nope and nope! This game is so bad that I can't come up with a single positive thing to say about it. Too many bugs, such as the screen turning completely white during hidden object scenes, which makes it hard to proceed. The story line is incredibly horrible, as is the awful voice acting. Save your money and time on something that is actually enjoyable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004038352', 'num_games_owned': 1696, 'num_reviews': 247, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1414782511}
review: Badly programmed, poorly written history line full of clichés, non-intuitive puzzles, repetitive, obsolete graphics, cheesy voice interpretations... At least I've got it in a bundle with better games and it's no wonder it has been on 90% sale discount sometimes. I'm not very fond of hidden object games, but if you're looking for point and click adventures, go play some Telltale titles or classics from Sierra and Lucas Arts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087834803', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1439247562}
review:
Boring gameplay and terrible controls. The hidden object scenes only give you a few items at a time, and you can't move on to the next part of the list until you've found all of them. The mouse pointer doesn't give any indication of what's clickable, so sometimes an object will be behind something else in a scene, and you don't know what you can move unless you just frantically click on everything. There's no indication of area transitions, either, so even the most basic action of moving from place to place gets irritating. Plus there's a bug where sometimes the game won't register ANY area transitions as being clickable, so you're stuck unless you restart the game.

I bought this in a bundle with 6 other games for $1.89 and I still think I paid too much.

EDIT: Went back to finish the game. I think the area transition issue was fixed since I wrote my initial review, but I got some buggy minigames. (At least you can skip those.) The biggest issue for me was still the lack of a context-sensitive mouse cursor.

I do like how the adventure game-style gameplay and art set this apart from the many samey-looking hidden object games out there, but it's not good enough to make this worth playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022062015', 'num_games_owned': 471, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1527268073}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970345232', 'num_games_owned': 3353, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1414039765}
review:
魅力を感じられない捻りの無い薄っぺらいストーリーに加え、この手のゲームでメインでもあるアイテム探しは、全体的に画力不足でオブジェの密度も薄いのでアイテム探しの面白さが殆ど感じられない。と言うより、画面密度が薄すぎてアイテムが隠れて無い。
アイテム名の誤訳のお陰で探すべきアイテムが分からなくなる事もしばしば。
こぅ、もうちょっとあそこの場面でこのアイテム使ったら進めるんじゃないの？的な展開は殆ど無く、ただ単に足止めされたから鍵を探す的なストーリー展開で淡々とアイテム探しだけをするだけで全然面白くない。
ドラキュラ城に侵入後、ホテルに寄り道して再び城に戻ったら進行不能なバグに遭遇。
もういっぺん最初からやり直しになってしまった…。
こういったやり直し時間含めてプレイ時間はおよそ3時間半ほどだけど、純プレイ時間はおよそ2時間ほどの内容だと思う。
ヒドゥンオブジェクト系にしては少々クオリティ、ボリュームの不足感は否めないと思う。

author: {'steamid': '76561197972758166', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 125, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1413952375}
review:
Sinister City, developed by JetDogs Studios, puts you in the shoes of John, and man who is sent on a quest to chase after his Fiancée Nina. The thing is that Nina just up and left John to go to a strange city of darkness and vampires. You will have to find your way through hidden object puzzles, collection puzzles, and many more different types of puzzles if you hope to rescue Nina.

Graphically it feels a bit dated, but then again judging from some of the wording used in the game I'm going to say that this was a port of a tablet game. That being said there's nothing wrong with the look of the game. You will be interacting in a 3d environment broken down into five main areas, and of those areas there are several "rooms" you wil get to interact with in order to advance the storyline. The vampire modeling makes the game feel like a cheesy B-movie, but I think that's what the developers were going for, so in other words they nailed it.

The voice acting was interesting. Almost every character sounded like they were just reading lines, and it just didn't feel like there was any energy put into it. The only character that was really believable was the vampire that was supposed to be the TV star. 

You are going to use the mouse for everything in this game, when it comes to controls. Basically you are going to click and drag, or just click your way through this game.

So here's the deal, as cheesy as the storyline was I enjoyed the game, when it worked, and that was the problem with this game. There were several times where after I solved a puzzle and I tried to go on to the next puzzle or thing, I had issues. For example when I am trying to collect items after solving a puzzle, I would go into the next piece of the game where several items are present and after clicking on the screen, anywhere, I automatically exited back out to the area. Then there was the issue of this game only has autosave, which is fine, but I really wish there was a reset button that would reset the scene of a certain piece of the game because during one of the times I had to collect several different items, I was unable to collect the last one, even with the hint indicator highlighting it. I tried restarting the game, steam, and lastly my computer. None of these things work, and so I had to start the game all over again from scratch.

There's also the subtitles, or text that the characters are supposed to be saying, you know when you hear the audio how it is supposed to line up to what is written on the screen? Well its all over the place, sometimes its correct, but most times its hit or miss. The context might be mostly the same but the phrasing and words are completely different. At the end of the day I'm going to have to say that even though this game was enjoyable there were just a couple too many bumps in this game to make it worthwhile for anyone who isn't willing to wrestle with the game doing strange things. So with that I have to give this game a 5.3 out of 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045410977', 'num_games_owned': 3309, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1416530692}
review:
I have a lot of issues with this game. I am a fan of HOGs (hidden object games) thus it is not the genre that I have a problem with. I believe the devs intended Sinister City to have a B-movie campy feel. In some parts, they succeeded but the storyline ended up feeling jerky - for lack of better term. I can poke a lot of holes at the story but alas, it is not the main problem.

Game issues:

1) In this game, you are simply given items to search, eg. 5 rungs of a ladder, and you have no idea where the HOG scene is. In some games, this is part of the fun. In this game however, the "fun" is marred by the fact that those 5 rungs are spread among various hidden HOG scenes. You have no idea how many rungs this particular scene has. 

2) This can actually go hand in hand with pt 1. In usual HOG scenes, there are some items which are doubly hidden. Eg. You are to find a pearl. That pearl could be hidden in a oyster shell. Thus the game will show 'pearl' in your search list in a different color, to let the player know that it is a hidden item. This is the case for ALL the hogs I have played so far and I have played way more HOGs than my fingers and toes could count. Sinister City has NO SUCH THING. Thus you have zero idea if that item you can't find is simply staring at you right in front of your eyes or if it is hidden behind something irrelevant in one of the many HOG scenes.

3) In advanced mode, the game is not supposed to show you your task but on occasions, it shows up and then flickers off. This is likely another bug.

4) The game is pretty much fully voiced. This is supposed to be a good thing but the voice acting in all honesty, is crap. Furthermore, they don't match with the subtitles at all.

5) Despite being a HOG lover, I will be the first to admit that you often do some illogical things in HOGs. However, in this game, it takes the cake. Eg. Your task is to brew a truth potion and get the Count to drink it. What you do actually, is finding all the ingredients and brewing it RIGHT IN FRONT of the Count. After the potion is brewed, you hand it to the Count who actually said something along the lines of, wow, something healthy, give it to me quick. Like...seriously. What.

6) Achievements are bugged. They unlock out of order for almost every achievement. This is not a major issue but as of writing, the achievement for playing in advanced mode doesn't unlock. 
[EDIT: After a whole month later, the devs finally fixed the issue and the advanced achievement is now unlockable.]

I can go on but let's just say this is a do not recommend in my books. Being a HOG, the game can't even handle itself well on the gameplay and you end up randomly clicking items in hopes that one of them hides the item you are looking for. The only saving point is that the devs did not implement any achievement for "have less than xxx misclicks" because that is impossible.

Per pt 1 & 2, if you want examples of HOGs that do them well, try any of Artifex Mundi games or MumboJumbo's Midnight Mysteries.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067523268', 'num_games_owned': 398, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1416501301}
review: Nettes Gelegenheitsspiel per Point & Click das äusserst witzig (besonders der Abspann) gemacht ist. Für knappe 3 Euro gibt es auch ca. 3 Stunden Unterhaltung. Die Rätsel  und Wimmelbilder sind leicht gehalten, und man erreicht ein perfektes Spiel nach spätestens zwei Anläufen. Für die Sammelkarten-Freaks: 3 Sammelkarten von 5 möglichen gibt es hier abzustauben.
